Question #462 (ID: 469825)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যেকোনো ভেক্টরের একক ভেক্টর বা ঐ ভেক্টর বরাবর সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর এই দুটি কথার অর্থ—

Options:
ক. একই নয়
খ. বিপরীত
গ. একই
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C. একই

Solution:
একটি ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 এর একক ভেক্টর [math]\eta_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}|}[/math]
 এই ভেক্টর বরাবর সমান্তরাল ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{mA}}[/math]
 এর একক ভেক্টর [math]\eta_{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{m \vec{A}}{|m \vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{m \vec{A}}{m|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{A}}{|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\eta_{1} \text { }[/math]
অর্থাৎ একক দ্বয় একই।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #463 (ID: 469810)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
Y- অক্ষের দিকে কোন ভেক্টর ক্রিয়া করলে X - অক্ষের দিকে ভেক্টরি উপাংশ হবে-

Options:
ক. শূন্য
খ. A /2
গ. A
ঘ. 2A


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
কোন দিকে ভেক্টরেরউপাংশ = [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}| \cos \theta=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}| \times \cos 90^{\circ}[/math]= 0 বা শূন্য
[Image]


Explanation:

Question #464 (ID: 469811)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}, \overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}[/math] ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ কোনটি হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
C. [math]2(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{2}(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
উপাংশ = [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|^{2}} \vec{A}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{(\sqrt{1+1})^{2}}[/math]
 [math](\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #465 (ID: 469812)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=8 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=3 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math] হলে, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর -

অভিক্ষেপ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{30 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{35}{10 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{30}{10 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{35 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math]
 উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ = [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8 \times 3+(-1) \times 4+(-3)}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}+(-5)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\times(-5)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{24-4+15}{\sqrt{50}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{35}{5 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{35 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #466 (ID: 469813)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{k}[/math] বরাবর ভেক্টর [math]\vec{A}=-\hat{i}+2 \hat{k}[/math] এর উপাংশ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\overrightarrow{0}[/math]
B. 0
C. 1
D. - 0


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\vec{B}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\vec{A}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{(|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|)^{2}} \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2+2}{\left(\sqrt{2^{2}+3^{2}+1^{2}}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math](2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #467 (ID: 469781)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2006-2007, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{\alpha}[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{i}-\alpha \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. - 2, 1
B. 2,-1
C. 2,1
D. -2,-1


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\alpha .2 \alpha+(-2)(-\alpha)+1(-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha^{2}+\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha(\alpha+2)-(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\alpha-1)(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #468 (ID: 469782)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\mathbf{2} \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\mathbf{m} \hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=10 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-5 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-15 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে m এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. - 1
B. 2
C. 3
D. -5


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{2}{10}=\frac{m}{-5}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-3}{-15}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{2}{10}=\frac{m}{-5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 10 m[/math]
 [math]=-10 \therefore m[/math]
 [math]=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #469 (ID: 469783)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{X}=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Y}}=-3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\boldsymbol{Y}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{x}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{16}{\sqrt{14}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{16}{\sqrt{29}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{14}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}}{\sqrt{29}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\boldsymbol{Y}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{x}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\vec{X}} \cdot \vec{Y}}{|\vec{Y}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2(-3)+(-3) \times 2+4(-1)}{\sqrt{(-3)^{2}+2^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-6-6-4}{\sqrt{9+4+1}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{16}{\sqrt{14}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #470 (ID: 469784)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ঘনকের পার্শ্ব বাহুগুলি [math]\overrightarrow{O A}=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}, \overrightarrow{O B}=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math], [math]\overrightarrow{O C}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{k}[/math] হলে তার আয়তন হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{13}[/math]
B. 4
C. [math]\frac{2}{7}[/math]
D. 7


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
আয়তন = [math]=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}2 & -3 & 0 \\1 & 1 & -1 \\3 & 0 & -1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=2(-1+0)+3[/math]
 [math](-1+3)+0(0-3)[/math]
 [math]=-2+6+0[/math]
 [math]=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #471 (ID: 469785)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}=[/math] [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{O B}}=\mathbf{i}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A B}}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math]
B. [math]\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math]
C. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
D. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #472 (ID: 469786)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(- 4, 3,0) বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর R হলে, নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \vec{R}=-4 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}\\\text{ii. } |\vec{R}|=5\end{array}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{R}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি Z অক্ষের উপর লম্ব

Options:
ক. i, ii
খ. ii, iii
গ. i, iii
ঘ. i, ii, iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\vec{R}=-4 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+0 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=-4 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\vec{R}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(-4)^{2}+3^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{5^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=5[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{R}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটি z অক্ষের উপর লম্ব। [math]\theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{0}{\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=90^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #473 (ID: 469788)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}[/math] ভেক্টরটি X অক্ষের সাথে কত ডিগ্রি কোণ তৈরি করে?

Options:
ক. 30°
খ. 45°
গ. 90°
ঘ. 180°


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
কোণ [math]\theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}) \cdot \hat{\mathrm{i}}}{\sqrt{2^{2}+2^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{2}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=45^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #474 (ID: 469789)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{u}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{v}=6 \hat{i}+\alpha \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\alpha[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 3
B. - 3
C. 9
D. -9


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ভেক্টরদ্বয় সমান্তরাল হলে[math]\frac{a_{1}}{a_{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{b_{1}}{b_{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{c_{1}}{c_{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{2}{6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{-3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha=9[/math]
 [math]\text { Ans : C. }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #475 (ID: 469790)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{u}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{v}}=6 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\alpha \hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\alpha[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 3
B. - 3
C. 9
D. -9


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{2}{6}=\frac{3}{\alpha}=\frac{-1}{-3} \Rightarrow \alpha=3 \times 3=9[/math]

Explanation:

Question #476 (ID: 469792)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]3 \sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
নির্ণেয় অভিক্ষেপ [math]\frac{\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}}{|\vec{a}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1 \times 3+1 \times 3}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=3 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #477 (ID: 469793)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টেরের বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=5 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ নির্ণয় কর?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\vec{a}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\vec{b}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]= \vec{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(10-3-4)}{\left(\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}\right)^{2}}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{9}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ = [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(10-3-4)}{\left(\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}\right)^{2}}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})=\frac{3}{9}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})=\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]

Question #478 (ID: 469795)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
'a' এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+4 \hat{k},[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+4 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\mathbf{a} \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{C}}=\mathbf{a} \hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math] [math]+7 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+9 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] সমতলীয় হবে?

Options:
A. 2
B. -2
C. 3
D. 5


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
সমতলীয় হবে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}2 & 3 & 4 \\3 & 4 & a \\a & 7 & 9\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]2(36-7 a)-3[/math]
 [math]\left(27-a^{2}\right)+4(21-4 a)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 a^{2}-30 a+75[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}-10 a+25[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(a-5)^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #479 (ID: 469796)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2012-2013, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{O A}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{O B}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A B}}|[/math] নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
B. [math]2\sqrt{19}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]4\sqrt{19}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}|[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}|[/math]
 [math]=|2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+36+36}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{76}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{19}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #480 (ID: 469798)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{r}=2 t \hat{i}+3 t^{2} \hat{j}[/math] হচ্ছে একটি বিন্দুবস্তুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর, যেখানে t হচ্ছে সময়। বস্তুটির বেগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2 t \hat{i}[/math]
খ. [math]2 \hat{i}+6 t \hat{j}[/math]
গ. [math]6 \mathrm{t} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \hat{i}+3 t \hat{j}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=2 \mathrm{t} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \mathrm{t}^{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{d} \overline{\mathrm{r}}}{\mathrm{dt}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+6 \mathrm{t} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #481 (ID: 469799)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ভেক্টর [math]\cos \alpha \cos \beta \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\cos \alpha \sin \beta \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\sin \alpha \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] একটি-

Options:
A. শূন্য ভেক্টর
B. একক ভেক্টর
C. ধ্রুব ভেক্টর
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
মান = [math]\sqrt{(\cos \alpha \cos \beta)^{2}+(\cos \alpha \sin \beta)^{2}+\sin ^{2} \alpha}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\cos ^{2} \alpha\left(\cos ^{2} \beta+\sin ^{2} \beta\right)+\sin ^{2} \alpha}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\cos ^{2} \alpha+\sin ^{2} \alpha}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
 1 অর্থাৎ একক ভেক্টর

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #482 (ID: 469800)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{a}=\mathbf{a}_{1} \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\mathbf{a}_{2} \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\mathbf{a}_{3} \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এর একক ভেক্টর জন্য-

[math]\text { (i) } \hat{\mathrm{a}}=\frac{\underline{\mathrm{a}}}{|\mathrm{a}|} \text {, (ii) }|\overline{\mathrm{a}}|=1 \text {, (iii) }|\mathrm{a}| 
eq 0[/math] হলে, নিচের সত্য-

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. i
D. ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text { (i) } \hat{a}=\frac{a}{|a|}[/math]
 যা সত্য [math]\text { (ii) }|\bar{a}|=1[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]
eq 1[/math]
 যা সত্য নয়[math]\text { (iii) }|\mathrm{a}|=\sqrt{\mathrm{a}_{1}{ }_{1}+\mathrm{a}_{2}{ }_{2}+\mathrm{a}_{3}^{2}} 
eq 0[/math]
 যা সত্য

Explanation:

Question #483 (ID: 469801)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}|=3[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}} . \vec{Q}=8[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 17
B. 21
C. 24
D. 33


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math](\vec{P}+\vec{Q}) \cdot \vec{P}[/math]
 [math]=\vec{P} \cdot \vec{P}+\vec{Q} \cdot \vec{P}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{P}^{2}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math]
 [math]=9+8[/math]
 [math]=17 \quad[/math]
 [math]\because|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}|[/math]
 [math]=3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{P}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=9[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

গ. 360°

Question #485 (ID: 469804)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2006-2007, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{\alpha}[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{i}-\alpha \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. - 2, 1
B. 2,-1
C. 2,1
D. -2,-1


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\alpha .2 \alpha+(-2)(-\alpha)+1(-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha^{2}+\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha(\alpha+2)-(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\alpha-1)(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #486 (ID: 469805)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{1}{2} \hat{i}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{j}+ a \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি একক ভেক্টর হলে a এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{15}}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{7}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\because \frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{a} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 একটি একক ভেক্টর।[math]\therefore \sqrt{\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{9}+a^{2}}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1-\frac{1}{4}-\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{36-9-4}{36}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{23}{36} \therefore a[/math]
 [math]= \pm\frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #487 (ID: 469807)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টেরের বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=5 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ নির্ণয় কর?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\vec{a}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\vec{b}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]= \vec{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(10-3-4)}{\left(\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}\right)^{2}}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{9}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ = [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(10-3-4)}{\left(\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}\right)^{2}}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})=\frac{3}{9}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})=\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]

Question #488 (ID: 469809)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
'a' এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+4 \hat{k},[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+4 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\mathbf{a} \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{C}}=\mathbf{a} \hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math] [math]+7 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+9 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] সমতলীয় হবে?

Options:
A. 2
B. -2
C. 3
D. 5


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
সমতলীয় হবে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}2 & 3 & 4 \\3 & 4 & a \\a & 7 & 9\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]2(36-7 a)-3[/math]
 [math]\left(27-a^{2}\right)+4(21-4 a)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 a^{2}-30 a+75[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}-10 a+25[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(a-5)^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=5[/math]


Explanation:

Question #489 (ID: 409927)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{1}{2} \hat{i}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{6}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{49}{36}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{11}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{\frac{11}{6}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)^{2}+1^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{9}+1}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\frac{9+4+36}{36}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\frac{49}{36}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #490 (ID: 409928)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সামন্তরিকের দুইটি সন্নিহিত বাহু [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}[/math] হলে উহার প্রধান কর্ণের দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. [math]|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]
গ. [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}|[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}|\vec{P} \times \vec{Q}|[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
সামন্তরিকের প্রধান কর্ণের দৈর্ঘ্য [math]=|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]

Explanation:

গ. [math]\hat{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর লম্বদিকে

Correct Answer: খ

Question #492 (ID: 409931)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুইটি সমমানের ভেক্টর রাশি কোন একটি বিন্দুতে কত কোণে ক্রিয়া করলে এদের লব্ধির মান যে কোন ভেক্টরের মানের অর্ধেক হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]121^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]151^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]75^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\left(\frac{p}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=p^{2}+p^{2}+2 p^{2} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{p^{2}}{4}=2 p^{2}(1+\cos \theta) \Rightarrow 1=8(1+\cos \theta)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1[/math]
 [math]=8+8 \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-7}{8} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=151.04^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #493 (ID: 409932)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=t \hat{k}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]|\vec{a}|=7[/math] হলে [math]t[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]-3[/math]
C. [math]6[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]t^{2}+2^{2}+3^{2}=7^{2} \Rightarrow t^{2}=36 \therefore t=6[/math]

Explanation:

Question #494 (ID: 409933)

Question:
[math]\vec{v}[/math] এবং [math]-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মধ্যবর্তী কোন কত ডিগ্রী?

Options:
ক. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]360^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\vec{v}[/math]
 এবং [math]\vec{v}[/math]
 বিপরীতমুখী

Explanation:

Question #495 (ID: 409934)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{O}} \mathrm{A}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{O} B}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A} B}|=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{20}[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{19}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{20}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}|[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}|[/math]
 [math]=|2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+6 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2^{2}+6^{2}+6^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{76}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{19}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #496 (ID: 409935)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সদৃশ ভেক্টরের জন্য নিচের কোনটি সত্য নয়?

Options:
ক. সদৃশ ভেক্টরের দিক একই
খ. সদৃশ ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের ক্রস গুণন শূন্য
গ. সদৃশ ভেক্টরসমূহের ধারক রেখা সর্বদা একই
ঘ. সদৃশ ভেক্টরসমূহের মান একই অথবা ভিন্ন


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
শূন্য ভেক্টর (Zero Vector or Null Vector): যে ভেক্টরের দৈর্ঘ্য বা পরমমান শূন্য এবং যার দিক নিণয় করা যায় না তাকে শূন্য ভেক্টর বলা হয় এবং ইহাকে) [math]\underline{0}[/math]
 বা [math]0[/math]
(মোটা হরফের শূন্য) দ্বারা প্রকাশ করা হয়। শূন্য ভেক্টরের প্রারম্ভবিন্দু ও প্রান্তবিন্দু একই বিন্দু। যেমন, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AA}}=\underline{0} .[/math]
প্রকৃত ও অপ্রকৃত ভেক্টর (Proper and improper vector): শূন্য ব্যতীত সকল ভেক্টরকে প্রকৃত ভেক্টর এবং শূন্য ভেক্টরকে অপ্রকৃত ভেক্টর বলে।সদৃশ ভেক্টর (Like Vectors): যদি দুইটি ভেক্টরের দিক একই হয়, তবে তাদেরকে সদৃশ ভেক্টর বলে। দুইটি সদৃশ ভেক্টরের ধারক রেখা একই অথবা পরস্পর সমান্তরাল কিন্তু তাদের দৈর্ঘ্য সমান নাও হতে পারে

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #497 (ID: 409936)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \hat{i}[/math] [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math] [math]\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]0.5[/math]
D. [math]1.5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]|A|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sqrt{\frac{1}{3}+\frac{1}{3}+\frac{1}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\frac{3}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #498 (ID: 409937)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\dot{a}=\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}, b=-2 i+4 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]c=\hat{i}-6 \hat{j}-7 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]a + b + c[/math] ভেক্টরের মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{18}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{17}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{16}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{15}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}+\mathbf{c}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+\hat{\mathrm{k}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]+\hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-7 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=0 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\mathbf{a}[/math]
 [math]+\mathbf{b}+\mathrm{c}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{0^{2}+(-4)^{2}+(-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{0+16+1}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{17}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #499 (ID: 409938)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathrm{A}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-4 \hat{k},[/math] [math]\mathrm{B}[/math] [math]=-2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]C=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] তিনটি ভেক্টর ।

[math]|A-B+2 C|[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{59}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{93}[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{13}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{A}-\mathbf{B}+2 \mathbf{C}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]-(-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})+2(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2\hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=7 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\mathbf{A}-\mathbf{B}+2\mathbf{C}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{7^{2}+(-1)^{2}+(-3)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{59}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #500 (ID: 409939)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\mathrm{t}^{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 t \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] হলে [math]P[/math] বিন্দুটি কোন বক্ররেখায় অবস্থিত?

Options:
ক. [math]x^{2}=4 y[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2}=2 y[/math]
গ. [math]x=2 y^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]y^{2}=4 x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
P বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math]\left(\mathrm{t}^{2}, 2 \mathrm{t}\right)[/math]উক্ত বিন্দু দ্বারা শুধুমাত্র অপশন 'ঘ' সিদ্ধ হয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #501 (ID: 409940)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{F}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{d}}[/math] [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math] [math]+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{F}}+\mathbf{3 \vec { d }}|[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{89}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{93}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{98}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{95}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]|\mathbf{F}+3 \mathbf{d}|[/math]
 [math]=|3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-9 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow |9 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9^{2}+1^{2}+(-4)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{98}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #502 (ID: 409941)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{F}=4 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] বলটি [math]\mathrm{P}(2,2,-1)[/math] বিন্দুতে প্রয়োগ করা হল ।

[math](5,1,4)[/math] বিন্দুর সাপেক্ষে [math]P[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টরের মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{35}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{34}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{27}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\vec{p}=(5-2) \hat{i}+(1-2)[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+(4+1) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math][\bar{P}\rangle[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3^{2}+(-1)^{2}+5^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{35}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #503 (ID: 409942)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\triangle \mathrm{ABC}[/math] এর শীর্ষ বিন্দু তিনটি [math]\mathrm{A}(3,-1,-2), \mathrm{B}(1,1,-3), \mathrm{C}(4,-3,1)[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}[/math] ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]5 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{B C}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{O C}-\overrightarrow{O B}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{i}-\hat{j}+3[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #504 (ID: 409943)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো সামান্তরিকের সন্নিহিত বাহু দুইটি [math]\mathbf{P}=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]Q=4 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] হলে নিচের কোনটি কর্ণ নির্দেশ করে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm {\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm {-\hat{i}-4 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm {7 \hat{i}+2 \hat{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
কর্ন নির্দেশ করলে [math]\vec{p}+\vec{Q}[/math]
 [math]=(3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})+[/math]
 [math](4 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=7 \hat{i}+2 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
দুইটি ভেক্টর পরস্পর বিপরীত হলে-

i. ধারকরেখা সমান্তরাল হবে

ii. দিক পরস্পর বিপরীত হবে

iii. দৈর্ঘ্য ভিন্ন হবে

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
i ও ii

Question #508 (ID: 409947)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: St. Joseph Higher Secondary School, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=-3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]|\vec{a}|=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]5 \sqrt{2}[/math]
B. [math]4 \sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]3 \sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:


Explanation:

[math]\vec{M}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{N}=a \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর রাশি ।

[math]a=1[/math] হলে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{M}}|:|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{N}}|[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

খ. [math]1: \sqrt{2}[/math]

[math]\vec{A}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-4 \hat{k}, \vec{B}=-2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] তিনটি ভেক্টর।

[math]|\vec{A}-\vec{B}+2 \vec{C}|[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{13}[/math]
খ. [math]0[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{93}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{59}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Question #511 (ID: 409353)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{1}{2} \hat{i}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{6}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{49}{36}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{11}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{\frac{11}{6}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)^{2}+1^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{9}+1}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\frac{9+4+36}{36}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\frac{49}{36}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #512 (ID: 409354)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সামন্তরিকের দুইটি সন্নিহিত বাহু [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}[/math] হলে উহার প্রধান কর্ণের দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. [math]|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]
গ. [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}|[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}|\vec{P} \times \vec{Q}|[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
সামন্তরিকের প্রধান কর্ণের দৈর্ঘ্য [math]=|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]

Explanation:

Question #514 (ID: 409357)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুইটি সমমানের ভেক্টর রাশি কোন একটি বিন্দুতে কত কোণে ক্রিয়া করলে এদের লব্ধির মান যে কোন ভেক্টরের মানের অর্ধেক হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]121^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]151^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]75^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\left(\frac{p}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=p^{2}+p^{2}+2 p^{2} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{p^{2}}{4}=2 p^{2}(1+\cos \theta) \Rightarrow 1=8(1+\cos \theta)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1[/math]
 [math]=8+8 \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-7}{8} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=151.04^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #515 (ID: 409358)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=t \hat{k}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]|\vec{a}|=7[/math] হলে [math]t[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]-3[/math]
C. [math]6[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]t^{2}+2^{2}+3^{2}=7^{2} \Rightarrow t^{2}=36 \therefore t=6[/math]

Explanation:

[math]\vec{v}[/math] এবং [math]-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মধ্যবর্তী কোন কত ডিগ্রী?

ঘ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]

 এবং [math]\vec{v}[/math]
 বিপরীতমুখী

Question #517 (ID: 409360)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{O}} \mathrm{A}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{O} B}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A} B}|=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{20}[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{19}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{20}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}|[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}|[/math]
 [math]=|2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+6 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2^{2}+6^{2}+6^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{76}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{19}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #518 (ID: 409361)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সদৃশ ভেক্টরের জন্য নিচের কোনটি সত্য নয়?

Options:
ক. সদৃশ ভেক্টরের দিক একই
খ. সদৃশ ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের ক্রস গুণন শূন্য
গ. সদৃশ ভেক্টরসমূহের ধারক রেখা সর্বদা একই
ঘ. সদৃশ ভেক্টরসমূহের মান একই অথবা ভিন্ন


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
শূন্য ভেক্টর (Zero Vector or Null Vector): যে ভেক্টরের দৈর্ঘ্য বা পরমমান শূন্য এবং যার দিক নিণয় করা যায় না তাকে শূন্য ভেক্টর বলা হয় এবং ইহাকে) [math]\underline{0}[/math]
 বা [math]0[/math]
(মোটা হরফের শূন্য) দ্বারা প্রকাশ করা হয়। শূন্য ভেক্টরের প্রারম্ভবিন্দু ও প্রান্তবিন্দু একই বিন্দু। যেমন, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AA}}=\underline{0} .[/math]
প্রকৃত ও অপ্রকৃত ভেক্টর (Proper and improper vector): শূন্য ব্যতীত সকল ভেক্টরকে প্রকৃত ভেক্টর এবং শূন্য ভেক্টরকে অপ্রকৃত ভেক্টর বলে।সদৃশ ভেক্টর (Like Vectors): যদি দুইটি ভেক্টরের দিক একই হয়, তবে তাদেরকে সদৃশ ভেক্টর বলে। দুইটি সদৃশ ভেক্টরের ধারক রেখা একই অথবা পরস্পর সমান্তরাল কিন্তু তাদের দৈর্ঘ্য সমান নাও হতে পারে

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #519 (ID: 409362)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \hat{i}[/math] [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math] [math]\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]0.5[/math]
D. [math]1.5[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]|A|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sqrt{\frac{1}{3}+\frac{1}{3}+\frac{1}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\frac{3}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #520 (ID: 409363)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\dot{a}=\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}, b=-2 i+4 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]c=\hat{i}-6 \hat{j}-7 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]a + b + c[/math] ভেক্টরের মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{18}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{17}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{16}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{15}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}+\mathbf{c}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+\hat{\mathrm{k}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]+\hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-7 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=0 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\mathbf{a}[/math]
 [math]+\mathbf{b}+\mathrm{c}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{0^{2}+(-4)^{2}+(-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{0+16+1}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{17}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #521 (ID: 409364)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathrm{A}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-4 \hat{k},[/math] [math]\mathrm{B}[/math] [math]=-2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]C=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] তিনটি ভেক্টর ।

[math]|A-B+2 C|[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{59}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{93}[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{13}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{A}-\mathbf{B}+2 \mathbf{C}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]-(-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})+2(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2\hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=7 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\mathbf{A}-\mathbf{B}+2\mathbf{C}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{7^{2}+(-1)^{2}+(-3)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{59}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #522 (ID: 409365)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\mathrm{t}^{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 t \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] হলে [math]P[/math] বিন্দুটি কোন বক্ররেখায় অবস্থিত?

Options:
ক. [math]x^{2}=4 y[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2}=2 y[/math]
গ. [math]x=2 y^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]y^{2}=4 x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
P বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math]\left(\mathrm{t}^{2}, 2 \mathrm{t}\right)[/math]উক্ত বিন্দু দ্বারা শুধুমাত্র অপশন 'ঘ' সিদ্ধ হয়।

Explanation:

Question #523 (ID: 409366)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{F}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{d}}[/math] [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math] [math]+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{F}}+\mathbf{3 \vec { d }}|[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{89}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{93}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{98}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{95}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]|\mathbf{F}+3 \mathbf{d}|[/math]
 [math]=|3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-9 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow |9 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9^{2}+1^{2}+(-4)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{98}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #524 (ID: 409367)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{F}=4 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] বলটি [math]\mathrm{P}(2,2,-1)[/math] বিন্দুতে প্রয়োগ করা হল ।

[math](5,1,4)[/math] বিন্দুর সাপেক্ষে [math]P[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টরের মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{35}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{34}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{27}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\vec{p}=(5-2) \hat{i}+(1-2)[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+(4+1) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math][\bar{P}\rangle[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3^{2}+(-1)^{2}+5^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{35}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #525 (ID: 409368)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\triangle \mathrm{ABC}[/math] এর শীর্ষ বিন্দু তিনটি [math]\mathrm{A}(3,-1,-2), \mathrm{B}(1,1,-3), \mathrm{C}(4,-3,1)[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}[/math] ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]5 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{B C}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{O C}-\overrightarrow{O B}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{i}-\hat{j}+3[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #526 (ID: 409369)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো সামান্তরিকের সন্নিহিত বাহু দুইটি [math]\mathbf{P}=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]Q=4 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] হলে নিচের কোনটি কর্ণ নির্দেশ করে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm {\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm {-\hat{i}-4 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm {7 \hat{i}+2 \hat{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
কর্ন নির্দেশ করলে [math]\vec{p}+\vec{Q}[/math]
 [math]=(3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})+[/math]
 [math](4 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=7 \hat{i}+2 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর হলে—

i. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মান [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]\frac{8}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

iii. ভেক্টর দুটির অন্তর্গত কোণ [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{\sqrt{66}}[/math]

Question #536 (ID: 409253)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](\hat{\mathbf{j}} \times \hat{\mathbf{i}}) \hat{\mathbf{k}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]k[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math](\hat{\mathrm{j}} \times \hat{\mathrm{i}}) \cdot \hat{\mathrm{k}}=-\hat{\mathrm{k}} \cdot \hat{\mathrm{k}}=-1[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #537 (ID: 409254)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P(1, 3, 4 )[/math] ও [math]Q (2, 3, 5 )[/math] হলে -

i. [math]Q[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math] এর একক ভেক্টর [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{26}}(\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}[/math] এর অভিক্ষেপ - [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i,ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
iii. সঠিক নয়, কারণ, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math]
 বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ[math]\Rightarrow\frac{(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) \cdot(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}})}{\sqrt{1^{2}+3^{2}+4^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2-9+20}{\sqrt{26}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{\sqrt{26}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #538 (ID: 409255)

A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]k[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math](\hat{\mathrm{j}} \times \hat{\mathrm{i}}) \cdot \hat{\mathrm{k}}=-\hat{\mathrm{k}} \cdot \hat{\mathrm{k}}=-1[/math]

Question #539 (ID: 409256)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P(1,3,4)[/math] ও [math]Q (2, 3, 5)[/math] হলে –

i. [math]Q[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math] এর একক ভেক্টর [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{26}}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}[/math] এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
iii. সঠিক নয়, কারণ, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math]
 বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ[math]=\frac{(\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}) \cdot(2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k})}{\sqrt{1^{2}+3^{2}+4^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2-9+20}{\sqrt{26}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{\sqrt{26}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #540 (ID: 409257)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{v}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}}=9[/math] এবং [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}}|=3 \sqrt{3}[/math] হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]|\vec{u} \times \vec{v}|=u v \sin \theta=3 \sqrt{3} \cdots(i)[/math]
 [math]\vec{u} . \vec{v}=u v \cos \theta=9...(ii)[/math]
 [math]\text { (i) } \div(\text { ii }) \Rightarrow \tan \theta=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \Rightarrow \theta=\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #542 (ID: 409259)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{B}=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]|A+B|[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{29}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{39}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{49}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{59}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-7 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math];|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1^{2}+3^{2}+7^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{59}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #543 (ID: 409260)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]xy[/math] তলের সমান্তরাল এবং [math]2 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+6 \hat{k}[/math] এর সাথে সমকোণে অবস্থিত একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{\hat i+\hat j}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{\hat k}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{\hat i+\hat j}{\sqrt{44}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{\mathrm{\hat i}+\mathrm{\hat j}}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি, একক ভেক্টরটি [math](a \hat{i}+b \hat{j})[/math]
এখন, [math]2 a-2 b=0 \Rightarrow a=b \therefore[/math]
 একক ভেক্টর [math]\pm \frac{a(\hat i+\hat j)}{\sqrt{2} a}=\pm \frac{\hat i+\hat j}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #544 (ID: 409261)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\vec{p}+\vec{q}=\vec{p}-\vec{q}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]
E. সবগুলো


Correct Answer: E.সবগুলো

Solution:
ধরি মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\alpha[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}[/math]
 [math].....(i)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \vec{p}-\vec{p}=-\vec{q}-\vec{q} \Rightarrow 0=-2 \vec{q} \Rightarrow \vec{q}=0.....(ii)[/math]
(i) নং হতে[math](\vec{p}+\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{p}+\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]=(\vec{p}-\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{p}-\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\vec{p} \cdot \vec{p}+\vec{p}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{q}+\vec{q} \cdot \vec{p}+\vec{q}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]=\vec{p}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{p}-\vec{p}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{q}-\vec{p}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{q}+\vec{q} \cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \cdot \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}=0[/math]
 [math]4 \cdot|\vec{p}| \cdot|\vec{q}|[/math]
 [math]\cdot \cos \alpha=0[/math]
 [math]....(iii)[/math]
এখন (ii) নং থেকে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}|=0[/math]
 তাই [math]\alpha[/math]
 এর যে কোন মানের জন্য (iii) নং সমীকরণ সত্য ।আবার প্রশ্নে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}|=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}|[/math]
 থাকলে সঠিক উত্তর [math](b) 90°[/math]
 হবে ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #545 (ID: 409262)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{X}}=-3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Y}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{k}[/math] হলে নিচের কোন একক ভেক্টরটি [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{x}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{y}}[/math] উভয়ের উপর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}(-2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{3}(-2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
C. [math]\pm \frac{1}{3}(-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{29}(-3 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k})[/math]
E. No correct answer


Correct Answer: E.No correct answer

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{X}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Y}}[/math]
 [math]=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\-3 & 4 & -5 \\2 & 2 & -3\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\hat{i}(-12+10)[/math]
 [math]-\hat{j}(9+10)+\hat{k}(-6-8)[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{i}-19 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]-14 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{561}}[/math]
 [math](-2 \hat{i}-19 \hat{j}-14 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\\[/math]
 [math]\boxed {\mathrm {Another\ Solution} }[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{X}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Y}}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\-3 & 4 & -5 \\2 & 2 & -3\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}(-12+10)[/math]
 [math]-\hat{j}(9-10)[/math]
 [math]+\hat{k}(-6+8)[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}[/math]
লম্ব একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{-2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{4+1+4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](-2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #546 (ID: 409263)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}, \vec{B}[/math] ও [math]\vec{\mathrm{C}}[/math] ভেক্টর হলে নিচের কোনটি অর্থবহ নহে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\vec{A} \times(\vec{B} \times \vec{C})[/math]
খ. [math]\vec{A} \cdot(\vec{B} \times \vec{C})[/math]
গ. [math]\vec{A} \cdot(\vec{B} \cdot \vec{C})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\vec{A}+(\vec{B} \times \vec{C})[/math]
ঙ. [math](\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}+\vec{B} \cdot \vec{C})[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\vec B.\vec C[/math]
 = স্কেলার রাশি। তাই এর সাথে [math]\vec A[/math]
 এর ডট গুণন সম্ভব নয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #547 (ID: 409264)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত হলে [math](\vec{A}+\vec{B})[/math] এবং [math](\vec{A}-\vec{B})[/math] এর মান একই হয়?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 এর মান একই হলে,[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
= [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণও হলে,[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos (180-\theta)[/math]
 [math]-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos \theta=\rightarrow A \times \cos (180-\theta)[/math]
 [math]\cos \theta=\cos (180-\theta)[/math]
এই সমীকরণটি সত্য হবে যখন [math]\theta=90^{\circ}[/math]
সুতরাং, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ 90° হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 এর মান একই হবে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #548 (ID: 409265)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}B[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}C[/math] কে সন্নিহিত বাহু ধরে অংকিত বর্গের ক্ষেত্রফল 16 বর্গ একক। [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}B[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}C[/math] এর ক্রস গুণফলের মান কত?

Options:
A. 16 একক
B. 15 একক
C. 12 একক
D. 10 একক


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
কোন বর্গের সন্নিহিত বাহুদ্বয় [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
 হয় তবে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}|=[/math]
 বর্গক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল = 16 বর্গ একক

Explanation:

Question #549 (ID: 409266)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}[/math] [math]=3 \vec{i}+\vec{j}-2 \vec{k},[/math] [math]\vec{B}=2 \vec{i}-\vec{j}+\vec{k}, \vec{C}[/math] [math]=\vec{i}+3 \vec{j}-2 \vec{k}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}} \cdot(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}})[/math] [math]=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{C}+\mathrm{A}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]; \mathrm{B}(\mathrm{C}+\mathrm{A})=(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) ;[/math]
 [math]8-4-4=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #550 (ID: 409267)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হলে [math](\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math] [math](\overline{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি পরস্পর-

Options:
A. লম্ব
B. সমান্তরাল
C. সমান
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math](\overline{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math];(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overline{\mathrm{B}})[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{k}} ;[/math]
 [math](\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math]
 [math]=(-8)+3+5[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #551 (ID: 409268)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](\hat{k} \times \hat{i}) \cdot \hat{\mathbf{j}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math](\hat{\mathrm{k}} \times \hat{\mathrm{i}}) \cdot \hat{\mathrm{j}}=\hat{\mathrm{j}} \cdot \hat{\mathrm{j}}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #553 (ID: 409270)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
P(1, 2, 3) এবং Q(4, −3, 1) দুইটি বিন্দু হলে -

i. [math]P[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

ii. [math]Q[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

iii. [math]P[/math] ও [math]Q[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার ভেক্টর সমীকরণ,

[math](1+3 t) \hat{i}+(2-5 t) \hat{j}+(3-2 t) \hat{k}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]r(x, y, z)[/math]
 বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর[math]r=\hat{i} x+\hat{j} y+\hat{k} z[/math]
দুইটি বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]a[/math]
 ও [math]b[/math]
 হলে এই দুই বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ হবে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathbf{r}=\mathbf{a}+t(b-a) \\\Rightarrow (\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})+\mathrm{t}\{(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})-(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2\hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})\} \\\Rightarrow (\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})+\mathrm{t}(3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) \\\Rightarrow \mathbf{r}=(1+3 \mathrm{t}) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+(2-5 \mathrm{t}) \hat{\mathrm{j}}+(3-2 \mathrm{t}) \hat{\mathrm{k}}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #554 (ID: 409271)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{A}=8 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] হলে –

i. [math]\mathrm A[/math] একটি একক ভেক্টর

ii. [math]|\hat{A} \times \hat{k}|=10[/math]

ii. [math]A . \hat{j}=6[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
i. সঠিক নয় ।কারণ, [math]|A|=\sqrt{8^{2}+6^{2}}=10[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\text{ii. } A \times \hat{k}=\left|\begin{array}{lll}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\8 & 6 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 1\end{array}\right|=6 \hat{i}-8 \hat{j}\\\therefore|\mathrm{A} \times \hat{\mathrm{k}}|=\sqrt[1]{6^{2}+(-8)^{2}}=10\\\text{iii. } (8 \hat{i}+6 \hat{j}) \cdot \hat{j}=6\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
