Question #555 (ID: 409272)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]O[/math] মূলবিন্দু সাপেক্ষে [math]\mathrm{M}(3,-2,1)[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{N}(-2,1,1)[/math] দুটি বিন্দু হলে-

i. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OM}}[/math] বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{14}}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OM}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{ON}}[/math] এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OM}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{ON}}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-7}{2 \sqrt{21}}\right)[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\underline{a}[/math]
 ও [math]\underline{b}[/math]
 দুইটি অশূন্য ভেক্টরের অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ [math]\theta[/math]
 হলে, [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{a}} \cdot \underline{\mathbf{b}}=|\underline{a}||\underline{\mathbf{b}}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos \theta=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{a}||\underline{b}|}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{a}||\underline{b}|} .[/math]
দ্রষ্টব্যঃ [math]\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}[/math]
 [math]=|\underline{a}||\underline{\mathrm{b}}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|\underline{\mathrm{b}}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{a}|}[/math]
 [math]\therefore a[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\underline{b}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{a}|}[/math]
তদ্রুপ, [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\underline{a}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{b}|}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \underline{a}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=|\underline{b}| \cos \theta \hat{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{a}|} \hat{a}[/math]
তদ্রুপ, [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=|\underline{a}| \cos \theta \hat{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{b}|} \hat{b}[/math]
দ্রষ্টব্যঃ [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের বরাবর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 এর উপাংশের মান ও [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{a}}[/math]
 এর উপর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ পরস্পর সমান।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #556 (ID: 409273)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P=9 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]Q=4 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \mathrm {P} \perp \mathrm{Q}\\\text{ii. } \mathrm{P} \| \mathrm{Q}\\\text{iii. } |\mathrm{P}|=\sqrt{118}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ii. সঠিক নয় ।দেওয়া আছে, [math]P=9 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\mathbf{Q}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{P} \| \mathrm{Q}[/math]
 হলে, [math]P[/math]
 ও [math]Q[/math]
 এর [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}, \hat{\mathrm{j}}, \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 এর সহগের অনুপাত সমান হবে।কিন্তু [math]\frac{9}{4} 
eq \frac{1}{-6} \therefore P \| Q[/math]
 সম্ভব নয়

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #557 (ID: 409148)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে-

[math]\text { i. } \vec{A}-\vec{B}=-2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{k}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=4[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \vec{A} \times \vec{B}=4[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(iii) সঠিক নয়। কারণ [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}[/math] ভেক্টর রাশি।

Question #558 (ID: 409149)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{O A}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}, \overrightarrow{O B}=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে,

i. বিন্দুদ্বয়ের স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে [math](3, -2, 5)[/math] এবং [math]( 1, 1, −2)[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+7 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math]

iii. AB এর মধ্যবিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text { ii. } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}-\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. } \mathrm{AB}[/math]
 এর মধ্যবিন্দু [math]\left(\frac{3+1}{2}, \frac{-2+1}{2}, \frac{5-2}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(2, \frac{-1}{2}, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{AB}[/math]
 এর মধ্যবিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]=2 \hat{i}-\frac{1}{2} \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{3}{2} \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #559 (ID: 409150)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Faujdarhat Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{O}(0,0,0), \mathrm{A}(1,2,3)[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{B}(-3,-2,-1)[/math]

i. [math]B[/math] এর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]-3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটির দৈর্ঘ্য [math]\sqrt{14}[/math] একক

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}=-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
i ও ii

Explanation:

ii. [math]\left|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}_{}}\right|=3[/math] একক

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math] এর সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Question #561 (ID: 409152)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka City College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর উপাংশ [math]-\frac{3 \sqrt{6}}{2} \hat{b}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{a}\vec{b}[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-9[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{acos} \theta=-\frac{3 \sqrt{6}}{2}=\frac{\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}}{b} \Rightarrow \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=-\frac{3 \sqrt{6}}{2} \cdot \sqrt{4+1+1}=-9[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #568 (ID: 409142)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


উদ্দীপকের আলোকে,

i. ভেক্টর যোগের ত্রিভুজ সূত্রানুযায়ী [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]

ii. ভেক্টরের বিয়োগ অনুযায়ী [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]

iii. ভেক্টর যোগের সামান্তরিক সূত্রানুযায়ী $$

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i
B. i ও iii
C. iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ii. সঠিক নয়। কারণ ভেক্টরের বিয়োগ অনুযায়ী[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #569 (ID: 409143)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ও [math]\underline{\mathbf{b}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটির মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\theta(0 \leq \theta \leq \pi)[/math] হলে—

i. [math]\underline{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{b}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\underline{b}| \cos \theta[/math]

ii. [math]\underline{\mathbf{b}}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\underline{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=|\underline{a}| \cos \theta \hat{\mathrm{b}}[/math]

iii. [math]\theta=\sin ^{-1} \frac{\underline{\mathrm{|a}} \times \underline{\mathrm{b}} \mid}{|\underline{\mathrm{a}}| \underline{\mathrm{b}} \mid}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
(i) [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=(|\overline{\mathrm{B}}| \cos \theta) \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 যেখানে [math]\hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 হচ্ছে [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর একক ভেক্টর।(ii) [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=(|\overline{\mathrm{A}}| \cos \theta) \hat{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 যেখানে [math]\hat{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 হচ্ছে [math]\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর একক ভেক্টর।(i) [math]\hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\hat{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\overline{\mathrm{b}}| \cos \theta=\frac{\overline{\mathrm{a}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{b}}}{|\overline{\mathrm{a}}|}[/math]
(ii) [math]\overline{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overline{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\overline{\mathrm{a}}| \cos \theta=\frac{\overline{\mathrm{a}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{b}}}{|\overline{\mathrm{b}}|}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #571 (ID: 409147)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] দুইটি ভেক্টরের ক্ষেত্রে-

[math]\text { i. } \vec{A}+\vec{B}=\vec{B}+\vec{A}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=\vec{B} \cdot \vec{A}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\vec{B} \times \vec{A}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(i) বিনিময় সূত্র (Commutative law): [math]A.Β = Β.Α[/math]
(ii) বণ্টন সূত্র (Distributive law): [math]A. (B+C) = A.B + A.C[/math]
(iii) [math]m(A.B) = (mA).B = A. (mB) = (A.B)m,[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #572 (ID: 409136)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


ত্রিভুজে—

i. A বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

ii. B বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টরের মান [math]\sqrt{14}[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মান [math]\sqrt{8}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(iii) সঠিক নয়। কারণ [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+3 \hat{k}-2 \hat{i}[/math]
 [math]-3 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=-\hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overrightarrow{A B}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(-1)^{2}+(-1)^{2}+2^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #573 (ID: 409138)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{A}(2,7,4)[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{B}(1,2,3)[/math] দুইটি বিন্দু-

i. [math]\mathrm A[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}[/math] বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{14}}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}[/math] এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}[/math] এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]= 2[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
iii. সঠিক নয়। কারণ;[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}[/math]
 এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}|}=\frac{2+14+12}{\sqrt{1^{2}+2^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{28}{\sqrt{14}}=2 \sqrt{14}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #574 (ID: 409139)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm P[/math] বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math](1, 2, 2 )[/math] হলে, [math]P[/math] বিন্দুর —

i. অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

ii. অবস্থান ভেক্টরের মান [math]= 3[/math]

iii. অবস্থান ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর [math]\mathrm {=\frac{1}{3}(\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. ii ও iii
গ. i ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Concept: [math]|\vec{A}| 
eq 0[/math]
 এবং [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}| 
eq 0[/math]
 হলে,(i) কোনো ভেক্টরদ্বয় লম্ব হবার শর্ত, [math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]
(ii) সমান্তরাল হবার শর্ত হচ্ছে [math]|\vec{A} \times \vec{B}|=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #575 (ID: 409140)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A \cdot B=18[/math] এবং [math]|A \times B|=6 \sqrt{3}[/math] হলে [math]A[/math] ও [math]B[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটির অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]|\bar{A} \cdot \bar{B}|=18[/math]
 বা [math]A \cdot B \cos \theta=18[/math]
 [math]|\bar{A} \times \bar{B}|[/math]
 [math]=6 \sqrt{3}[/math]
 বা [math]A B \sin \theta[/math]
 [math]=6 \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \tan \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6 \sqrt{3}}{18}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore Q[/math]
 [math]=30^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #576 (ID: 409141)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {(\hat{j} \times \hat{i}) \cdot \hat{k}=}[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm i[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math](\hat{j} \times \hat{i}) \cdot \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=-\hat{k} \cdot \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #578 (ID: 409126)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Comilla Victoria Govt. College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}=3 \hat{i}-5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{q}=-\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}[/math] সামান্তরিকের দুইটি সন্নিহিত বাহু নির্দেশক ভেক্টর।

নিচের কোন ভেক্টরটি সামান্তরিকটির একটি কর্ণ নির্দেশ করবে ?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
খ. [math]4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
গ. [math]4 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:


Explanation:

Question #580 (ID: 409129)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: National Ideal School & college, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]ABCD[/math] সামান্তরিকের [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{A D}=\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}|=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{13}[/math]
গ. [math]9[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}=(2+0) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+(-3+1) \hat{\mathrm{k}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\therefore|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}|=\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+(-2)^{2}}=3\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #581 (ID: 409134)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+4 \hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] একটি ভেক্টর হলে—

i. [math]A[/math] এর উপর x-অক্ষের অভিক্ষেপ [math]\frac{3}{5}[/math]

ii. y-অক্ষ বরাবর উপাংশ [math]\frac{4}{5}(3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j})[/math]

iii. ভেক্টরটির দিকে একক ভেক্টর [math]\frac{1}{5}(3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}})[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
i ও iii

Explanation:

Question #582 (ID: 409118)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Find a unit vector normal to the plane } \mathrm{ABC} \text { as shown in the figure given below. Note that a vector normal }[/math] [math]\text { to the plane will be perpendicular to any two of } A B, A C \text { and } B C \text { vectors. }[/math]


[Image]


Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}(\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\hat{i}+\hat{k})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
Let, a normal vector on the plane be [math]x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k}[/math]
 This is perpendicular to [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}} \text { and } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}} \text {. }[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{A B}[/math]
 [math]\cdot(x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\hat{i}-\hat{k})(x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=z[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{B C} \cdot(x \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(-\hat{i}+\hat{j}) \cdot(x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow x=y \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=y=z[/math]
 [math]\text { So the unit vector normal to the surface is }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x \hat{i}+y \hat{i}+z \bar{k}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x(i+j+\hat{k})}{\sqrt{3 x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #583 (ID: 409119)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে [math]2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}, 2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{k}+\hat{j}, \hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর তিনটি একই সমতলে অবস্থিত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
একই সমতলে হলে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}2 & a & 2 \\2 & 3 & 1 \\1 & 1 & 1\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 2(3-1)+a(1-2)+2(2-3)=0\\\Rightarrow 4-a-2=0\\\Rightarrow 2-a=0\\\therefore a=2\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #584 (ID: 409120)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{a}=3 \hat{i}+\lambda \hat{j}-3 \hat{k},[/math] [math]\vec{b}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{c}=2 \hat{i}+3[/math] [math]\hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math] [math]\vec{a}, \vec{b}[/math] ও [math]\vec{c}[/math] ভেক্টরত্রয় সমতলীয় হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{9}{13}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{13}{9}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{13}{9}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{9}{13}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}3 & \lambda & -3 \\3 & -1 & -1 \\2 & 3 & -5\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3(5+3)-\lambda(-15+2)[/math]
 [math]-3(9+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 24+13 \lambda-33=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lambda[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{13}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #585 (ID: 409121)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {O(0,0,0), A(1,2,3)}[/math] ও [math]B(-3,-2,-1)[/math] হলে —

i. [math]B[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]-3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{O A}[/math] এর [math]\sqrt{14}[/math] মানের ভেক্টর [math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}=-4 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}[/math]
 [math]=(1+3)[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+(2+2) \hat{\mathrm{j}}+(3+1) \mathrm{k}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (a) }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #586 (ID: 409122)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-a \hat{\mathbf{k}}, 2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর তিনটি সমতলীয় হলে, a এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{4}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ভেক্টর তিনটি সমতলীয় হলে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{lrr}1 & 1 & -a \\2 & -1 & 3 \\-1 & 2 & -1\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1(1-6)[/math]
 [math]-1(-2+3)-a(4-1)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 5-1-3 a=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 a=-6[/math]
\therefore a=-2$

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #587 (ID: 409123)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\overrightarrow{O P}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}, \overrightarrow{O Q}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}|=[/math] কত একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{20}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{40}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{56}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{88}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{P Q}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{O Q}-\overrightarrow{O P}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}-2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overrightarrow{P Q}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2^{2}+(-6)^{2}+4^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{56}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #588 (ID: 409108)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}},[/math] [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\mathbf{a}[/math] [math]\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর তিনটি একই সমতলে অবস্থিত হলে ধ্রুবক a এর মান কত?

Options:
A. $-2
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ভেক্টরত্রয় একই সমতলে অবস্থিত হলে [math]\left|\begin{array}{rrr}1 & 1 & -1 \\1 & -1 & 1 \\-1 & 1 & a\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 হবে[math]\Rightarrow 1(-a-1)[/math]
 [math]-1(a+1)-1(1-1)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-a-1-a-1[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]a=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #589 (ID: 409109)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}, \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\mathbf{a} \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর তিনটি একই সমতলে অবস্থিত হলে ধ্রুবক [math]a[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ভেক্টরত্রয় একই সমতলে অবস্থিত হলে [math]\left|\begin{array}{rrr}1 & 1 & -1 \\1 & -1 & 1 \\-1 & 1 & a\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 হবে ।[math]\Rightarrow 1(-\mathrm{a}-1)[/math]
 [math]-1(\mathrm{a}+1)-1(1-1)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\mathrm{a}-1-\mathrm{a}-1[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{a}=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #590 (ID: 409110)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}[/math] ও [math]\vec{B}[/math] দুইটি ভেক্টরের ক্ষেত্রে-

[math]\text { i. } \vec{A}+\vec{B}=\vec{B}+\vec{A}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=\vec{B} \cdot \vec{A}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\vec{B} \times \vec{A}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. iI ও iIi
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(i) বিনিময় সূত্র (Commutative law): [math]Α.Β = Β.Α[/math]
(ii) বণ্টন সূত্র (Distributive law): [math]A. (B + C) = Α.Β + A.C[/math]
(iii) [math]m(A.B) = (mA).[/math]
 [math]B = A. (mB) = (A.B)m[/math]
, যেখানে [math]m[/math]
 একটি।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #591 (ID: 409111)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]Q(2,3,-1)[/math] এবং [math]P(4,-3,2)[/math] হলে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}|=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. 3
B. 4
C. 7
D. 12


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
Q বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{O Q}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{k}[/math]
P বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{O P}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{P Q}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{O Q}-\overrightarrow{O P}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{\mathrm{k}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overrightarrow{P Q}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+36+9}[/math]
 [math]=7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সামান্তরিকের দুইটি সন্নিহিত বাহু [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}[/math] হলে উহার প্রধান কর্ণের দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. [math]|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]
গ. [math]|\vec{P} \times \vec{Q}|[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}|\vec{P} \times \vec{Q}|[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
সামন্তরিকের প্রধান কর্ণের দৈর্ঘ্য [math]=|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]

Explanation:

Question #593 (ID: 409113)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি [math]Z[/math] অক্ষের সাথে যে কোণ উৎপন্ন করে-

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{6}{7}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{7}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:

Question #594 (ID: 409114)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}, \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]4 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\lambda \hat{k}[/math] - ভেক্টর তিনটি সমতলীয় হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]-3 / 5[/math]
B. [math]3 / 5[/math]
C. [math]2 / 7[/math]
D. [math]-2 / 7[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}2 & -1 & 1 \\1 & 2 & -3 \\4 & -1 & \lambda\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=2(2 \lambda-3)[/math]
 [math]+1(\lambda+12)+1(-1-8)[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #595 (ID: 409115)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
‘a' এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}+3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{j}}+4 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}},[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}[/math] [math]+4 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{j}}+a \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]\cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}=a \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}[/math] [math]+7 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{j}}+9 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] সমতলীয় হবে?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]-5[/math]
E. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
সমতলীয় হবে যদি [math]\vec{A} \cdot(\vec{B} \times \vec{C})=0[/math]
 হয়[math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}2 & 3 & 4 \\3 & 4 & a \\a & 7 & 9\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=2(36-7 a)+3\left(a^{2}-27\right)+4(21-4 a)[/math]
 [math]=3 a^{2}-30 a+75=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}-10 a+25[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(a-5)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #596 (ID: 409117)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}, 3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+a \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরত্রয় একই সমতলে থাকবে?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}2 & 1 & -1 \\3 & -2 & 4 \\1 & -3 & a\end{array}\right|=0 \therefore a=5[/math]

Explanation:

Correct Answer: ঘ

Question #598 (ID: 409008)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]XOZ[/math] তলের সমান্তরাল এবং [math]3 \underline{i}-\mathrm{j}+4 \underline{k}[/math] ভেক্টরের সাথে লম্ব একক ভেক্টরটি হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]4 \underline{i}-3 \underline{k}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{5}(4 \underline{i}-3 \underline{k})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{5}(3 \underline{i}-4 \underline{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\underline{j}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]XOZ[/math]
 তলের সমান্তরাল [math]\therefore \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 উপাংশ থাকবে [math]\therefore[/math]
 লম্ব সেহেতু ডট গুণফল শূন্য[math]\therefore \text { (b) option }[/math]
 গ্রহণযোগ্য। [math][\because[/math]
 লম্ব একক [math]vector[/math]
, সেহেতু [math](b)][/math]
 [math]\text { Alternate: XOZ }[/math]
 তলের সমান্তরাল। [math]\therefore \mathrm{y}[/math]
 অক্ষের উপর লম্ব ।তাহলে [math]\vec{\eta}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\0 & 1 & 0 \\3 & -1 & 4\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \hat{\eta}=\frac{1}{5}[/math]
 [math](4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:

Question #599 (ID: 409009)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{j}}[/math] ও [math]\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]80^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{A B}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=120^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #600 (ID: 409010)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\alpha[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{\imath}-2 \hat{\jmath}+k[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{\imath}-\alpha \hat{\jmath}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে ?

Options:
A. 1 অথবা -2
B. 1 অথবা 2
C. -1 অথবা 3
D. 1 অথবা -3


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\vec{A}=\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+\hat{k} \quad \vec{B}[/math]
 [math]=2 \alpha \hat{i}-4 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\vec{A} \perp \vec{B}[/math]
 হলে [math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}[/math]
 [math]=0 \quad 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #601 (ID: 409011)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{j}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ও [math]\vec{B}=2 \vec{\imath}+10 \vec{\jmath}-11 \vec{k}[/math] দ্বারা গঠিত সমতলের উপর একক লম্ব ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{29}}(2 \vec{\imath}+3 \vec{\jmath}+4 \vec{k})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{29}}(2 \vec{\imath}+3 \vec{\jmath}+4 \vec{k})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{29}}(4 \vec{\imath}+3 \vec{\jmath}+2 \vec{k})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{29}}(-4 \vec{\imath}+3 \vec{\jmath}+2 \vec{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\vec{A}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\vec{k} \vec{B}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+10 \hat{j}-11 k ;[/math]
 [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}=-32 \hat{i}+24[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+16 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 একক লম্ব ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \times \vec{B}}{|\vec{A} \times \vec{B}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{29}}[/math]
 [math](-4 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:

Question #602 (ID: 409013)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](3, 2, 1)[/math] এবং [math](4, 1, −2)[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার ভেক্টর সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](3+t) \hat{i}+(2-t) \hat{j}+(1-3 t) \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math](3+4 t) \hat{i}+(2+t) \hat{j}+(1-2 t) \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math](3-4 t) \hat{i}+(2-t) \hat{j}+(1+2 t) \hat{k}[/math]
ঘ. [math](4-3 t) \hat{i}+(1-2 t) \hat{j}+(-2-t) \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]r =a+t(b-a)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})+t\{(4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]-(3 \hat{i}+2[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+\hat{k})\}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 \hat{i}[/math]
 [math]+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]+t(\hat{i}-\hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (3+t)[/math]
 [math]\hat{i}[/math]
 [math]+(2-t) \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+(1-3 t) \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #603 (ID: 408726)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](– 4, 3, 0)[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর হলে—

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \overrightarrow{\mathbf{r}}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}\\\text{ii. } |\vec{r}|=5^{\prime}\end{array}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \vec{r}, z[/math] অক্ষের উপর লম্ব

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
এখানে, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{R}}=-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\vec{R}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(-4)^{2}+3^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=5[/math]
যেহেতু, ভেক্টরটি [math]XY[/math]
 তলের উপর অবস্থিত, সেহেতু প্রদত্ত ভেক্টরটি [math]Z[/math]
 - অক্ষের উপর লম্ব হবে।

Explanation:

Question #604 (ID: 408727)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]b=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে নিম্নের কোনটি সত্য?

Options:
A. [math]a \cdot b=0[/math]
B. [math]a \wedge b=0[/math]
C. [math](a+b) \cdot(a-b)=0[/math]
D. [math](a+b) \wedge(a-b)=0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](a+b) \cdot(a-b)=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]a+b=4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}, a-b[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(a+b) \cdot(a-b)[/math]
 [math]=-8+3+5[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #605 (ID: 408728)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Find the vector equation of the line that passes through the points } A(3,4,1) \text {, and } B(2,-3,5) \text { crosses } x y[/math] [math]\text { plane. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\frac{7}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{17}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
B. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\frac{23}{5} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{13}{5} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
C. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\frac{13}{5} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{23}{5} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
D. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\frac{17}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{7}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\frac{13}{5} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{23}{5} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]r=a+\lambda b=(3 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+k)[/math]
 [math]+\lambda(2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=(3+2 \lambda) \hat{i}+(4-3 \lambda) \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+(1+5 \lambda) \hat{k} \because \text { crosses } x y \text { plane }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1+5 \lambda[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{r}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{5} \hat{i}+\frac{23}{5} \hat{j}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #607 (ID: 408730)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P(1,1,1)[/math] এবং [math]Q(2,3,−2)[/math] দুইটি বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক ও মূল বিন্দু [math]O(0,0,0)[/math] হলে, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math] ভেক্টর নির্ণয় কর?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
গ. [math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{P Q}[/math]
 [math]=(2-1) \hat{i}+(3-1)[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+(-2-1) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=1 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #609 (ID: 408733)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি একটি একক ভেক্টর a X-অক্ষ ও Y-অক্ষের সাথে যথাক্রমে [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math] ও [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তাহলে z-অক্ষের উৎপন্ন সূক্ষ্মকোণের পরিমাণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{10}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]

Solution:
কোন একক ভেক্টর অক্ষত্রয়ের সাথে [math]\theta_{x}, \theta_{y}[/math]
 ও [math]\theta_{z}[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করলে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\cos ^{2} \theta_{x}+\cos ^{2} \theta_{y}+\cos ^{2} \theta_{z}=1 \\\Rightarrow \cos ^{2} \frac{\pi}{3}+\cos ^{2} \frac{\pi}{4}+\cos ^{2} \theta_{z}=1 \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{2}+\cos ^{2} \theta_{z}=1 \\\Rightarrow \cos ^{2} \theta_{z}=1-\frac{3}{4}=\frac{1}{4} \\\Rightarrow \cos \theta_{z}=\frac{1}{2} \\\therefore \theta_{z}=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{2}=\frac{\pi}{3}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #610 (ID: 408734)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ঘনবস্তুর ধারগুলো যথাক্রমে [math]5 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}, 2 \hat{i}-7 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{k}-7 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math] হলে এর আয়তন কত?

Options:
A. [math]520[/math]
B. [math]506[/math]
C. [math]96[/math]
D. [math]48[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]506[/math]

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}5 & 3 & -6 \\2 & -7 & -1 \\-7 & 2 & -5\end{array}\right|=506[/math] ঘন একক

Question #611 (ID: 408735)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A+B=A-B[/math] হলে [math]A[/math] ও [math]B[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A+B=A-B[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (A+B) \cdot(A+B)[/math]
 [math]=(A-B) \cdot(A-B)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow A^{2}+B^{2}+2 A \cdot B[/math]
 [math]=A^{2}+B^{2}-2 A \cdot B[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 A \cdot B=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathbf{A}[/math]
 ও [math]B[/math]
 পরস্পর লম্ব।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Question #613 (ID: 408622)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{A B C}[/math] ত্রিভুজের [math]\mathrm{BC}, \mathrm{C A}, \mathrm{A B}[/math] বাহুগুলির মধ্যবিন্দু যথাক্রমে [math]\mathrm{D}, \mathrm{E}, \mathrm{F}[/math] হলে; নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{BE}}[/math]
B. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
C. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{CF}}[/math]
D. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{CD}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BD}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{CD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BD}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BD}} 2(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}})[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}[/math]
 [math]\text { Shorteut } 2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}, \Rightarrow 2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{2 \mathrm{AF}}[/math]
 [math]+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #614 (ID: 408623)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x-1}{2}=\frac{y-2}{3}=\frac{z+3}{4}[/math] এর ভেক্টর সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]r=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}+t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math]\underline{r}=-\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}+t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]
গ. [math]\underline{r}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}+t(-\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbf{r}=-2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}+t(\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]r=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}+t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{x-1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-2}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{z+3}{4}=t[/math]
 ধরি[math]\therefore x=2 t+1, y[/math]
 [math]=3 t+2,[/math]
 [math]z=4 t-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \underline r[/math]
 [math]=x \hat{i}[/math]
 [math]+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=(2 t+1) \hat{i}+(3 t+2) \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+(4 t-3) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]+[/math]
 [math]t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #615 (ID: 408620)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](2, 3, 4)[/math] এবং [math](–5, 1, 7)[/math] বিন্দুগামী রেখার সমীকরণ—

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \mathrm{r}=(1-t)(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})+\mathrm{t}(-5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}})\\\text{ii. } \quad \mathrm{r}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}+t(7 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})\\\text{iii. } \frac{x-2}{-7}=\frac{y-3}{-2}=\frac{z-4}{3}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]
ধরি, একটি সরলরেখা P বিন্দুগামী এবং b ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল। এই শর্তে কেবলমাত্র একটি সরলরেখাই সম্ভব।যেহেতু [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটি b ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল, সুতরাং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}=\mathrm{tb}[/math]
, যেখানে t একটি স্কেলার। b ভেক্টরটিকে সরলরেখাটির নির্দেশক ভেক্টর বলা হয়। P বিন্দুটির অবস্থান ভেক্টর a এবং সরলরেখাটির উপর যেকোন বিন্দু Qএর অবস্থান ভেক্টর r হলে, ত্রিভুজ OPQ হতে, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math]
 বা, [math]\mathbf{r}=\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{t} \mathbf{b}[/math]
সূত্র: একটি নির্দিষ্ট বিন্দুগামী যার অবস্থান ভেক্টর a এবং অপর একটি ভেক্টর b এর সমান্তরাল সরলরেখার ভেক্টরসমীকরণ: [math]\mathbf{r}=\mathbf{a}+\mathrm{t} \mathbf{b}[/math]
 যেখানে। একটি স্কেলার পরামিতি।t এর ভিন্ন ভিন্ন মানের জন্য সরলরেখাটির উপর বিভিন্ন বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর পাওয়া যাবে

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #616 (ID: 408621)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](−2, 1, 3)[/math] এবং [math](1, 2, −2)[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার কার্তেসীয় সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x+2}{3}=\frac{y-1}{1}=\frac{z-3}{-5}[/math]
খ. [math]x-2=\frac{y+1}{2}=\frac{\dot{z}+3}{-2}[/math]
গ. [math]x+2=\frac{y+1}{-2}=\frac{z+3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-2=\frac{y-1}{2}=\frac{z-3}{-2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{x+2}{3}=\frac{y-1}{1}=\frac{z-3}{-5}[/math]

Solution:
[math](-2, 1, 3)[/math]
 এবং [math](1, 2, 2 )[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার কার্তেসীয় সমীকরণ,[math]\frac{x-(-2)}{1-(-2)}=\frac{y-1}{2-1}=\frac{z-3}{-2-3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{x+2}{3}=\frac{y-1}{1}=\frac{z-3}{-5}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #618 (ID: 408618)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{c}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি [math]\vec{b}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{c}}[/math] ভেক্টরটির সাথে যথাক্রমে [math]\alpha[/math] ও [math]\theta[/math] কোণে আনত হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}} \cos \alpha=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\vec{c} \cos \theta[/math]
B. [math]\vec{c} \sin \theta[/math]
C. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{c}} \sin \alpha[/math]
D. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{c}} \cos \alpha[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\vec{c} \cos \theta[/math]

Solution:
চিত্র হতে পাই,[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}+\mathrm{b} \cos \alpha|[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{a}-\mathrm{b} \cos \alpha=\mathrm{c} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}} \cos \alpha[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{c}} \cos \theta[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:

Question #619 (ID: 408617)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]ABC[/math] ত্রিভুজের [math]BC, CA[/math] ও [math]AB[/math] বাহুর মধ্যবিন্দুগুলো যথাক্রমে [math]D, E[/math] ও [math]F[/math] হলে-

Options:
ক. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}[/math]
খ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}[/math]
গ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BE}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{CF}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]D, BC[/math]
 বাহুর মধ্যবিন্দু বলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\frac{1}{2}(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}) \Rightarrow \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}[/math]

[Image]

Question #620 (ID: 408614)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুইটি সমান বল P লব্ধি P হলে বল দুইটির মধ্যকার কোণ কত ডিগ্রি?

Options:
ক. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]120^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]=\alpha[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{P}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{P}^{2}+2 \text { 2.P.P } \cos \alpha[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{P}^{2} \cos \alpha[/math]
 [math]=-\mathrm{P}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos \alpha[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}=\cos 120^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha=120^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #621 (ID: 408615)

Question:
[math]A B C D[/math] সামান্তরিকে [math]A[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]B[/math] ও [math]D[/math] এর অবস্থান ভেক্টর যথাক্রমে [math]\underline{\mathrm{a}}[/math] ও [math]\underline{\mathrm{b}}[/math] হলে, [math]M, BD[/math] এর মধ্যবিন্দু হলে, [math]A[/math] বিন্দুর সাপেক্ষে [math]M[/math] এর অবস্থান ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](\underline {a}+\underline{b})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{4}(\underline a+\underline{b})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\underline a+\underline b)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{6}(\underline a+\underline b)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}(\underline a+\underline b)[/math]

Solution:
[math]M, BD[/math]
 এর মধ্যবিন্দু হলে, [math]M[/math]
 এর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{1}{2}(\underline a+\underline b)[/math]

Question #623 (ID: 408420)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:


[Image]


[math]CD[/math] এর দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. [math]7 \sqrt{2}[/math]
খ. [math]49 \sqrt{38}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{7}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{49}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{49}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
 [math]=(8 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})-(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-10 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
এখন [math]\mathrm{CD}[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}|[/math]
 [math]\cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{A C} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}||\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{CD}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}}{\vec{\rightarrow}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{48+20+30}{\sqrt{6^{2}+(-4)^{2}+(-10)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{98}{\sqrt{152}}=\frac{49}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #624 (ID: 408421)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathbf{a}=\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{b}=\lambda \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

a ভেক্টরটি z-অক্ষের সাথে কত কোণ উৎপন্ন করে।

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{\sqrt{13}}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{\sqrt{19}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{\sqrt{21}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\sqrt{\frac{2}{21}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{\sqrt{21}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{a. } \hat{\mathrm{k}}=|\mathbf{a}| \cdot|\hat{\mathbf{k}}| \cos \theta\\\Rightarrow -2=\sqrt{i^{2}+4^{2}+(-2)^{2}} \cdot 1 \cdot \cos \theta\\\Rightarrow \cos \theta=\frac{-2}{\sqrt{1+16+4}}\\\Rightarrow \theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{\sqrt{21}}\right)\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #625 (ID: 408423)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]A(2,1,0)[/math] এবং [math]\text { B }(-3,2,4)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]-\hat{i}-\hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math]
B. [math]5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
C. [math]5 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]
D. [math]-5 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-5 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{A B}=\mathbf{B}-\mathbf{A}[/math]
 [math]=-3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+4[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}-2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}[/math]
 [math]=-5 \hat{i}+\hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+4 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #626 (ID: 408425)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\vec{a}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+p \hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হয়, তাদের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]90°[/math] হলে [math]p[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
শর্তমতে, [math]\mathbf{a} \cdot \mathbf{b}=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow { (3) (1) } +(-2) p+(-1)(2)=0\\\Rightarrow 3-2 p-2=0\\\therefore p=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math](\vec{A}-\vec{B}) \cdot(\vec{A}+\vec{B})=?[/math]

B. 2
C. 0
D. [math]-5[/math]

 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}} ; \mathbf{A}+\mathbf{B}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\mathbf{A}[/math]
 [math]-\mathbf{B}) \cdot(\mathbf{A}+\mathbf{B})[/math]
 [math]=0.2+2 \cdot 0+(-2) \cdot 0=0[/math]

Question #630 (ID: 408430)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}|=3[/math] এবং [math]\vec{P} \cdot \vec{Q}=8[/math] হলে [math](\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}+\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}) \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]17[/math]
B. [math]21[/math]
C. [math]24[/math]
D. [math]33[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math](\mathbf{P}+\mathbf{Q}) \cdot \mathbf{P}[/math]
 [math]=\mathbf{P} \cdot \mathbf{P}+\mathbf{Q} \cdot \mathbf{P}[/math]
 [math]=|\mathbf{P}|^{2}+8[/math]
 [math]=9+8[/math]
 [math]=17[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #631 (ID: 408431)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ও [math]\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\mathbf{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{(\hat{i}+\hat{j}) \cdot(\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k})}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}} \cdot \sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}+1^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1-1}{\sqrt{2} \sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \cos \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #632 (ID: 408432)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=-\hat{i}+\hat{j}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=\hat{i}+\hat{j}[/math] হলে-

i. এদের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

ii. [math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]

iii. [math](\vec{A}+\vec{B}) \cdot(\vec{A}-\vec{B})=0[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
i, ii ও iii

Explanation:

Question #633 (ID: 408433)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{F}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{d}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

কাজের পরিমাণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-11[/math]
খ. [math]11[/math]
গ. [math]10[/math]
ঘ. [math]20[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-11[/math]

Solution:
[math]W=F \cdot d[/math]
 [math]=(3 \times 2)[/math]
 [math]+(-2) 1+5(-3)[/math]
 [math]=6-2-15[/math]
 [math]=-11[/math]


Explanation:

Question #638 (ID: 408438)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lambda[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\because[/math]
 প্রদত্ত ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব।[math]\therefore 2 \times 1+\lambda(-2)+1[/math]
 [math]\times 3=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \lambda=-5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #640 (ID: 408440)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x-অক্ষের সাথে [math]\mathrm{\theta}[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করলে [math]\cos \theta=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2}{9}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{9}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
x অক্ষ বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটি x অক্ষের সাথে [math]\theta[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করলে[math]\cos \theta=\frac{-2.1+0-0}{\sqrt{(-2)^{2}+2^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}=\frac{-2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #641 (ID: 408441)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ও [math]\vec{B}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]60^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{(2 \times 3)+(2 x-2)+(-3 x-1)}{\sqrt{4+1+9} \sqrt{9+4+1}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{7}{\sqrt{14} \sqrt{14}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=60^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #642 (ID: 408443)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P=9 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]Q=4 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+a \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর লম্ব। [math]\mathrm a[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
লম্ব হয়ে [math](9 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-6 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(9 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+a \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore 36-6-6 a[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=5[/math]


Explanation:

Question #645 (ID: 408446)

Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathbf{A}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ও [math]B=6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] [math]\overline{\mathrm {B}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি অক্ষের সাথে নিচের কোন কোণটি উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{3}{49}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{49}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta =\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{(6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}) \cdot \hat{j}}{|6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{b}|}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{-3}{7}[/math]


Explanation:

A. [math]49[/math]
B. [math]31[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-7[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]7[/math]

Solution:

 [math]=\sqrt{9+4+36}[/math]
 [math]=7 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (c) }[/math]

Question #647 (ID: 408448)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\mathbf{a} \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ও [math]-4 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হলে a এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]-5[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-5[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হলে,[math](2 \hat{i}+a \hat{j}-\hat{k}) \cdot(-4 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})=0[/math]
 হবে[math]\Rightarrow -8-2 a-2=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #648 (ID: 408449)

Question:

Options:
A. [math]11[/math]
B. [math]7[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
[math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) \cdot(3 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=6+3-2=7[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (b) }[/math]

Question #652 (ID: 408453)

Question:
[math](– 4, 3, 0)[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{r}}[/math] হলে—

i. [math]\vec{r}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}[/math]

ii. [math]|\vec{r}|=5[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}, \mathrm{z}[/math] অক্ষের উপর লম্ব

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}++3 \hat{\mathrm{j}} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (c) }[/math]

Question #653 (ID: 408454)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}, \vec{B}=\hat{i}-\hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
B. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+10 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
C. [math]-\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-10 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
D. [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-24 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-10 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

Question #658 (ID: 408459)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: নীলফামারী সরকারি মহিলা কলেজের
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=\hat{i}+\hat{k}, \vec{b}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=(\hat{i}+\hat{k}) \cdot(3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{k})=3-2=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #663 (ID: 408419)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:


[Image]


a এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-4[/math]
খ. [math]-3[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-3[/math]

Solution:
[math](8 \times 2)+(-5 \times-1)[/math]
 [math]+(a \times 7)=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 16+5+7 a=0 \\\Rightarrow a=-3\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #664 (ID: 408407)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]|\vec{a}|=3,|\vec{b}|=5[/math] এবং [math]|\vec{a}-\vec{b}|=7[/math] হয় তবে [math]\vec{a}[/math] ও [math]\vec{b}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটির মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]220^{\circ}[/math]
ঙ. [math]135^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]120^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:

[Image]
[math]|\vec{a}|=3,|\vec{b}|[/math]
 [math]=5 ;|\vec{a}-\vec{b}|[/math]
 [math]=7 ; 7^{2}=5^{2}+3^{2}+2.5 .3(0)[/math]
 [math](\pi-\alpha) \therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=120^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #666 (ID: 408409)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2010-2011, 2010-2011, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Textiles, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overline{\mathrm{u}}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overline{\mathrm{v}}=\lambda \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হয়, হবে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{13}{4}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{13}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]4 \lambda-4-9=0,4 \lambda=13 \Rightarrow \lambda=\frac{13}{4}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #667 (ID: 408410)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
The component of the vector [math]\vec{B}[/math] [math]=5 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] along the vector [math]\vec{A}[/math] [math]=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k} \text { will be- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\vec{B}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=|\vec{B}| \cdot \frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}||\vec{B}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5.2-3.1-2.2}{\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{3}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #668 (ID: 408411)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]F=3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] বলের ক্রিয়ার দ্বারা সরণ [math]S=5 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে কাজের পরিমাণ কত একক?

Options:
ক. [math]23[/math]
খ. [math]24[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]26[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]23[/math]

Solution:
একটি কণার ওপর [math]F[/math]
 বল প্রয়োগে [math]S[/math]
 সরণ হলে প্রযুক্ত বলটি দ্বারা কাজের পরিমাণ হবে[math]\mathbf{F} S=(3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(5 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=15+6+2[/math]
 [math]=23[/math]


Explanation:
