Question #669 (ID: 408412)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x-অক্ষের সাথে কত কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-6}{7}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{7}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]

Solution:
উৎপন্ন কোণ [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{\sqrt{3^{2}+(-6)^{2}+2^{2}}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #670 (ID: 408413)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-a \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]y=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর। a এর মান কত হলে ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-6[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]6[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টরদ্বয় লম্ব হবে যদি ডট গুণন শূন্য হয়।[math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \mathbf{x} \cdot \mathrm{y}=12-6-\mathrm{a} \\\Rightarrow 12-6-\mathrm{a}=0 \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{a}=12-6 \\\therefore \mathrm{a}=6\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #671 (ID: 408414)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\lambda \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের লব্ধি বরাবর একক ভেক্টর ও [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের স্কেলার গুণফল [math]1[/math] হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
লব্ধি ভেক্টর [math]=(2+\lambda) \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
শর্তমতে, [math]\frac{(2+\lambda) \hat{i}+6 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{(2+\lambda)^{2}+6^{2}+(-2)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (\lambda+6)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=(\lambda+2)^{2}+40[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=1 \text{.}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #672 (ID: 408415)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]b=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]a + b[/math] ও [math]a - b[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের লম্ব বরাবর একক ভেক্টর নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mp \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}} \mp \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \mp \frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}} \pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \mp \frac{1}{3} \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}} \pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \pm \frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}} \mp \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \mp \frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}} \mp \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \mp \frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}=4 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}[/math]
 এবং [math]\mathbf{a}-\mathbf{b}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}) \times(\mathbf{a}-\mathbf{b})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left|\begin{array}{lll}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\4 & 4 & 0 \\2 & 0 & 4\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 16 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-16 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-8 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow |(a+b) \times(a-b)|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{576}[/math]
 [math]=24 \text{.}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 একক ভেক্টর [math]= \pm \frac{16 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-16 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-8 \hat{\mathrm{k}}}{24}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #673 (ID: 408416)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k},[/math] [math]b=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+7 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{c}[/math] [math]=2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+4 \hat{k} \mid d[/math] ভেক্টর [math]a[/math] ও [math]b[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর লম্ব এবং [math]c . d=15[/math] হলে, [math]d[/math] ভেক্টর নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}(160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}(-160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}(160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}(160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{3}(160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\mathbf{d}=\lambda(\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b})[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathbf{d}=\lambda\left|\begin{array}{rrr}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\mathrm{I} & 4 & 2 \\3 & -2 & 7\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\lambda(32 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-14 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
আবার, [math]\mathbf{c} \cdot \mathbf{d}[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) \cdot \lambda(32 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-14 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=15 \\\Rightarrow 9 \lambda=15 \Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=\frac{15}{9}=\frac{5}{3}[/math]
 [math]\\\therefore \mathbf{d}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{3}(32 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-14 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #674 (ID: 408417)

Question:
[math]A(2,-3,-1)[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর a হলে—

i. [math]a=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

ii. [math]|\mathrm{a}|=\sqrt{14}[/math]

iii. x অক্ষের সাথে উৎপন্ন কোণ [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{14}}\right)[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
i, ii ও iii

Question #675 (ID: 408418)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathrm{A}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-4 \hat{k}, \mathrm{B}=-2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]C=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] তিনটি ভেক্টর ।

[math]C[/math] ভেক্টরটি y-অক্ষের সাথে কত কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]C[/math]
 ভেক্টর ও y-অক্ষের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\theta[/math]
 হলে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\cos \theta=\frac{C \cdot \hat{j}}{|C||\hat{j}|}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}} \\\therefore \theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}\right)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #676 (ID: 408352)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a-[/math]এর মান কত হলে [math]a \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat k[/math] এবং [math]2 a \hat{i}-a \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. [math]1,2[/math]
B. [math]-1,-2[/math]
C. [math]2,-1[/math]
D. [math]-2,1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-2,1[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 a^{2}+2 a-4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+a-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+2 a-a-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a(a+2)-1(a+2)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(a+2)(a-1)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #677 (ID: 408353)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি ভেক্টর পরস্পর লম্ব হওয়ার শর্ত কি?

Options:
ক. তাদের ডট গুণন শূন্য হয়
খ. তাদের ক্রস গুণন শূন্য হয়
গ. তাদের ডট গুণন এক হয়
ঘ. তাদের ক্রস গুণন এক হয়


Correct Answer: A.তাদের ডট গুণন শূন্য হয়

Solution:
[math]\bar{A} \cdot \bar{B}=0[/math]
 হলে [math]\mathrm{AB} \cos \theta=0 \Rightarrow \cos \theta=0 \Rightarrow \theta=90^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #678 (ID: 408354)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x-অক্ষের সাথে কত ডিগ্রী কোণ তৈরি করে?

Options:
ক. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]45^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}, \mathrm{A}_{\mathrm{x}}=2[/math]
 [math]\cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{A_{X}}{|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{2^{2}+2^{2}}}=\frac{2}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=45^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #679 (ID: 408356)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
অক্ষত্রয়ের সাথে উৎপন্ন কোণগুলি যথাক্রমে [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}\right), \cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{6}}\right)[/math] ও [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{6}}\right)[/math] হলে, তা নিচের কোন ভেক্টরের জন্য সত্য

Options:
ক. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
খ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
গ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

Solution:
কোণগুলো অনুযায়ী ভেক্টরটি হবে [math](2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-\hat{k}) \times r[/math]
 যেখানে [math]r[/math]
 হল অশূন্য ধ্রুবক । [math]r = 2[/math]
 হলে [math]4 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #680 (ID: 408357)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
অন্তর্ভূক্ত কোণের মান [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2 \sqrt{7}}\right)[/math] হলে তা নিচের কোন ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের জন্য সত্য?

Options:
ক. [math](2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] এবং [math](\hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] এবং [math](\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k})[/math]
গ. [math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] এবং [math](\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] এবং [math](\hat{i}-4 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] এবং [math](\hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math](2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=2-12-3=-13[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{4+9+1}[/math]
 [math]\times \sqrt{1+16+9}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=-13[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2 \sqrt{7}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{39}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\sqrt{\frac{-1}{39}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{36}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2-3}{\sqrt{13} \times \sqrt{3}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}\right)[/math]

Question #682 (ID: 408360)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}, \vec{B}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{A}+2 \vec{B}[/math] এর অন্তঃস্থ কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{31}{50}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{31}{30}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{31}{50}[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{31}{30}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{31}{50}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{(2 \vec{A}+\vec{B}) \cdot(\vec{A}+2 \vec{B})}{|2 \vec{A}+\vec{B}| \cdot|\vec{A}+2 \vec{B}|}\right][/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{31}{50}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #683 (ID: 408361)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\underline{P}=4 \underline{i}-2 j+4 \underline{k}[/math] এবং [math]\underline{Q}=4 \underline{i}-2 \underline{j}-\underline{k}[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\underline{P}[/math] এবং [math]\underline{Q}[/math] মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{5 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{8 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]
E. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\vec{P}, \vec{Q}}{\overrightarrow{P Q}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #684 (ID: 408362)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
Points [math]\vec{A} \text { and } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] lieon a straight line [math]\vec{\ell} \text { relative to a fixed origin 0. Point } \vec{A}[/math] has position vector [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{k} \text {, }[/math]

point [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] has position vector [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] and point [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}[/math] has position vector [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+p \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] with respect to 0 $

where p is a constant. Given that [math]\overrightarrow{A C}[/math] is perpendicular to [math]\vec{\ell}[/math] Find the valuc of p $

Options:
A. [math]16[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]12[/math]
D. [math]-6[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-6[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}} \text { vector: }[/math]
 [math]\hat{i}+(p+3) \hat{j}-6 \hat{k} ;[/math]
 [math]\vec{l} \text { vetor: }[/math]
 [math](-3 \hat{i}+5 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}} \cdot \vec{\ell}[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow(-3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+(\mathrm{p}+3) \hat{\mathrm{j}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-3+5 \mathrm{p}+15+18[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{p}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{30}{5}=-6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #685 (ID: 408364)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
এক বিন্দুতে লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়াশীল [math]P=2 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ও [math]Q=\sqrt{3} \hat{i}+\sqrt{3} \hat{j}+\sqrt{3} \hat{k}[/math] বলের লব্ধি [math]p[/math] বলের সাথে কত কোণ করে?

Options:
ক. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
ঙ. Question ভুল


Correct Answer: E.Question ভুল

Solution:
P ও Q এর মাঝে কোণ [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 \sqrt{3}-2 \sqrt{3}+\sqrt{3}}{3.3}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{9}\right)=78.9^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]P[/math]
 ও [math]Q[/math]
 এর মাঝে কোণ [math]78.9°[/math]
 তাই এরা লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়া করে না।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #686 (ID: 408365)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]m[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]A=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]B=m \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি লম্ব হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]9[/math]
খ. [math]19[/math]
গ. [math]-9[/math]
ঘ. [math]-19[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]9[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 m+6-24=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow m=9[/math]


Explanation:

Question #687 (ID: 408366)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]b \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+k \diamond 2 b \hat{i}-b \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হলে [math]b[/math] কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]3,-5[/math]
B. [math]-2,1[/math]
C. [math]-1,2[/math]
D. [math]5,7[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2,1[/math]

Solution:
[math](b \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+k)[/math]
 [math]\cdot(2 b \hat{i}-b \hat{j}-4 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]2 b^{2}+2 b-4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow b=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

এক বিন্দুতে লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়াশীল [math]P=2 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ও [math]Q=\sqrt{3} \hat{i}+\sqrt{3} \hat{j}+\sqrt{3} \hat{k}[/math] বলের লব্ধি [math]P[/math] বলের সাথে কত কোণ করে?

ঘ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
ঙ. No correct answer

Question #689 (ID: 408368)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি [math]z[/math]-অক্ষের ঋণাত্মক দিকের সাথে যে কোণ তার পরিমাণ কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{(2 \mathrm{\hat i}-\mathrm{\hat j}-\mathrm{\hat k}) \cdot(-\mathrm{\hat k})}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #690 (ID: 408369)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](2,3,1)[/math] ও [math](3,1, −2)[/math] ভেক্টরের স্কেলার গুণফল ও মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত ?

Options:
ক. 5 এবং 45°
খ. 2 এবং 30°
গ. 7 এবং 60°
ঘ. 3 এবং 90°


Correct Answer: C.7 এবং 60°

Solution:
স্কেলার গুণফল [math]\Rightarrow 2 \times 3+3 \times 1+1 \times(-2)=7[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #691 (ID: 408371)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\gamma[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\vec{A}=\gamma \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x – অক্ষের সাথে [math]30°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে ?

Options:
ক. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]=\cos 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\gamma}{\sqrt{\gamma^{2}+4^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{4}=\frac{\gamma}{\gamma^{2}+25}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \gamma[/math]
 [math]=5 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #692 (ID: 408372)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]5[/math] একক এবং [math]6[/math] একক মানের দুটি ভেক্টর কোন বিন্দুতে [math]60°[/math] কোণে ক্রিয়াশীল। [math]\bar{A} \cdot \bar{B}=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]15[/math]
খ. [math]20[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]35[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]\bar{A} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{B}}=\mathrm{AB} \cos \theta=15[/math]

Explanation:

Question #693 (ID: 408373)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর এবং এদের অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ [math]\theta[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}=0 \therefore \theta=90^{\circ}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #694 (ID: 408374)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2010-2011, 2002-2003, 2013-2014, 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}=2 \overline{\mathrm{i}}-\overline{\mathrm{j}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-6 \overline{\mathrm{j}}-2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\alpha=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{PQ}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3 \times 2+6-4}{3 \times 7}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #695 (ID: 408375)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]m[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]A=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]B=m \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি লম্ব হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]9[/math]
খ. [math]19[/math]
গ. [math]-9[/math]
ঘ. [math]-19[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]9[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 m+6-24=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow m=9[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #698 (ID: 408380)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{r}=\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x অক্ষের সাথে কত কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}-\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(\hat{i}) \cdot(\hat{i}+\hat{i}+\hat{k})}{\sqrt{3} \times 1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #699 (ID: 408382)

Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি [math]y[/math] অক্ষের সঙ্গে যে কোণ তৈরি করে তার মান হলো—

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math]
ঙ. No correct answer


Correct Answer: E.No correct answer

Solution:
[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\vec r \hat j\cdot}{|\vec{r}|}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{3}\right)[/math]

Question #701 (ID: 408386)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k},[/math] [math]b=\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]c=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]a \cdot b+b[/math] [math]\cdot c+c[/math] [math]\cdot a=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]a \cdot b[/math]
 [math]=2(1)+1(-1)+1[/math]
 [math]\times 1=2[/math]
 [math]\text { b. } c=1[/math]
 [math]\times 1+(-1)[/math]
 [math]\times 1+1(-1)=-1[/math]
 [math]\text { c. a }=1[/math]
 [math]\times 2+1[/math]
 [math]\times 1+(-1) \times 1=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { a.b }[/math]
 [math]+\text { b.c }+\text { c. a }[/math]
 [math]=2-1+2=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #702 (ID: 408387)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overline{\mathrm{p}}=24 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\overline{\mathrm{q}}=20 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+15 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] হলে [math](\bar{p}+\bar{q})[/math] এবং [math](\overline{\mathrm{p}}-\overline{\mathrm{q}})[/math] এর অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]20^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math]
 [math]=44 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+22 \hat{\mathrm{j}} ;[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-8 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
এখন, [math](\vec{P}+\vec{Q}) \cdot(\vec{P}-\vec{Q})[/math]
 [math]=4 \times 44-8[/math]
 [math]\times 22=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\vec{P}+\vec{Q})[/math]
 এবং [math](\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}-[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}})[/math]
 এর অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
 ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #703 (ID: 408388)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overline{\mathrm{p}}+\overline{\mathrm{q}}=\overline{\mathrm{p}}-\overline{\mathrm{q}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\overline{\mathrm{p}}[/math] এবং [math]\bar{q}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{p}+\vec{q}[/math]
 [math]=\vec{p}-\vec{q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\vec{p}+\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{p}+\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]=(\vec{p}-\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{p}-\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p^{2}+2 \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}+q^{2}[/math]
 [math]=p^{2}-2 \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}+q^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \vec{p} \perp \vec{q}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #704 (ID: 408389)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2011-2012, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি পরস্পর লম্ব হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-5}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{-5}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math](\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow 2+2 \lambda+3[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \lambda[/math]
 [math]=-5 \therefore \lambda=-\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #706 (ID: 408392)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\bar{A}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{A}+\vec{B}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{A}-\vec{B}[/math] এর অন্তর্গত কোণের মান-

Options:
A. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k} ;[/math]
 [math]\vec{B}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k} \therefore(\vec{A}+\vec{B})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{A}-\vec{B})[/math]
 [math]=-8+3+5=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\vec{A}+\vec{B})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{A}-\vec{B})=-8+3+5[/math]
 [math]=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]90°[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #707 (ID: 408393)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{B}=6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটির অন্তর্ভূক্ত কোণের [math]cosine[/math] এর অনুপাত কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{21}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{4}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{16}{21}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{16}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{4}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\mathrm{AB} \cos \theta \Rightarrow \theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{6-6-4}{\sqrt{1+4+4} \sqrt{36+9+4}}=\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{4}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #708 (ID: 408394)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2010-2011, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University, Sylhet Agricultural University, Sylhet Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{i}+\underline{j}+\underline{k}[/math] এবং [math]3 \underline{i}+3 \underline{j}-6 \underline{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{\vec{A} \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}| \vec{B} \mid}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{3+3-6}{\sqrt{3} \cdot 3 \sqrt{6}}[/math]
 [math]=90[/math]


Explanation:

Question #709 (ID: 408396)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2010-2011, 2002-2003, 2013-2014, 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}=2 \overline{\mathrm{i}}-\overline{\mathrm{j}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-6 \overline{\mathrm{j}}-2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\alpha=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{PQ}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3 \times 2+6-4}{3 \times 7}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #710 (ID: 408397)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2011-2012, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি পরস্পর লম্ব হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-5}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{-5}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math](\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow 2+2 \lambda+3[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \lambda[/math]
 [math]=-5 \therefore \lambda=-\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #711 (ID: 408399)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{B}=6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটির অন্তর্ভূক্ত কোণের [math]cosine[/math] এর অনুপাত কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{21}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{4}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{16}{21}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{16}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{4}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\mathrm{AB} \cos \theta \Rightarrow \theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{6-6-4}{\sqrt{1+4+4} \sqrt{36+9+4}}=\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{4}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #712 (ID: 408400)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2010-2011, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University, Sylhet Agricultural University, Sylhet Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{i}+\underline{j}+\underline{k}[/math] এবং [math]3 \underline{i}+3 \underline{j}-6 \underline{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{\vec{A} \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}| \vec{B} \mid}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{3+3-6}{\sqrt{3} \cdot 3 \sqrt{6}}[/math]
 [math]=90[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #713 (ID: 408401)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি [math]z[/math] অক্ষের সহিত যে কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তা কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos \theta=\frac{(2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}) \cdot \hat{k}}{|2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}|} \because \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #714 (ID: 408402)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Against which axis does the vector } 2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k} \text { produce an angle of } \cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{3}\right) \text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x \text {-axis }[/math]
B. [math]y \text {-axis }[/math]
C. [math]\text { z-axis }[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]y \text {-axis }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { From the concept of direction cosine, } \theta_{y}=\cos ^{-1} \frac{R_{y}}{|R|}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #716 (ID: 408404)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটির মধ্যবর্তী কোণ হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{39}}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{12}}[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{13}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}[/math]

Solution:
[math](2-3)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+9}[/math]
 [math]\times \sqrt{3} \cos \alpha[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #717 (ID: 408405)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\mathrm{p} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটির মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math] হলে [math]p =[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]\pm[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pm \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pm \sqrt{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math](\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\mathrm{pk})[/math]
 [math]=\left(\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left(\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}+\mathrm{p}^{2}}\right) \cos \frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1+1[/math]
 [math]=(\sqrt{2})[/math]
 [math]\left(\sqrt{2+\mathrm{p}^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2-\sqrt{2+\mathrm{p}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{p}[/math]
 [math]=\pm \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #718 (ID: 408325)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]Q(2,3,-1)[/math] এবং [math]P(4,-3,2)[/math] হলে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}|=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]6[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]10[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
Q বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{O Q}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+3[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
P বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{O P}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+6[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mid \overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+36+9}[/math]
 [math]=7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #719 (ID: 408326)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+5 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি দ্বারা z-অক্ষের সাথে উৎপন্ন কোণের পরিমাণ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\cos ^{-1} \frac{5}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{5}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{2}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{3}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{5}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta_{2}=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}) \cdot \hat{k}}{\sqrt{2^{2}+3^{2}+5^{2}} \cdot \sqrt{1^{2}}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{5}{\sqrt{38}}\right)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #720 (ID: 408327)

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\vec{A}=2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\lambda \hat{\mathbf{j}}+10 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হয় তবে λ এর মান কত?

Options:
A. -10
B. -32
C. 32
D. 13


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { A.B }=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2-4 \lambda+50=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lambda=13[/math]


Explanation:

Question #723 (ID: 408331)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\bar{A}=\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{9}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{13}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{17}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{13}[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\overrightarrow{A B}|[/math]
 [math]=|\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}|[/math]
 [math]=|3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3^{2}+(-2)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{13}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #725 (ID: 408335)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]-2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি y-অক্ষের সাথে যে কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তার মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}(-1)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]

Solution:
y-অক্ষ বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math]
ধরি, [math](-2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]
 ভেক্টরটি y-অক্ষের সাথে [math]\theta_{y}[/math]
, কোণ উৎপন্ন করে।[math]\therefore \quad \theta_{y}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{(-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}) \cdot \hat{\mathrm{j}}}{\sqrt{(-2)^{2}+2^{2}+(-1)^{2}} \sqrt{1^{2}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #726 (ID: 408336)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board

Question:
[math]-2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি y-অক্ষের সাথে যে কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তার মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left( -\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}(-1)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]

Solution:
y-অক্ষ বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
ধরি, [math](-2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]
 ভেক্টরটি y-অক্ষের সাথে [math]\theta_{y}[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করে[math]\therefore \theta_{y}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{(-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}) \hat{\mathrm{j}}}{\sqrt{(-2)^{2}+2^{2}+(-1)^{2}} \sqrt{1^{2}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]

Question #727 (ID: 408337)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=\hat{i}+\hat{k}, \vec{b}=3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{a} \cdot {\vec{b}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\bar{a} \cdot \bar{b}=(\hat{i}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=1 \cdot 0+0 \cdot 3+1 \cdot(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #728 (ID: 408338)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=-3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] হলে তাদের অন্তর্গত কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-6}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{6}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{\mathrm{AB}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{-3-2+1}{\sqrt{3} \sqrt{14}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #729 (ID: 408339)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটির সাথে y অক্ষরেখার উৎপন্ন কোণের মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{6}{7}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{Sol}^{\mathrm{n}} \text {: }[/math]
 [math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}) \cdot \hat{j}}{|2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}| \hat{j} \mid}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{3}{\sqrt{4+9+36}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{3}{7}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (c) }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #730 (ID: 408340)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি z-অক্ষের সাথে কত কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{2}{9}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overline{\mathbf{A}}=2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overline{\mathrm{A}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2^{2}+(-1)^{2}+2^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9}=3[/math]
z অক্ষের সাথে কোণ [math]\cos \theta=\frac{\overline{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \hat{\mathrm{k}}}{|\overline{\mathrm{A}}||\hat{\mathrm{k}}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3 \cdot 1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #731 (ID: 408341)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]m[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{p}}=4 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+m \hat{j}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{Q}=6 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]6[/math]
C. [math]8[/math]
D. [math]-6[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]6[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{Sol}^{\mathrm{n}}: \overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{Q}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(4 \hat{i}+m \hat{j})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(6 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k})=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 24-4 \mathrm{~m}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{m}=6 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (b) }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #732 (ID: 408342)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে [math]2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+a \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-4 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. [math]-6[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-6[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Sol }^{n} \text {.: }[/math]
 [math]2 \cdot 3+(-3) \cdot(-4)+a:[/math]
 [math]3=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6+12+3 a=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=-6[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans (a) }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #733 (ID: 408343)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}},[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\bar{a} \cdot \bar{b}[/math]
 [math]=(\hat{i}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=1 \cdot 0+0 \cdot 3+1 \cdot(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #734 (ID: 408344)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
m এর মান কত হলে [math]\vec{P}=4 \hat{i}+m \hat{j}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{Q}=6 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]6[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]-6[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]6[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{Sol}^{\mathrm{n}}: \overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{Q}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(4 \hat{i}+m \hat{j})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(6 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k})=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 24-4 \mathrm{~m}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{m}=6 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (b) }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #735 (ID: 408345)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}^{}=-3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] হলে তাদের অন্তর্গত কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-6}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{6}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overline{\mathrm{A}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}+1^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\bar{B}=-3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\bar{B}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(-3)^{2}+2^{2}+1^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\bar{A} \cdot \bar{B}[/math]
 [math]=-3 \cdot 1+(-1) \cdot 2+1 \cdot 1[/math]
 [math]=-4[/math]
 [math]\cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\overline{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{B}}}{|\overline{\mathrm{A}}||\overline{\mathrm{B}}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-4}{\sqrt{3} \cdot \sqrt{14}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math](-4,3,0)[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{r}}[/math] হলে—

[math]\text { i. } \quad \overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] [math]\text { ii. }|\vec{r}|=5[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \vec{r}, z[/math] অক্ষের উপর লম্ব

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ii ও iii

Question #737 (ID: 408347)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] ও [math]\vec{v}=\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এর অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ-

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}(1 / \sqrt{3})[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1}(1 / 3)[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}(1 / 2)[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}(1 / \sqrt{2})[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}(1 / 2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos \left(u^{\wedge} v\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{u} \cdot \vec{v}}{u \cdot v}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{0+1+0}{\sqrt{2} \cdot \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore u^{\wedge} v[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #738 (ID: 408348)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\vec{v}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এর অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ-

Options:
A. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]60^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{u} \cdot \vec{v}[/math]
 [math]=u v \cos \theta \Rightarrow 6-2+3[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2^{2}+1+9}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \sqrt{9+4+1} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 7[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{14} \cdot \sqrt{14} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{14}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta[/math]
 [math]=60^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #739 (ID: 408349)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2010-2011, 2002-2003, 2013-2014, 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}=2 \overline{\mathrm{i}}-\overline{\mathrm{j}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-6 \overline{\mathrm{j}}-2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\alpha=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{PQ}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3 \times 2+6-4}{3 \times 7}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #740 (ID: 408350)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2010-2011, 2002-2003, 2013-2014, 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}=2 \overline{\mathrm{i}}-\overline{\mathrm{j}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-6 \overline{\mathrm{j}}-2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\alpha=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{PQ}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3 \times 2+6-4}{3 \times 7}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #741 (ID: 408351)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{\alpha}[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{i}-\alpha \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. 1 অথবা -2
B. 1 অথবা 2
C. -1 অথবা 3
D. 1 অথবা -3


Correct Answer: A.1 অথবা -2

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 [math]=\alpha \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{k} ; \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \alpha \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\alpha \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{k}[/math]
লম্ব হলে [math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha \cdot 2 \alpha+(-2)(-\alpha)-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #742 (ID: 408281)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a \times b[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{b} \times \mathrm{a}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের অন্তর্গত কোণ —

Options:
ক. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]180^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a} \times \vec{b}[/math]
 এর দিক খাড়া উপরে ; [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 এর দিক খাড়া নিচে
[Image]


Explanation:
[math]a×b[/math]
 ও [math]b×a[/math]
 পরস্পর বিপরীত বলে মধ্যবর্তী কোণ ১৮০°।

Question #743 (ID: 408282)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{A}=a \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\underline{B}=2 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+b \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি সমান্তরাল হলে [math]a[/math] ও [math]b[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. [math]2,6[/math]
B. [math]-1,-6[/math]
C. [math]3,7[/math]
D. [math]-3,-7[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1,-6[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টর দুটি সমান্তরাল হলে [math]\frac{a}{2}=\frac{2}{-4}=\frac{3}{b}[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=-1 \text { and } b=-6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #744 (ID: 408283)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}[/math] পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে-

Options:
ক. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=0[/math]
খ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=0[/math]
গ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=0[/math]

Solution:
দুটি ভেক্টরের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ ০° হলে, তারা সমান্তরাল হয়

Question #745 (ID: 408284)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Given that } \vec{C}=\vec{A} \times \vec{B} \text { and } \vec{D}=\vec{B} \times \vec{A} \text {. What is the angle between } C \text { and } D \text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]180^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{D}=\vec{B} \times \vec{A}=(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})=-\vec{C}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #746 (ID: 408285)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x-2}{3}=\frac{y+5}{7}=\frac{z-5}{-2}[/math] সরলরেখাটি কোন ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \hat{i}-5 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]-3 \hat{i}-7 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{x-2}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y+5}{7}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{z-5}{-2}[/math]
 সরলরেখার ভেক্টর রূপ,[math]\mathbf{r}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{t}(3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
যা [math](2,-5,5)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী এবং [math]3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 এর সমান্তরাল।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #747 (ID: 408286)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]b=2 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] হয় তবে [math]|\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}|[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]19 \sqrt{5}[/math]
B. [math]19 \sqrt{3}[/math]
C. [math]17 \sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]8 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]8 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}=\left|\begin{array}{lrr}\hat{\mathbf{i}} & \hat{\mathbf{j}} & \hat{\mathbf{k}} \\3 & 1 & 2 \\2 & -2 & 4\end{array}\right|=8 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-8 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-8 \hat{\mathbf{k}} \\\begin{aligned}\therefore|\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}| & =\sqrt{8^{2}+(-8)^{2}+(-8)^{2}} \\& \Rightarrow \sqrt{3.8^{2}}=8 \sqrt{3}\end{aligned}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #748 (ID: 408287)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{P}(2,-3,5)[/math] বিন্দুতে ক্রিয়াশীল [math]F=3 \hat{i}-5 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] বলের মূলবিন্দুর সাপেক্ষে ভ্রামকের মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{481}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{482}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{483}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{485}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{483}[/math]

Solution:
বলের ভ্রামক [math]=|\mathbf{P} \times \mathbf{F}|[/math]
এখন, [math]\mathbf{P} \times \mathbf{F}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\2 & -3 & 5 \\3 & -5 & 2\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}& \Rightarrow \hat{\mathrm{i}}(-6+25)+\hat{\mathrm{j}}(15-4)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}(-10+9) \\& \Rightarrow 19 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+11 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\therefore|\mathbf{P} \times \mathbf{F}|= & \sqrt{483}\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #749 (ID: 408289)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathbf{a}=\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{b}=\lambda \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]a[/math] ও [math]b[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে [math]a[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
দুটি ভেক্টর পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে,[math]\frac{a_{1}}{a_{2}}=\frac{b_{1}}{b_{2}}=\frac{c_{1}}{c_{2}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{1}{\lambda}=\frac{4}{2}=\frac{-2}{-1} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\lambda}=2 \\\therefore \lambda=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #750 (ID: 408290)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathbf{P}=\hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{Q}=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] দুটি একই সমতলে অবস্থিত ভেক্টর।

ভেক্টর দুটির ক্রস গুণফল নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \hat{i}-11 \hat{j}-7 \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-11 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
গ. [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-11 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2 \hat{i}+11 \hat{j}+7 \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-2 \hat{i}+11 \hat{j}+7 \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]P \times Q=\left|\begin{array}{rrr}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\1 & -3 & 5 \\3 & -2 & 4\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \left|\begin{array}{cc}-3 & 5 \\1-2 & 4\end{array}\right| \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\left|\begin{array}{ll}1 & 5 \\3 & 4\end{array}\right| \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\left|\begin{array}{cc}1 & -3 \\3 & -2\end{array}\right| \hat{\mathbf{k}} \\\Rightarrow -2 \hat{i}+11 \hat{j}+7 \hat{k} \\\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #752 (ID: 408292)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
B. [math]-\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
C. [math]-\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
D. [math]\hat{i}-3 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]a \times \mathbf{b}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathbf{j}} & \hat{\mathbf{k}} \\1 & 0 & 1 \\2 & 1 & -1\end{array}\right|\begin{array}{l}=(0-1) \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}(-1-2)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}(1-0) \\=-\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #754 (ID: 408294)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathrm{ABCD}[/math] রম্বসের কর্ণদ্বয় যথাক্রমে [math]6 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

কর্ণদ্বয়ের ভেক্টর গুণন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]41 \hat{i}-66 \hat{j}+42 \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]31 \hat{i}+66 \hat{j}+42 \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]-31 \hat{i}-66 \hat{j}-42 \hat{k}[/math]
ঘ. [math]66 \hat{i}+31 \hat{j}+42 \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]31 \hat{i}+66 \hat{j}+42 \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\left|\begin{array}{rrr}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\6 & -6 & 5 \\6 & 1 & -6\end{array}\right|=\hat{i}(36-5)+\hat{j}(30+36)+\hat{k}(6+36) \\\quad=31 \hat{i}+66 \hat{j}+42 \hat{k}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]-4[/math]
ঘ. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
যদি A ও B ভেক্টর দুইটি সমান্তরাল হয় তবে, [math]\frac{3}{6}=\frac{2}{a}=\frac{-1}{-2}[/math]
