Question #843 (ID: 407652)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-8 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}=8 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হলে [math]|3 \overline{\mathrm{A}}+2 \overline{\mathrm{B}}|[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]359[/math]
B. [math]720[/math]
C. [math]719[/math]
D. [math]358[/math]
E. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { None }[/math]

Solution:
[math]3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=19 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-13 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-30 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore|3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{19^{2}+13^{2}+30^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1430}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #844 (ID: 407638)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
A মানের দুইটি বলের লব্ধি [math]A \sqrt{2+\sqrt{2}}[/math] । এদের যে কোনো একটি বলের সাথে লব্ধির নতি কত?

Options:
ক. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ} / 2[/math]
গ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]45^{\circ} / 2[/math]

Solution:
A মানের প্রতিটি বলকে লব্ধি বরাবর এবং লব্ধির লম্ব দিক বরাবর দুইটি উপাংশে ভাগ করি । উল্লম্ব উপাংশদ্বয় পরস্পরকে নাকচ করে
[Image]
[math]A \cos \theta+A \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=A \sqrt{2+\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{2+\sqrt{2}}}{2} \therefore \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{45^{\circ}}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #845 (ID: 407639)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{K}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=6 \hat{i}+7 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{B}[/math] এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{8}{3}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{8}{11}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{8}{11}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{8}{11}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A \cos \theta=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{B}|}=\frac{12-14-6}{\sqrt{6^{2}+7^{2}+6^{2}}}=-\frac{8}{11}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #846 (ID: 407641)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\hat{i}+\hat{j}+k, B=\sqrt{3} \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}, A[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]B[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ কী হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2}+2}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}-1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}+2}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\sqrt{3}+3-2}{\sqrt{1+1+1}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #847 (ID: 407642)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2010-2011, 2008-2009, 2009-2010, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\underline{\mathrm{A}}=2 \underline{\mathrm{i}}-\underline{\mathrm{j}}+3 \underline{\mathrm{k}}, \underline{\mathrm{B}}=3 \mathrm{i}+4 \underline{\mathrm{j}}-5 \underline{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\underline{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ হচ্ছে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{13}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-13}{10 \sqrt{7}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7}{5 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{-13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{B}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \times 3+4(-1)+3 \times(-5)}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}+(-5)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]


Explanation:

[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}=-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-6 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math] এর লব্ধি ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Question #849 (ID: 407623)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\overline{\mathrm{a}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \text { ও } \mathrm{b}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর।

[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর উপাংশ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{-7}{26}(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{7}{\sqrt{26}}(-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{-7}{\sqrt{29}}(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{7}{29}(2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{-7}{26}(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

Solution:
b বরাবর a এর উপাংশ [math]=\frac{\mathbf{a} \cdot \mathbf{b}}{|\mathbf{b}|^{2}} \mathbf{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8-3-12}{4^{2}+1^{2}+(-3)^{2}} \mathbf{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-7}{26}(4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #850 (ID: 407625)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\bar{a}=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\vec{b}=4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর।

[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর উপাংশ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{-7}{26}(4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{7}{\sqrt{26}}(-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{-7}{\sqrt{29}}(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{7}{29}(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{-7}{26}(4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]b[/math]
 বরাবর [math]a[/math]
 এর উপাংশ [math]=\frac{\mathbf{a} \cdot \mathbf{b}}{|\mathbf{b}|^{2}} \mathbf{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8-3-12}{4^{2}+1^{2}+(-3)^{2}} \mathbf{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-7}{26}[/math]
 [math](4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:

Question #851 (ID: 407626)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018 | Boards:  | Tags: All Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=2 \hat{i}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{6}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a}[/math]
 এর উপর [math]\vec{b}[/math]
 এরঅভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}}{|\vec{a}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}) \cdot(\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})}{\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+1^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2-2+1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #852 (ID: 407627)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{a}=\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\underline{b}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\underline{\mathbf{b}}[/math] এর উপর [math]\underline{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর অভিক্ষেপ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{8}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{20}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{20}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{8}{7}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{b}[/math]
 এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]=a \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}}{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2-6+12}{\sqrt{2^{2}+3^{2}+(-6)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8}{7}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #853 (ID: 407628)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+4 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এর অংশক কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{21} \hat{a}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{21} \hat{a}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{a}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{a}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{a}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\vec{b}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}+\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]
 এর অংশক[math]\Rightarrow\left(\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}}{\mathrm{a}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}}{\mathrm{a}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2+4-3}{\sqrt{2^{2}+4^{2}+(-1)^{2}}} \hat{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{a}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

C. [math]\frac{20}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{20}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{8}{7}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]=a \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}}{b}[/math]

Question #855 (ID: 407630)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর

[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এর অংশক কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{21} \hat{a}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{21} \hat{a}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+4[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}+\hat{j}+3[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}[/math]
 এর অংশক[math]=\left(\frac{\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}}{\mathrm{a}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\vec{a}}{\mathrm{a}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2+4-3}{\sqrt{2^{2}+4^{2}+(-1)^{2}}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}}[/math]
 [math]\hat{a}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #856 (ID: 407632)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\vec{Q}=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]

Solution:
অভিক্ষেপ [math]=Q \cos \theta=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{P}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5 \cdot 2-3 \cdot 1+2(-2)}{\sqrt{5^{2}+(-3)^{2}+2^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #857 (ID: 407633)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2010-2011, 2008-2009, 2009-2010, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\underline{\mathrm{A}}=2 \underline{\mathrm{i}}-\underline{\mathrm{j}}+3 \underline{\mathrm{k}}, \underline{\mathrm{B}}=3 \mathrm{i}+4 \underline{\mathrm{j}}-5 \underline{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\underline{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ হচ্ছে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{13}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-13}{10 \sqrt{7}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7}{5 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{-13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{B}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \times 3+4(-1)+3 \times(-5)}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}+(-5)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #858 (ID: 407634)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\sqrt{3 \hat{i}}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}, B=\sqrt{3 \hat{i}}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]A[/math] ডেক্টরের উপর [math]B[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ হবে কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sqrt{5}}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ[math]\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|}=\frac{3+3-2}{\sqrt{3+1+1}}=\frac{4}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #859 (ID: 407637)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ নির্ণয় কর ।

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{19}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{13}{19}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{\sqrt{19}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{13}{\sqrt{19}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 বরাবর [math]\vec{B}[/math]
 এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}) \cdot(\hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})}{\sqrt{3^{2}+(-1)^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3+4+6}{\sqrt{9+1+9}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{\sqrt{19}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #860 (ID: 200183)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Find a unit vector normal to the plane } \mathrm{ABC} \text { as shown in the figure given below. Note that a vector normal }[/math] [math]\text { to the plane will be perpendicular to any two of } A B, A C \text { and } B C \text { vectors. }[/math]


[Image]


Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}(\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\hat{i}+\hat{k})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
Let, a normal vector on the plane be [math]x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k}[/math]
 This is perpendicular to [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}} \text { and } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}} \text {. }[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{A B}[/math]
 [math]\cdot(x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\hat{i}-\hat{k})(x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=z[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{B C} \cdot(x \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(-\hat{i}+\hat{j}) \cdot(x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow x=y \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=y=z[/math]
 [math]\text { So the unit vector normal to the surface is }[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x \hat{i}+y \hat{i}+z \bar{k}}{\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{x(i+j+\hat{k})}{\sqrt{3 x^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #861 (ID: 200184)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত হলে [math](\vec{A}+\vec{B})[/math] এবং [math](\vec{A}-\vec{B})[/math] এর মান একই হয়?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 এর মান একই হলে,[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
= [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণও হলে,[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos (180-\theta)[/math]
 [math]-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos \theta=\rightarrow A \times \cos (180-\theta)[/math]
 [math]\cos \theta=\cos (180-\theta)[/math]
এই সমীকরণটি সত্য হবে যখন [math]\theta=90^{\circ}[/math]
সুতরাং, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ 90° হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 এর মান একই হবে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #862 (ID: 200186)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2011-2012, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি পরস্পর লম্ব হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-5}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{-5}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math](\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow 2+2 \lambda+3[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \lambda[/math]
 [math]=-5 \therefore \lambda=-\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #863 (ID: 200187)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুইটি সমমানের ভেক্টর রাশি কোন একটি বিন্দুতে কত কোণে ক্রিয়া করলে এদের লব্ধির মান যে কোন ভেক্টরের মানের অর্ধেক হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]121^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]151^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]75^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]151^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\left(\frac{p}{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=p^{2}+p^{2}+2 p^{2} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{p^{2}}{4}=2 p^{2}(1+\cos \theta) \Rightarrow 1=8(1+\cos \theta)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1[/math]
 [math]=8+8 \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-7}{8} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=151.04^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=t \hat{k}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]|\vec{a}|=7[/math] হলে [math]t[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]4[/math]
B. [math]-3[/math]
C. [math]6[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]6[/math]

Solution:
[math]t^{2}+2^{2}+3^{2}=7^{2} \Rightarrow t^{2}=36 \therefore t=6[/math]

Question #866 (ID: 200191)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\bar{A}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{A}+\vec{B}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{A}-\vec{B}[/math] এর অন্তর্গত কোণের মান-

Options:
A. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k} ;[/math]
 [math]\vec{B}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k} \therefore(\vec{A}+\vec{B})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{A}-\vec{B})[/math]
 [math]=-8+3+5=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\vec{A}+\vec{B})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{A}-\vec{B})=-8+3+5[/math]
 [math]=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]90°[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #867 (ID: 200192)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+10 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-11 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{13}{15}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{12}{15}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{13}{14}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{12}{14}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{13}{15}[/math]

Solution:
উপাংশ [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|} \hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2\times2+10\times2+\left(-11\right)\times1}{\sqrt{2^2+10^2+\left(-11\right)^2}}\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4+20-11}{\sqrt{4+100+121}}\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{\sqrt{225}}\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{15}\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #868 (ID: 200193)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)

Question:
দুটি ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}B[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}C[/math] কে সন্নিহিত বাহু ধরে অংকিত বর্গের ক্ষেত্রফল 16 বর্গ একক। [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}B[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}C[/math] এর ক্রস গুণফলের মান কত?

Options:
A. 16 একক
B. 15 একক
C. 12 একক
D. 10 একক


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
কোন বর্গের সন্নিহিত বাহুদ্বয় [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
 হয় তবে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}|=[/math]
 বর্গক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল = 16 বর্গ একক

Explanation:

Question #870 (ID: 200195)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k},[/math] [math]\vec{b}=\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{c}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{h}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{a} \vec{b}+\vec{b}[/math] [math]\cdot \vec{c}+\vec{c}[/math] [math]\cdot \vec{a}[/math] = ?

Options:
A. 0
B. 1
C. 2
D. 3


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}[/math]
 [math]=2(1)+1(-1)+1 \times 1=2[/math]
 [math]\vec{b} . \vec{c}[/math]
 [math]=1 \times 1+(-1)[/math]
 [math]\times 1+1(-1)=-1[/math]
 [math]\vec{c} \cdot \vec{a}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\times 2+1 \times 1+(-1) \times 1[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}+\vec{b}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{c}+\vec{c} \cdot \vec{a}[/math]
 [math]=2-1+2=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #871 (ID: 200196)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology, Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি কোন অক্ষের সাথে [math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math] কোণটি উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
A. Y অক্ষের সাথে
B. X অক্ষের সাথে
C. Z অক্ষের সাথে
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
Y = এর ভেক্টর j [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}} ; \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{(-1)(1)}{\sqrt{4+1+4}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{3}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #872 (ID: 200174)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{P} \cdot \vec{Q}=4 \sqrt{3}[/math] এবং [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}|=4[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটির মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. 30°
B. 60°
C. 120°
D. 150°


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\vec{P} \cdot \vec{Q}=4 \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow P Q \cos \theta=4 \sqrt{3}[/math]
আবার, [math]|\vec{P} \times \vec{Q}|=4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow P Q \sin \theta=4[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{P Q \sin \theta}{P Q \cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{4 \sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \tan \theta=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta=30^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #873 (ID: 200175)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\gamma[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\vec{A}=\gamma \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x – অক্ষের সাথে [math]30°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে ?

Options:
ক. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]=\cos 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\gamma}{\sqrt{\gamma^{2}+4^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{4}=\frac{\gamma}{\gamma^{2}+25}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \gamma[/math]
 [math]=5 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]\vec{A}=-\vec{B} \text { }[/math] এবং [math]\vec{A}+\vec{B}=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]-\mathbf{A}^{2}[/math]
B. [math]-\mathbf{B}^{2}[/math]
C. 0
D. 1


Correct Answer: C.0

Solution:
[math]\vec{A}+\vec{B}=-\vec{B}+\vec{B}=0[/math]

Question #875 (ID: 200177)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\mathbf{a} \hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}=6 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-9 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে, a এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 2
B. 3
C. - 1
D. 1


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ব্যাখ্যা: টেকনিক: [math]\vec{A}=a_{1} \hat{i}+a_{2}[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+a_{3} \hat{k}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{b}_{1} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\mathrm{b}_{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{b}_{3} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{a}_{1}}{\mathrm{~b}_{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{a}_{2}}{\mathrm{~b}_{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{a}_{3}}{\mathrm{~b}_{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ভেক্টরদ্বয় সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\frac{2}{6}=\frac{a}{-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=-1[/math]
 [math]Ans: C.[/math]


Explanation:

Question #876 (ID: 200178)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটো ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\sqrt{2} \hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\mathbf{b} \hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হতে হলে b এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]1.1+\sqrt{2} . b=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore b=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]

Question #877 (ID: 200180)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overline{\mathrm{p}}+\overline{\mathrm{q}}=\overline{\mathrm{p}}-\overline{\mathrm{q}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\overline{\mathrm{p}}[/math] এবং [math]\bar{q}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{p}+\vec{q}[/math]
 [math]=\vec{p}-\vec{q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\vec{p}+\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{p}+\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]=(\vec{p}-\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{p}-\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p^{2}+2 \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}+q^{2}[/math]
 [math]=p^{2}-2 \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}+q^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \vec{p} \perp \vec{q}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #878 (ID: 200181)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}, \vec{B}[/math] ও [math]\vec{\mathrm{C}}[/math] ভেক্টর হলে নিচের কোনটি অর্থবহ নহে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\vec{A} \times(\vec{B} \times \vec{C})[/math]
খ. [math]\vec{A} \cdot(\vec{B} \times \vec{C})[/math]
গ. [math]\vec{A} \cdot(\vec{B} \cdot \vec{C})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\vec{A}+(\vec{B} \times \vec{C})[/math]
ঙ. [math](\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}+\vec{B} \cdot \vec{C})[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\vec{A} \cdot(\vec{B} \cdot \vec{C})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec B.\vec C[/math]
 = স্কেলার রাশি। তাই এর সাথে [math]\vec A[/math]
 এর ডট গুণন সম্ভব নয়।

Explanation:

Question #879 (ID: 200182)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{j}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ও [math]\vec{B}=2 \vec{\imath}+10 \vec{\jmath}-11 \vec{k}[/math] দ্বারা গঠিত সমতলের উপর একক লম্ব ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{29}}(2 \vec{\imath}+3 \vec{\jmath}+4 \vec{k})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{29}}(2 \vec{\imath}+3 \vec{\jmath}+4 \vec{k})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{29}}(4 \vec{\imath}+3 \vec{\jmath}+2 \vec{k})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{29}}(-4 \vec{\imath}+3 \vec{\jmath}+2 \vec{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{29}}(-4 \vec{\imath}+3 \vec{\jmath}+2 \vec{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{A}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\vec{k} \vec{B}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+10 \hat{j}-11 k ;[/math]
 [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}=-32 \hat{i}+24[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+16 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 একক লম্ব ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \times \vec{B}}{|\vec{A} \times \vec{B}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{29}}[/math]
 [math](-4 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #880 (ID: 200169)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় কোন সামান্তরিকের দুটি সন্নিহিত বাহু নির্দেশ করলে, তার ক্ষেত্রফল হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]5 \sqrt{5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \sqrt{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\2 & -1 & 1 \\1 & 3 & -2\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=-\hat{i}+5 \hat{j}+7 \hat{k} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\sqrt{1+25+49}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{75}[/math]
 [math]=5 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #881 (ID: 200170)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\vec{A}=2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ কত? -

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]7 / 8[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]8 / 7[/math]
E. [math]-1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]8 / 7[/math]

Solution:
[math]A \cos \theta=\frac{\bar{A} \cdot \bar{B}}{|\bar{B}|}=\frac{12-6+2}{7}=\frac{8}{7}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #882 (ID: 200171)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overline{\mathrm{p}}=24 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\overline{\mathrm{q}}=20 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+15 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] হলে [math](\bar{p}+\bar{q})[/math] এবং [math](\overline{\mathrm{p}}-\overline{\mathrm{q}})[/math] এর অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]20^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math]
 [math]=44 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+22 \hat{\mathrm{j}} ;[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-8 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
এখন, [math](\vec{P}+\vec{Q}) \cdot(\vec{P}-\vec{Q})[/math]
 [math]=4 \times 44-8[/math]
 [math]\times 22=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\vec{P}+\vec{Q})[/math]
 এবং [math](\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}-[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}})[/math]
 এর অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
 ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #883 (ID: 200172)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোন ভেক্টরটি সকল ভেক্টরের উপর লম্বা?

Options:
ক. শূন্য ভেক্টর
খ. একক ভেক্টর
গ. অবস্থান ভেক্টর
ঘ. বিন্দু ভেক্টর


Correct Answer: A.শূন্য ভেক্টর

Solution:
যে ভেক্টর রাশির মান শূণ্য তাকে নাল ভেক্টর বলে। একটি ভেক্টরের সাথে তার বিপরীত ভেক্টর যোগ করলে বা দুটি সমান ভেক্টর বিয়োগ করলে নাল ভেক্টর পাওয়া যায়। নাল ভেক্টরের পাদবিন্দু এবং শীর্ষবিন্দু একই। তাই নাল বা শূন্য ভেক্টরের কোনো নির্দিষ্ট দিক নেই।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #886 (ID: 200166)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k},[/math] [math]b=\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]c=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]a \cdot b+b[/math] [math]\cdot c+c[/math] [math]\cdot a=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]a \cdot b[/math]
 [math]=2(1)+1(-1)+1[/math]
 [math]\times 1=2[/math]
 [math]\text { b. } c=1[/math]
 [math]\times 1+(-1)[/math]
 [math]\times 1+1(-1)=-1[/math]
 [math]\text { c. a }=1[/math]
 [math]\times 2+1[/math]
 [math]\times 1+(-1) \times 1=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { a.b }[/math]
 [math]+\text { b.c }+\text { c. a }[/math]
 [math]=2-1+2=3[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #887 (ID: 200161)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি [math]y[/math] অক্ষের সঙ্গে যে কোণ তৈরি করে তার মান হলো—

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math]
ঙ. No correct answer


Correct Answer: E.No correct answer

Solution:
[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\vec r \hat j\cdot}{|\vec{r}|}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{3}\right)[/math]

Question #888 (ID: 200163)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিকে [math]\vec{b}[/math] ভেক্টরের লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]{\hat a. } \overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math]
খ. [math]\widehat{b} . \vec{a}[/math]
গ. [math]\hat{a} . \hat{b}[/math]
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]{\hat a. } \overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math]

Solution:
a ভেক্টরের দিকেb ভেক্টরের লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\vec A \cdot \vec B \div|A|[/math]
 [math]=(\mathrm{\vec A} /|\mathrm{A}|) \cdot \mathrm{\vec B}[/math]
 [math]\hat{a} . \overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #889 (ID: 200153)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]m[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]A=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]B=m \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি লম্ব হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]9[/math]
খ. [math]19[/math]
গ. [math]-9[/math]
ঘ. [math]-19[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]9[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 m+6-24=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow m=9[/math]


Explanation:

Question #890 (ID: 200154)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{r}=\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x অক্ষের সাথে কত কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}-\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(\hat{i}) \cdot(\hat{i}+\hat{i}+\hat{k})}{\sqrt{3} \times 1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #891 (ID: 200155)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Find the vector equation of the line that passes through the points } A(3,4,1) \text {, and } B(2,-3,5) \text { crosses } x y[/math] [math]\text { plane. }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\frac{7}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{17}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
B. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\frac{23}{5} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{13}{5} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
C. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\frac{13}{5} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{23}{5} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
D. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\frac{17}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{7}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\frac{13}{5} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{23}{5} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]r=a+\lambda b=(3 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+k)[/math]
 [math]+\lambda(2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=(3+2 \lambda) \hat{i}+(4-3 \lambda) \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+(1+5 \lambda) \hat{k} \because \text { crosses } x y \text { plane }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1+5 \lambda[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{5}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{r}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{5} \hat{i}+\frac{23}{5} \hat{j}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #892 (ID: 200156)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)

Question:
a এর মান কত হলে [math]\frac{1}{2} \hat{i}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{j}+a \hat k[/math] ভেক্টরটি একটি একক ভেক্টর হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{15}}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{7}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{3}{2}[/math]
ঙ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{1}{3}\right)^{2}+a^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore a[/math]
 [math]=\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #894 (ID: 200159)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\hat{i}+\hat{j}+k, B=\sqrt{3} \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}, A[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]B[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ কী হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2}+2}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}-1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}+2}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\sqrt{3}+3-2}{\sqrt{1+1+1}}=\frac{\sqrt{3}+1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Question #895 (ID: 200160)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{X}}=-3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Y}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{k}[/math] হলে নিচের কোন একক ভেক্টরটি [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{x}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{y}}[/math] উভয়ের উপর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}(-2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{1}{3}(-2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
C. [math]\pm \frac{1}{3}(-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{29}(-3 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k})[/math]
E. No correct answer


Correct Answer: E.No correct answer

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{X}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Y}}[/math]
 [math]=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\-3 & 4 & -5 \\2 & 2 & -3\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\hat{i}(-12+10)[/math]
 [math]-\hat{j}(9+10)+\hat{k}(-6-8)[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{i}-19 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]-14 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{561}}[/math]
 [math](-2 \hat{i}-19 \hat{j}-14 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\\[/math]
 [math]\boxed {\mathrm {Another\ Solution} }[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{X}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Y}}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\-3 & 4 & -5 \\2 & 2 & -3\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}(-12+10)[/math]
 [math]-\hat{j}(9-10)[/math]
 [math]+\hat{k}(-6+8)[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}[/math]
লম্ব একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{-2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{4+1+4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](-2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #896 (ID: 200148)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jhenidah Government Veterinary College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ABCD সামান্তরিকে A এর সাপেক্ষে B ও D এর অবস্থান ভেক্টর যথাক্রমে a ও b হলে, A বিন্দুর সাপেক্ষে M এর অবস্থান ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. (a + b)
খ. [math]\frac{1}{4}(a+b)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}(a+b)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{6}(a+b)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}(a+b)[/math]

Solution:

[Image]

Question #897 (ID: 200149)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{1}{2} \hat{i}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{j}+ a \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি একক ভেক্টর হলে a এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{15}}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{7}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\because \frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{a} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 একটি একক ভেক্টর।[math]\therefore \sqrt{\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{9}+a^{2}}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1-\frac{1}{4}-\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{36-9-4}{36}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{23}{36} \therefore a[/math]
 [math]= \pm\frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #898 (ID: 200152)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
'a' এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+4 \hat{k},[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+4 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\mathbf{a} \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{C}}=\mathbf{a} \hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math] [math]+7 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+9 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] সমতলীয় হবে?

Options:
A. 2
B. -2
C. 3
D. 5


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
সমতলীয় হবে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}2 & 3 & 4 \\3 & 4 & a \\a & 7 & 9\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]2(36-7 a)-3[/math]
 [math]\left(27-a^{2}\right)+4(21-4 a)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 a^{2}-30 a+75[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}-10 a+25[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(a-5)^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #899 (ID: 200127)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
A মানের দুইটি বলের লব্ধি [math]A \sqrt{2+\sqrt{2}}[/math] । এদের যে কোনো একটি বলের সাথে লব্ধির নতি কত?

Options:
ক. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ} / 2[/math]
গ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]45^{\circ} / 2[/math]

Solution:
A মানের প্রতিটি বলকে লব্ধি বরাবর এবং লব্ধির লম্ব দিক বরাবর দুইটি উপাংশে ভাগ করি । উল্লম্ব উপাংশদ্বয় পরস্পরকে নাকচ করে
[Image]
[math]A \cos \theta+A \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=A \sqrt{2+\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{2+\sqrt{2}}}{2} \therefore \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{45^{\circ}}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #900 (ID: 200128)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\bar{i} \times \bar{k}=[/math] কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\bar{j}[/math]
B. [math]\text { i }[/math]
C. [math]-\overline{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
D. [math]-\overline{\mathrm{j}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\overline{\mathrm{j}}[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টর গুণনের নিয়ম অনুসারে, [math]\bar{i}[/math]
, [math]\bar{j}[/math]
, [math]\bar{k}[/math]
 একক ভেক্টরগুলির মধ্যে [math]\bar{i} \times \bar{k}[/math]
 এর মান হলো [math]-\bar{j}[/math]
। এটি একটি ডান-হাতি কার্টেসিয়ান স্থানাঙ্ক ব্যবস্থায় ভেক্টর গুণনের চক্রাকার নিয়মের (cyclic rule) কারণে ঘটে যেখানে [math]\bar{i} \times \bar{j} = \bar{k}[/math]
, [math]\bar{j} \times \bar{k} = \bar{i}[/math]
 এবং [math]\bar{k} \times \bar{i} = \bar{j}[/math]
। যখন ক্রম বিপরীত হয়, তখন ফলাফল ঋণাত্মক হয়, অর্থাৎ [math]\bar{k} \times \bar{i} = -\bar{i} \times \bar{k} = \bar{j}[/math]
, তাই [math]\bar{i} \times \bar{k} = -\bar{j}[/math]
।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #901 (ID: 200129)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}} ; \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=\mathrm{k}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=[/math]কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\hat{i}-5 \hat{j}[/math]
B. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
C. [math]\hat{i}+5 \hat{j}[/math]
D. [math]0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\hat{i}-5 \hat{j}[/math]

Solution:
এখানে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} = 5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}} = \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 দেওয়া আছে।[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math]
 নির্ণয় করতে হলে, আমরা ক্রস গুণফলের নিয়ম ব্যবহার করব:[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}} = \begin{vmatrix} \hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\ 5 & -1 & 3 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 \end{vmatrix}[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 এর সাপেক্ষে নির্ণয় করলে: [math](-1 \times 1) - (3 \times 0) = -1[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 এর সাপেক্ষে নির্ণয় করলে: [math]-(5 \times 1) - (3 \times 0) = -5[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 এর সাপেক্ষে নির্ণয় করলে: [math](5 \times 0) - (-1 \times 0) = 0[/math]
সুতরাং, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}} = -1\hat{\mathrm{i}} - (-5)\hat{\mathrm{j}} + 0\hat{\mathrm{k}} = -\hat{\mathrm{i}} + 5\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
।তবে, প্রদত্ত অপশনগুলোতে একটি ছোট পার্থক্য রয়েছে। যদি প্রশ্নটি [math]-\hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 হয়, তাহলে একটি ভুল ধারণা থাকতে পারে। আমাদের গণনা অনুযায়ী উত্তর হলো [math]-\hat{\mathrm{i}} + 5\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
। যদি অপশন A সঠিক বলে ধরে নেওয়া হয়, তবে প্রশ্নটিতে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math]
 এর মান ভিন্ন হতে পারে বা প্রশ্নটি ক্রস গুণফলের পরিবর্তে ডট গুণফল বা অন্য কিছু বোঝাতে চেয়েছে। তবে প্রদত্ত প্রশ্ন ও অপশন অনুযায়ী, আমাদের গণনা সঠিক।এখানে, ভেক্টর গুণফলের কিছু ধর্ম ব্যবহার করা যেতে পারে, যেমন [math]\hat{i} \times \hat{k} = -\hat{j}[/math]
, [math]\hat{j} \times \hat{k} = \hat{i}[/math]
 এবং [math]\hat{k} \times \hat{k} = 0[/math]
।[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}} = (5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) \times \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]= 5 \hat{\mathrm{i}} \times \hat{\mathrm{k}} - \hat{\mathrm{j}} \times \hat{\mathrm{k}} + 3 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \times \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]= 5 (-\hat{\mathrm{j}}) - (\hat{\mathrm{i}}) + 3 (0)[/math]
 [math]= -5\hat{\mathrm{j}} - \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]= -\hat{\mathrm{i}} - 5\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
তাই, সঠিক উত্তর হলো [math]-\hat{\mathrm{i}}-5\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
। এটি ভেক্টর গুণফলের নিয়ম অনুসরণ করে পাওয়া গেছে। ভেক্টর গুণফল দুটি ভেক্টরের লম্ব একটি ভেক্টর তৈরি করে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #902 (ID: 200130)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]5[/math] একক এবং [math]6[/math] একক মানের দুটি ভেক্টর কোন বিন্দুতে [math]60°[/math] কোণে ক্রিয়াশীল। [math]\bar{A} \cdot \bar{B}=[/math] কত?

Options:
ক. [math]15[/math]
খ. [math]20[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]35[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]15[/math]

Solution:
[math]\bar{A} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{B}}=\mathrm{AB} \cos \theta=15[/math]

Explanation:

Question #903 (ID: 200131)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর এবং এদের অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ [math]\theta[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}=0 \therefore \theta=90^{\circ}[/math]

Question #904 (ID: 200133)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{K}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=6 \hat{i}+7 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{B}[/math] এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{8}{3}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{8}{11}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{8}{11}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{8}{11}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A \cos \theta=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{B}|}=\frac{12-14-6}{\sqrt{6^{2}+7^{2}+6^{2}}}=-\frac{8}{11}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #905 (ID: 200135)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}, 3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+a \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরত্রয় একই সমতলে থাকবে?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}2 & 1 & -1 \\3 & -2 & 4 \\1 & -3 & a\end{array}\right|=0 \therefore a=5[/math]

Explanation:

Question #907 (ID: 200139)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jhenidah Government Veterinary College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A B C D[/math] সামান্তরিকে [math]A[/math] এর সাপেক্ষে [math]B[/math] ও [math]D[/math] এর অবস্থান ভেক্টর যথাক্রমে [math]\underline{\mathrm{a}}[/math] ও [math]\underline{\mathrm{b}}[/math] হলে, [math]M, BD[/math] এর মধ্যবিন্দু হলে, [math]A[/math] বিন্দুর সাপেক্ষে [math]M[/math] এর অবস্থান ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](\underline {a}+\underline{b})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{4}(\underline a+\underline{b})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\underline a+\underline b)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{6}(\underline a+\underline b)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}(\underline a+\underline b)[/math]

Solution:
[math]M, BD[/math]
 এর মধ্যবিন্দু হলে, [math]M[/math]
 এর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{1}{2}(\underline a+\underline b)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #908 (ID: 200140)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}, \overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] [math]=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{C}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{C}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর?

Options:
A. 10
B. 11
C. 12
D. 13


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}[/math]
 [math]=2(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]-(2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]+2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=6 \hat{i}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{j}-7\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|2 \vec{A}-\vec{B}+\vec{C}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{6^{2}+6^{2}+(-7)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=11[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #909 (ID: 200141)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি কণার উপর [math]2 \hat{\imath}-3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] বল দুটি প্রয়োগের ফলে কণাটি (2, 3, − 1 ) বিন্দু হতে ( 4, 2, 1 ) বিন্দুতে সরে গেল। বল দুটি দ্বারাসম্পাদিত কাজ কত একক?

Options:
ক. 14
খ. 15
গ. 16
ঘ. 18


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{F}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
দূরত্ব, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{S}}[/math]
 [math]=(4-2) \hat{i}+(-2-3) \hat{j}+(1+1) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}-5 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
নির্ণেয় কাজ [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{F}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{S}}[/math]
 [math]=(5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=5(2)+(-2)[/math]
 [math](-5)+(-3)(2)[/math]
 [math]=10+10-6=14[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #910 (ID: 200142)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]-\hat{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিক -

Options:
ক. [math]-\hat{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর দিকে
খ. [math]-\hat{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর বিপরীত দিকে
গ. [math]-\hat{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর লম্বদিকে
ঘ. [math]-\hat{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর উলম্বদিকে


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\hat{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর বিপরীত দিকে

Solution:
[math]-\hat{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিকে à এর বিপরীত দিকে।

Explanation:

Question #911 (ID: 200143)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ত্রিমাত্রিক স্থানাঙ্ক ব্যবস্থায় একটি ভেক্টরের আদি বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক (5, 4, 3) এবং শেষ বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক (8, 6, 5)। ভেক্টরটির মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{13}[/math]
খ. $ [math]\sqrt{13}[/math] $
গ. $ [math]\sqrt{13}[/math] $
ঘ. $ [math]\sqrt{13}[/math] $


Correct Answer: C.$ [math]\sqrt{13}[/math] $

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\vec{A}=5 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k} ; \vec{B}[/math]
 [math]=8 \hat{i}+6 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 [math]=(8-5) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+(6-4) \hat{\mathrm{j}}+(5-3) \hat{\mathrm{k}}=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(3)^{2}+(2)^{2}+(2)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9+4+4}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{17}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #912 (ID: 200144)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}=\mathbf{3} \hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}=-5 \hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের অন্তর্গত কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
A. 0°
B. 30°
C. 90°
D. 180°


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathbf{3} \hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math]
 ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}[/math]
 [math]=-5 \hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math]
 এদের অন্তগর্ত কোণ[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{(3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}) \cdot(-5 \hat{\mathrm{i}})}{\sqrt{3^{2}} \cdot \sqrt{(-5)^{2}} \Rightarrow \theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-15}{3 \times 5}\right)}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}(-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\cos 180^{\circ}\right)=180^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\boxed {\mathrm {Shortcut} }[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathbf{3} \hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরদ্বয় x অক্ষের উপর বিপরীতমূখী, তাই এদের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ = 1800

Explanation:

Question #913 (ID: 200145)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y এর কোণ মানের জন্য [math]\vec{A}=\gamma \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি X অক্ষের সাথে [math]30^\circ[/math] [math]\vec{A}=\gamma \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
B. [math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]\cos 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\gamma \times 1}{\sqrt{\gamma^{2}+16+9} \cdot \sqrt{1}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\gamma}{\sqrt{\gamma^{2}+25}} \Rightarrow \frac{3}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\gamma^{2}}{\gamma^{2}+25}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \gamma^{2}-3 \gamma^{2}[/math]
 [math]=75[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \gamma[/math]
 [math]= \pm 5 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #914 (ID: 200146)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k},[/math] [math]\vec{b}=-\hat{i}-\hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] এর লব্ধি ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর -

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{7}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{7}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}(3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{17}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{17}}[/math]

Solution:
এদের লব্ধি = [math]=\vec{a}+\vec{b} =2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}+\hat{i}-\hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+4 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{i}+2[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{3^{2}+2^{2}+2^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{17}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #915 (ID: 200147)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যেকোনো ভেক্টরের একক ভেক্টর বা ঐ ভেক্টর বরাবর সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর এই দুটি কথার অর্থ—

Options:
ক. একই নয়
খ. বিপরীত
গ. একই
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: C. একই

Solution:
একটি ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 এর একক ভেক্টর [math]\eta_{1}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}|}[/math]
 এই ভেক্টর বরাবর সমান্তরাল ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{mA}}[/math]
 এর একক ভেক্টর [math]\eta_{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{m \vec{A}}{|m \vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{m \vec{A}}{m|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{A}}{|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\eta_{1} \text { }[/math]
অর্থাৎ একক দ্বয় একই।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #916 (ID: 200114)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{P} \cdot \vec{Q}=4 \sqrt{3}[/math] এবং [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}|=4[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটির মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. 30°
B. 60°
C. 120°
D. 150°


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\vec{P} \cdot \vec{Q}=4 \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow P Q \cos \theta=4 \sqrt{3}[/math]
আবার, [math]|\vec{P} \times \vec{Q}|=4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow P Q \sin \theta=4[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{P Q \sin \theta}{P Q \cos \theta}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4}{4 \sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \tan \theta=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\tan 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta=30^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #917 (ID: 200115)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
এক বিন্দুতে লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়াশীল [math]P=2 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ও [math]Q=\sqrt{3} \hat{i}+\sqrt{3} \hat{j}+\sqrt{3} \hat{k}[/math] বলের লব্ধি P বলের সাথে কত কোণ করে?

Options:
ক. 30°
খ. 40°
গ. 60°
ঘ. 90°


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]|P|=\sqrt{2^{2}+(-2)^{2}+1^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9}[/math]
 [math]=3[/math]
 [math]|Q|=\sqrt{(\sqrt{3})^{2}+(\sqrt{3})^{2}+(\sqrt{3})^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9}[/math]
 [math]=3[/math]
ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মান সমান এবং লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়া করলে লব্ধি মধ্যবর্তী কোণকে 90° সমদ্বিখণ্ডিত করে। [math]\therefore[/math]
 P বলের সাথে [math]=\frac{90^{\circ}}{2}[/math]
 [math]=45^{\circ}[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করে ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #918 (ID: 200116)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\alpha[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{\imath}-2 \hat{\jmath}+k[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{\imath}-\alpha \hat{\jmath}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে ?

Options:
A. 1 অথবা -2
B. 1 অথবা 2
C. -1 অথবা 3
D. 1 অথবা -3


Correct Answer: A.1 অথবা -2

Solution:
[math]\vec{A}=\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+\hat{k} \quad \vec{B}[/math]
 [math]=2 \alpha \hat{i}-4 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\vec{A} \perp \vec{B}[/math]
 হলে [math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}[/math]
 [math]=0 \quad 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #919 (ID: 200117)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
‘a' এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}+3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{j}}+4 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}},[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}[/math] [math]+4 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{j}}+a \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]\cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}=a \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}[/math] [math]+7 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{j}}+9 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] সমতলীয় হবে?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]-2[/math]
C. [math]3[/math]
D. [math]-5[/math]
E. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
সমতলীয় হবে যদি [math]\vec{A} \cdot(\vec{B} \times \vec{C})=0[/math]
 হয়[math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}2 & 3 & 4 \\3 & 4 & a \\a & 7 & 9\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=2(36-7 a)+3\left(a^{2}-27\right)+4(21-4 a)[/math]
 [math]=3 a^{2}-30 a+75=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}-10 a+25[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(a-5)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=5[/math]


Explanation:

ঘ. [math]\hat{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর উলম্বদিকে
