Question #921 (ID: 200119)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\vec{p}+\vec{q}=\vec{p}-\vec{q}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত ?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]
E. সবগুলো


Correct Answer: E.সবগুলো

Solution:
ধরি মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\alpha[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}[/math]
 [math].....(i)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \vec{p}-\vec{p}=-\vec{q}-\vec{q} \Rightarrow 0=-2 \vec{q} \Rightarrow \vec{q}=0.....(ii)[/math]
(i) নং হতে[math](\vec{p}+\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{p}+\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]=(\vec{p}-\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{p}-\vec{q})[/math]
 [math]\vec{p} \cdot \vec{p}+\vec{p}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{q}+\vec{q} \cdot \vec{p}+\vec{q}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]=\vec{p}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{p}-\vec{p}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{q}-\vec{p}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{q}+\vec{q} \cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \cdot \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \vec{p} \cdot \vec{q}=0[/math]
 [math]4 \cdot|\vec{p}| \cdot|\vec{q}|[/math]
 [math]\cdot \cos \alpha=0[/math]
 [math]....(iii)[/math]
এখন (ii) নং থেকে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}|=0[/math]
 তাই [math]\alpha[/math]
 এর যে কোন মানের জন্য (iii) নং সমীকরণ সত্য ।আবার প্রশ্নে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}|=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{q}}|[/math]
 থাকলে সঠিক উত্তর [math](b) 90°[/math]
 হবে ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #922 (ID: 200120)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুইটি সমান বল P লব্ধি P হলে বল দুইটির মধ্যকার কোণ কত ডিগ্রি?

Options:
ক. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]120^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]=\alpha[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{P}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{P}^{2}+\mathrm{P}^{2}+2 \text { 2.P.P } \cos \alpha[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{P}^{2} \cos \alpha[/math]
 [math]=-\mathrm{P}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos \alpha[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{2}=\cos 120^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha=120^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #923 (ID: 200121)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ নির্ণয় কর ।

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{19}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{13}{19}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{\sqrt{19}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{13}{\sqrt{19}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 বরাবর [math]\vec{B}[/math]
 এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}) \cdot(\hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})}{\sqrt{3^{2}+(-1)^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3+4+6}{\sqrt{9+1+9}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{\sqrt{19}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #924 (ID: 200122)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](2,3,1)[/math] ও [math](3,1, −2)[/math] ভেক্টরের স্কেলার গুণফল ও মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত ?

Options:
ক. 5 এবং 45°
খ. 2 এবং 30°
গ. 7 এবং 60°
ঘ. 3 এবং 90°


Correct Answer: C.7 এবং 60°

Solution:
স্কেলার গুণফল [math]\Rightarrow 2 \times 3+3 \times 1+1 \times(-2)=7[/math]

Question #925 (ID: 200123)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathrm{k}} \times \hat{\mathrm{i}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math]
B. [math]\hat{j}[/math]
C. [math]\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math]
D. [math]\hat{l}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\hat{j}[/math]

Solution:
ঘড়ির কাঁটার দিকে পাশাপাশি দুইটা গুণ করলে গুনফল(+পরেরটা) ঘড়ির কাঁটার বিপরীত দিকে গুণ করলে গুনফল(-পরেরটা)

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #926 (ID: 200124)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2006-2007, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{\alpha}[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{i}-\alpha \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. - 2, 1
B. 2,-1
C. 2,1
D. -2,-1


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\alpha .2 \alpha+(-2)(-\alpha)+1(-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha^{2}+\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha(\alpha+2)-(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\alpha-1)(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #927 (ID: 200126)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\gamma[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\vec{A}=\gamma \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x – অক্ষের সাথে [math]30°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে ?

Options:
ক. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]=\cos 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\gamma}{\sqrt{\gamma^{2}+4^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{4}=\frac{\gamma}{\gamma^{2}+25}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \gamma[/math]
 [math]=5 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি [math]Z[/math] অক্ষের সাথে যে কোণ উৎপন্ন করে-

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{6}{7}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{7}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{3^{2}+6^{2}+2^{2}}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]

Question #929 (ID: 200100)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}, \vec{B}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{A}+2 \vec{B}[/math] এর অন্তঃস্থ কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{31}{50}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{31}{30}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{31}{50}[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{31}{30}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{31}{50}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left[\frac{(2 \vec{A}+\vec{B}) \cdot(\vec{A}+2 \vec{B})}{|2 \vec{A}+\vec{B}| \cdot|\vec{A}+2 \vec{B}|}\right][/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{31}{50}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #930 (ID: 200101)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}, \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]4 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\lambda \hat{k}[/math] - ভেক্টর তিনটি সমতলীয় হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]-3 / 5[/math]
B. [math]3 / 5[/math]
C. [math]2 / 7[/math]
D. [math]-2 / 7[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]3 / 5[/math]

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}2 & -1 & 1 \\1 & 2 & -3 \\4 & -1 & \lambda\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=2(2 \lambda-3)[/math]
 [math]+1(\lambda+12)+1(-1-8)[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #931 (ID: 200102)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\underline{P}=4 \underline{i}-2 j+4 \underline{k}[/math] এবং [math]\underline{Q}=4 \underline{i}-2 \underline{j}-\underline{k}[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\underline{P}[/math] এবং [math]\underline{Q}[/math] মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{5 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{8 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]
E. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\vec{P}, \vec{Q}}{\overrightarrow{P Q}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8 \sqrt{21}}{63}\right)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #933 (ID: 200104)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
Points [math]\vec{A} \text { and } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] lieon a straight line [math]\vec{\ell} \text { relative to a fixed origin 0. Point } \vec{A}[/math] has position vector [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{k} \text {, }[/math]

point [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] has position vector [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] and point [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}[/math] has position vector [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+p \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] with respect to 0 $

where p is a constant. Given that [math]\overrightarrow{A C}[/math] is perpendicular to [math]\vec{\ell}[/math] Find the valuc of p $

Options:
A. [math]16[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]12[/math]
D. [math]-6[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-6[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}} \text { vector: }[/math]
 [math]\hat{i}+(p+3) \hat{j}-6 \hat{k} ;[/math]
 [math]\vec{l} \text { vetor: }[/math]
 [math](-3 \hat{i}+5 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}} \cdot \vec{\ell}[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow(-3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+(\mathrm{p}+3) \hat{\mathrm{j}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-3+5 \mathrm{p}+15+18[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{p}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{30}{5}=-6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #934 (ID: 200105)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{B}=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]|A+B|[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{29}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{39}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{49}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{59}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt{59}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-7 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math];|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1^{2}+3^{2}+7^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{59}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #935 (ID: 200106)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]xy[/math] তলের সমান্তরাল এবং [math]2 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+6 \hat{k}[/math] এর সাথে সমকোণে অবস্থিত একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{\hat i+\hat j}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{\hat k}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{\hat i+\hat j}{\sqrt{44}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{\mathrm{\hat i}+\mathrm{\hat j}}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\pm \frac{\hat i+\hat j}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, একক ভেক্টরটি [math](a \hat{i}+b \hat{j})[/math]
এখন, [math]2 a-2 b=0 \Rightarrow a=b \therefore[/math]
 একক ভেক্টর [math]\pm \frac{a(\hat i+\hat j)}{\sqrt{2} a}=\pm \frac{\hat i+\hat j}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #936 (ID: 200108)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
এক বিন্দুতে লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়াশীল [math]P=2 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ও [math]Q=\sqrt{3} \hat{i}+\sqrt{3} \hat{j}+\sqrt{3} \hat{k}[/math] বলের লব্ধি [math]p[/math] বলের সাথে কত কোণ করে?

Options:
ক. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
ঙ. Question ভুল


Correct Answer: E.Question ভুল

Solution:
P ও Q এর মাঝে কোণ [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 \sqrt{3}-2 \sqrt{3}+\sqrt{3}}{3.3}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{9}\right)=78.9^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]P[/math]
 ও [math]Q[/math]
 এর মাঝে কোণ [math]78.9°[/math]
 তাই এরা লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়া করে না।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #937 (ID: 200109)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]m[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]A=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]B=m \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি লম্ব হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]9[/math]
খ. [math]19[/math]
গ. [math]-9[/math]
ঘ. [math]-19[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]9[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 m+6-24=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow m=9[/math]


Explanation:

Question #938 (ID: 200110)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]b \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+k \diamond 2 b \hat{i}-b \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হলে [math]b[/math] কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]3,-5[/math]
B. [math]-2,1[/math]
C. [math]-1,2[/math]
D. [math]5,7[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-2,1[/math]

Solution:
[math](b \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+k)[/math]
 [math]\cdot(2 b \hat{i}-b \hat{j}-4 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]2 b^{2}+2 b-4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow b=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #939 (ID: 200111)

Question:
এক বিন্দুতে লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়াশীল [math]P=2 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ও [math]Q=\sqrt{3} \hat{i}+\sqrt{3} \hat{j}+\sqrt{3} \hat{k}[/math] বলের লব্ধি [math]P[/math] বলের সাথে কত কোণ করে?

Options:
ক. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
ঙ. No correct answer


Correct Answer: .

Solution:
P ও Q এর মাঝে কোণ [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2 \sqrt{3}-2 \sqrt{3}+\sqrt{3}}{3.3}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{9}\right)[/math]
 [math]=78.9^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]P[/math]
 ও [math]Q[/math]
 এর মাঝে কোণ [math]78.9^{\circ}[/math]
 তাই এরা লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়া করে না।

Question #940 (ID: 200112)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি [math]z[/math]-অক্ষের ঋণাত্মক দিকের সাথে যে কোণ তার পরিমাণ কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{(2 \mathrm{\hat i}-\mathrm{\hat j}-\mathrm{\hat k}) \cdot(-\mathrm{\hat k})}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #941 (ID: 200113)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}} \text { - }[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের পরিমাণ কত?

Options:
A. 0°
B. 45°
C. 90°
D. 180°


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\because 1(-1)+(-1)(1)+1(2)[/math]
 [math]=-1-1+2=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 মধ্যবর্তী কোণ = 90°

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #942 (ID: 200097)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \sqrt{3} \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি এক বিন্দুতে লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়াশীল। P এর সাথে এদের লব্ধি ভেক্টরের দিক -

Options:
A. 25°
B. 59°
C. 65°
D. 70°


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1^{2}+2^{2}+(-2)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9}=3[/math]
 [math]|\vec{Q}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3^{2}+2^{2}+(2 \sqrt{3})^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9+4+12}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{25}=5[/math]
 [math]|\vec{R}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3^{2}+5^{2}}[/math]
লব্ধি [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}[/math]
 এর সাথে ও কোণ উৎপন্ন করলে,[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{3}{R}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{3}{\sqrt{3^{2}+5^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\approx 59^{\circ}[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #943 (ID: 200098)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{j}}[/math] ও [math]\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]80^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]120^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{A B}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=120^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #944 (ID: 200093)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
Y- অক্ষের দিকে কোন ভেক্টর ক্রিয়া করলে X - অক্ষের দিকে ভেক্টরি উপাংশ হবে-

Options:
ক. শূন্য
খ. A /2
গ. A
ঘ. 2A


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
কোন দিকে ভেক্টরেরউপাংশ = [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}| \cos \theta=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}| \times \cos 90^{\circ}[/math]= 0 বা শূন্য
[Image]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #945 (ID: 200094)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}, \overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}[/math] ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ কোনটি হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
C. [math]2(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{2}(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{2}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}})[/math]

Solution:
উপাংশ = [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|^{2}} \vec{A}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{(\sqrt{1+1})^{2}}[/math]
 [math](\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #946 (ID: 200095)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=8 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=3 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math] হলে, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর -

অভিক্ষেপ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{30 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{35}{10 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{30}{10 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{35 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{35 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math]
 উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ = [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8 \times 3+(-1) \times 4+(-3)}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}+(-5)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\times(-5)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{24-4+15}{\sqrt{50}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{35}{5 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{35 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #947 (ID: 200096)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{k}[/math] বরাবর ভেক্টর [math]\vec{A}=-\hat{i}+2 \hat{k}[/math] এর উপাংশ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\overrightarrow{0}[/math]
B. 0
C. 1
D. - 0


Correct Answer: B.0

Solution:
[math]\vec{B}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\vec{A}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{(|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|)^{2}} \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2+2}{\left(\sqrt{2^{2}+3^{2}+1^{2}}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math](2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #948 (ID: 200075)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টেরের বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=5 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ নির্ণয় কর?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\vec{b}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]= \vec{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(10-3-4)}{\left(\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}\right)^{2}}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{9}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ = [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(10-3-4)}{\left(\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}\right)^{2}}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})=\frac{3}{9}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})=\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]

Question #949 (ID: 200077)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
'a' এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+4 \hat{k},[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+4 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\mathbf{a} \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{C}}=\mathbf{a} \hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math] [math]+7 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+9 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] সমতলীয় হবে?

Options:
A. 2
B. -2
C. 3
D. 5


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
সমতলীয় হবে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}2 & 3 & 4 \\3 & 4 & a \\a & 7 & 9\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]2(36-7 a)-3[/math]
 [math]\left(27-a^{2}\right)+4(21-4 a)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 a^{2}-30 a+75[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}-10 a+25[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(a-5)^{2}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #950 (ID: 200078)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
অক্ষত্রয়ের সাথে উৎপন্ন কোণগুলি যথাক্রমে [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}\right), \cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{6}}\right)[/math] ও [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{6}}\right)[/math] হলে, তা নিচের কোন ভেক্টরের জন্য সত্য

Options:
ক. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
খ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
গ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

Solution:
কোণগুলো অনুযায়ী ভেক্টরটি হবে [math](2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-\hat{k}) \times r[/math]
 যেখানে [math]r[/math]
 হল অশূন্য ধ্রুবক । [math]r = 2[/math]
 হলে [math]4 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #951 (ID: 200079)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
অন্তর্ভূক্ত কোণের মান [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2 \sqrt{7}}\right)[/math] হলে তা নিচের কোন ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের জন্য সত্য?

Options:
ক. [math](2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] এবং [math](\hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] এবং [math](\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k})[/math]
গ. [math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] এবং [math](\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] এবং [math](\hat{i}-4 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] এবং [math](\hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math](2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=2-12-3=-13[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{4+9+1}[/math]
 [math]\times \sqrt{1+16+9}[/math]
 [math]\times \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=-13[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\sqrt{13}}{2 \sqrt{7}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #952 (ID: 200080)

Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{39}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\sqrt{\frac{-1}{39}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{36}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2-3}{\sqrt{13} \times \sqrt{3}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}\right)[/math]

Question #953 (ID: 200081)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\sqrt{3 \hat{i}}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}, B=\sqrt{3 \hat{i}}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]A[/math] ডেক্টরের উপর [math]B[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ হবে কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sqrt{5}}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ[math]\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|}=\frac{3+3-2}{\sqrt{3+1+1}}=\frac{4}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #954 (ID: 200085)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2012-2013, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{O A}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{O B}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A B}}|[/math] নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
B. [math]2\sqrt{19}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]4\sqrt{19}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2\sqrt{19}[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}|[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}|[/math]
 [math]=|2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+36+36}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{76}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{19}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #955 (ID: 200087)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{r}=2 t \hat{i}+3 t^{2} \hat{j}[/math] হচ্ছে একটি বিন্দুবস্তুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর, যেখানে t হচ্ছে সময়। বস্তুটির বেগ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2 t \hat{i}[/math]
খ. [math]2 \hat{i}+6 t \hat{j}[/math]
গ. [math]6 \mathrm{t} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \hat{i}+3 t \hat{j}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2 \hat{i}+6 t \hat{j}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=2 \mathrm{t} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \mathrm{t}^{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\mathrm{d} \overline{\mathrm{r}}}{\mathrm{dt}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+6 \mathrm{t} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #956 (ID: 200088)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ভেক্টর [math]\cos \alpha \cos \beta \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\cos \alpha \sin \beta \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\sin \alpha \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] একটি-

Options:
A. শূন্য ভেক্টর
B. একক ভেক্টর
C. ধ্রুব ভেক্টর
D. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
মান = [math]\sqrt{(\cos \alpha \cos \beta)^{2}+(\cos \alpha \sin \beta)^{2}+\sin ^{2} \alpha}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\cos ^{2} \alpha\left(\cos ^{2} \beta+\sin ^{2} \beta\right)+\sin ^{2} \alpha}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\cos ^{2} \alpha+\sin ^{2} \alpha}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1}=1[/math]
 1 অর্থাৎ একক ভেক্টর

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #957 (ID: 200089)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{a}=\mathbf{a}_{1} \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\mathbf{a}_{2} \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\mathbf{a}_{3} \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এর একক ভেক্টর জন্য-

[math]\text { (i) } \hat{\mathrm{a}}=\frac{\underline{\mathrm{a}}}{|\mathrm{a}|} \text {, (ii) }|\overline{\mathrm{a}}|=1 \text {, (iii) }|\mathrm{a}| 
eq 0[/math] হলে, নিচের সত্য-

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. i
D. ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\text { (i) } \hat{a}=\frac{a}{|a|}[/math]
 যা সত্য [math]\text { (ii) }|\bar{a}|=1[/math]
 কিন্তু [math]
eq 1[/math]
 যা সত্য নয়[math]\text { (iii) }|\mathrm{a}|=\sqrt{\mathrm{a}_{1}{ }_{1}+\mathrm{a}_{2}{ }_{2}+\mathrm{a}_{3}^{2}} 
eq 0[/math]
 যা সত্য

Explanation:

Question #958 (ID: 200090)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}|=3[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}} . \vec{Q}=8[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 17
B. 21
C. 24
D. 33


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math](\vec{P}+\vec{Q}) \cdot \vec{P}[/math]
 [math]=\vec{P} \cdot \vec{P}+\vec{Q} \cdot \vec{P}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{P}^{2}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math]
 [math]=9+8[/math]
 [math]=17 \quad[/math]
 [math]\because|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}|[/math]
 [math]=3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{P}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=9[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #960 (ID: 200060)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ঘনকের পার্শ্ব বাহুগুলি [math]\overrightarrow{O A}=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}, \overrightarrow{O B}=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math], [math]\overrightarrow{O C}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{k}[/math] হলে তার আয়তন হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{13}[/math]
B. 4
C. [math]\frac{2}{7}[/math]
D. 7


Correct Answer: B.4

Solution:
আয়তন = [math]=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}2 & -3 & 0 \\1 & 1 & -1 \\3 & 0 & -1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=2(-1+0)+3[/math]
 [math](-1+3)+0(0-3)[/math]
 [math]=-2+6+0[/math]
 [math]=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #961 (ID: 200061)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a-[/math]এর মান কত হলে [math]a \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat k[/math] এবং [math]2 a \hat{i}-a \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. [math]1,2[/math]
B. [math]-1,-2[/math]
C. [math]2,-1[/math]
D. [math]-2,1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-2,1[/math]

Solution:
[math]2 a^{2}+2 a-4=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+a-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+2 a-a-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a(a+2)-1(a+2)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(a+2)(a-1)=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #962 (ID: 200062)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি ভেক্টর পরস্পর লম্ব হওয়ার শর্ত কি?

Options:
ক. তাদের ডট গুণন শূন্য হয়
খ. তাদের ক্রস গুণন শূন্য হয়
গ. তাদের ডট গুণন এক হয়
ঘ. তাদের ক্রস গুণন এক হয়


Correct Answer: A.তাদের ডট গুণন শূন্য হয়

Solution:
[math]\bar{A} \cdot \bar{B}=0[/math]
 হলে [math]\mathrm{AB} \cos \theta=0 \Rightarrow \cos \theta=0 \Rightarrow \theta=90^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #963 (ID: 200063)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x-অক্ষের সাথে কত ডিগ্রী কোণ তৈরি করে?

Options:
ক. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]45^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}, \mathrm{A}_{\mathrm{x}}=2[/math]
 [math]\cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{A_{X}}{|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2}{\sqrt{2^{2}+2^{2}}}=\frac{2}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=45^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #964 (ID: 200065)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}=[/math] [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{O B}}=\mathbf{i}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A B}}[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math]
B. [math]\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math]
C. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
D. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{\mathbf{i}}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #965 (ID: 200066)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(- 4, 3,0) বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর R হলে, নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \vec{R}=-4 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}\\\text{ii. } |\vec{R}|=5\end{array}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{R}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি Z অক্ষের উপর লম্ব

Options:
ক. i, ii
খ. ii, iii
গ. i, iii
ঘ. i, ii, iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\vec{R}=-4 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+0 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=-4 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\vec{R}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(-4)^{2}+3^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{5^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=5[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{R}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটি z অক্ষের উপর লম্ব। [math]\theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{0}{\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=90^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #966 (ID: 200068)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}[/math] ভেক্টরটি X অক্ষের সাথে কত ডিগ্রি কোণ তৈরি করে?

Options:
ক. 30°
খ. 45°
গ. 90°
ঘ. 180°


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
কোণ [math]\theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}) \cdot \hat{\mathrm{i}}}{\sqrt{2^{2}+2^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{2}{2 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=45^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #967 (ID: 200069)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{u}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{v}=6 \hat{i}+\alpha \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\alpha[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 3
B. - 3
C. 9
D. -9


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ভেক্টরদ্বয় সমান্তরাল হলে[math]\frac{a_{1}}{a_{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{b_{1}}{b_{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{c_{1}}{c_{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{2}{6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{-3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha=9[/math]
 [math]\text { Ans : C. }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #968 (ID: 200070)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{u}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{v}}=6 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\alpha \hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\alpha[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 3
B. - 3
C. 9
D. -9


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{2}{6}=\frac{3}{\alpha}=\frac{-1}{-3} \Rightarrow \alpha=3 \times 3=9[/math]

Explanation:

Question #969 (ID: 200072)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]3 \sqrt{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]3 \sqrt{2}[/math]

Solution:
নির্ণেয় অভিক্ষেপ [math]\frac{\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}}{|\vec{a}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1 \times 3+1 \times 3}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]=3 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #970 (ID: 200073)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টেরের বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=5 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ নির্ণয় কর?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{4}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{5}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\vec{b}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]= \vec{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(10-3-4)}{\left(\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}\right)^{2}}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{9}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ = [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(10-3-4)}{\left(\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}\right)^{2}}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})=\frac{3}{9}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})=\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]

Question #971 (ID: 200074)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{1}{2} \hat{i}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{j}+ a \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি একক ভেক্টর হলে a এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{15}}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{7}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\because \frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{a} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 একটি একক ভেক্টর।[math]\therefore \sqrt{\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{9}+a^{2}}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1-\frac{1}{4}-\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{36-9-4}{36}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{23}{36} \therefore a[/math]
 [math]= \pm\frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #972 (ID: 200042)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2010-2011, 2002-2003, 2013-2014, 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}=2 \overline{\mathrm{i}}-\overline{\mathrm{j}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-6 \overline{\mathrm{j}}-2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\alpha=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{PQ}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3 \times 2+6-4}{3 \times 7}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #973 (ID: 200043)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]XOZ[/math] তলের সমান্তরাল এবং [math]3 \underline{i}-\mathrm{j}+4 \underline{k}[/math] ভেক্টরের সাথে লম্ব একক ভেক্টরটি হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]4 \underline{i}-3 \underline{k}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{5}(4 \underline{i}-3 \underline{k})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{5}(3 \underline{i}-4 \underline{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\underline{j}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{1}{5}(4 \underline{i}-3 \underline{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]XOZ[/math]
 তলের সমান্তরাল [math]\therefore \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 উপাংশ থাকবে [math]\therefore[/math]
 লম্ব সেহেতু ডট গুণফল শূন্য[math]\therefore \text { (b) option }[/math]
 গ্রহণযোগ্য। [math][\because[/math]
 লম্ব একক [math]vector[/math]
, সেহেতু [math](b)][/math]
 [math]\text { Alternate: XOZ }[/math]
 তলের সমান্তরাল। [math]\therefore \mathrm{y}[/math]
 অক্ষের উপর লম্ব ।তাহলে [math]\vec{\eta}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\0 & 1 & 0 \\3 & -1 & 4\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \hat{\eta}=\frac{1}{5}[/math]
 [math](4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:

Question #974 (ID: 200044)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{\alpha}[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{i}-\alpha \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. 1 অথবা -2
B. 1 অথবা 2
C. -1 অথবা 3
D. 1 অথবা -3


Correct Answer: A.1 অথবা -2

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 [math]=\alpha \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{k} ; \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \alpha \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\alpha \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{k}[/math]
লম্ব হলে [math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha \cdot 2 \alpha+(-2)(-\alpha)-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #975 (ID: 200045)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=2 \hat{i}+6 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=\lambda \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+4 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ এর মান 4 একক হলে, [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান বের কর।

Options:
A. 1
B. 2
C. 5
D. 4


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \times \lambda+6 \times 1+3 \times 4}{\sqrt{2^{2}+6^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \lambda+6+12}{7}[/math]
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]\frac{2 \lambda+18}{7}[/math]
 [math]=4[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lambda[/math]
 [math]=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #976 (ID: 200046)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{v}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}}=9[/math] এবং [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}}|=3 \sqrt{3}[/math] হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\vec{u} \times \vec{v}|=u v \sin \theta=3 \sqrt{3} \cdots(i)[/math]
 [math]\vec{u} . \vec{v}=u v \cos \theta=9...(ii)[/math]
 [math]\text { (i) } \div(\text { ii }) \Rightarrow \tan \theta=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \Rightarrow \theta=\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #977 (ID: 200047)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{u}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{v}}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{u}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathbf{v}}=9[/math] এবং [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{u}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathbf{v}}|=[/math] [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math] হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}}=9[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{uv} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=9[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots . \text { (i) }[/math]
 [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}}|[/math]
 [math]=3 \sqrt{3} \Rightarrow \mathrm{uv} \sin \theta[/math]
 [math]=3 \sqrt{3} \text{.}[/math]
 [math]\text{(ii) } \div \text{ (i) }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \tan \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 \sqrt{3}}{9}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta[/math]
 [math]=\tan ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #978 (ID: 200048)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a} = 4\hat{i} + 2\hat{j} - 3\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{b} = a\hat{i} - 3\hat{j} + 2\hat{k}[/math] যদি পরস্পর লম্ব হয় তবে [math]a[/math] এর মান

Options:
A. ২
B. ৩
C. [math]-৩[/math]
D. ৪


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ভেক্টর লম্ব হলে [math]\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b} = 0[/math]
। তাই [math]4a + (-6) + (-6) = 0 \Rightarrow 4a = 12 \Rightarrow a = 3[/math]
।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #979 (ID: 200049)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}=9 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-6 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}=9 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-6 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \perp \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}\\\text{ii. } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \| \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}\\\text{iii. } |\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}|=\sqrt{118}\end{array}[/math]

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
i. এর জন্য [math]\vec{P} \cdot \vec{Q}[/math]
 [math]=36-6-30=36-36=0 \therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \perp \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math]
 যা সত্য ।ii. এর জন্য [math]\frac{9}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{-6}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-6}{5}[/math]
 যা সত্য নয়।iii. এর জন্য [math]|\vec{P}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9^{2}+1^{2}+(-6)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{118}[/math]
 যা সত্য।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #980 (ID: 200050)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]5 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]15 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+6 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+9 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান কত?

Options:
A. 0°
B. 30°
C. 60°
D. 90°
E. 135°


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\alpha=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{75+12+27}{\sqrt{5^{2}+2^{2}+3^{2}} \sqrt{(15)^{2}+6^{2}+9^{2}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{114}{\sqrt{38} \sqrt{342}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{114}{114}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} 1[/math]
 [math]=0^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #981 (ID: 200051)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit C)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x- অক্ষরেখার সাথে যে কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তার মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1} \sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1} \sqrt{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1} 1[/math]
ঙ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{(\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}) \cdot \hat{i}}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}+1^{2}}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #982 (ID: 200052)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2006-2007, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{\alpha}[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{i}-\alpha \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. - 2, 1
B. 2,-1
C. 2,1
D. -2,-1


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\alpha .2 \alpha+(-2)(-\alpha)+1(-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha^{2}+\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha(\alpha+2)-(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\alpha-1)(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #983 (ID: 200053)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{1}{2} \hat{i}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{j}+ a \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি একক ভেক্টর হলে a এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{15}}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{7}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\because \frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{a} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 একটি একক ভেক্টর।[math]\therefore \sqrt{\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{9}+a^{2}}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1-\frac{1}{4}-\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{36-9-4}{36}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{23}{36} \therefore a[/math]
 [math]= \pm\frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #984 (ID: 200055)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সামন্তরিকের সন্নিহিত বাহু দুটি যথাক্রমে [math]\vec{A}=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=\hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] হলে সামন্তরিকের ক্ষেত্রফল-

Options:
ক. [math]10 \sqrt{2}[/math] বর্গ একক
খ. [math]10 \sqrt{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
গ. [math]3 \sqrt{10}[/math] বর্গ একক
ঘ. [math]2\sqrt{10}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: B.[math]10 \sqrt{3}[/math] বর্গ একক

Solution:
[math]\mid \vec{A} \times \vec{B}[/math]
 [math]=\left|\begin{array}{rrr}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\3 & 1 & -2 \\1 & -3 & 4\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}(4-6)[/math]
 [math]-\hat{j}(12+2)[/math]
 [math]+\hat{k}(-9-1)[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{i}-14 \hat{j}-10 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(-2)^{2}+(-14)^{2}+(-10)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{300}=10 \sqrt{3}[/math]
বর্ণ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #985 (ID: 200056)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}, \vec{B}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{C}=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+a \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর তিনটি সমতলীয় হলে a এর মান-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-31}{5}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-31}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-31}{3}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{31}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-\frac{31}{6}[/math]

Solution:
সমতলীয় হলে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}2 & 1 & -1 \\1 & 2 & 3 \\2 & -3 & a\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]2(2 a+9)-1(a-6)[/math]
 [math]-1(-3-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 a+18-a+6+7=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 a=-31[/math]
 [math]\therefore a[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{31}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #986 (ID: 200058)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\mathbf{2} \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\mathbf{m} \hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=10 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-5 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-15 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে m এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. - 1
B. 2
C. 3
D. -5


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{2}{10}=\frac{m}{-5}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-3}{-15}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{2}{10}=\frac{m}{-5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 10 m[/math]
 [math]=-10 \therefore m[/math]
 [math]=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #987 (ID: 200059)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{X}=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Y}}=-3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\boldsymbol{Y}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{x}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\frac{16}{\sqrt{14}}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{16}{\sqrt{29}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{14}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{-3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}}{\sqrt{29}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-\frac{16}{\sqrt{14}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\boldsymbol{Y}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{x}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\vec{X}} \cdot \vec{Y}}{|\vec{Y}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2(-3)+(-3) \times 2+4(-1)}{\sqrt{(-3)^{2}+2^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-6-6-4}{\sqrt{9+4+1}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{16}{\sqrt{14}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #988 (ID: 200026)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\vec{v}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এর অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ-

Options:
A. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]60^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{u} \cdot \vec{v}[/math]
 [math]=u v \cos \theta \Rightarrow 6-2+3[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2^{2}+1+9}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \sqrt{9+4+1} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 7[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{14} \cdot \sqrt{14} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{7}{14}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta[/math]
 [math]=60^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #989 (ID: 200027)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি যে সামান্তরিকের সন্নিহিত বাহু তার ক্ষেত্রফল হবে-

Options:
A. [math]3 \sqrt{3} \text { sq unit }[/math]
B. [math]6 \sqrt{3} \text { sq unit }[/math]
C. [math]6 \sqrt{6} \text { sq unit }[/math]
D. [math]3 \sqrt{6} \text { sq unit }[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]6 \sqrt{6} \text { sq unit }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 [math]=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{k} \\4 & -3 & 2 \\2 & -3 & 4\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=-6 \hat{i}-12 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math]
এখন, [math]|\vec{a} \times \vec{b}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{6^{2}+12^{2}+6^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=6 \sqrt{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #990 (ID: 200029)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\vec{Q}=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{5}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]

Solution:
অভিক্ষেপ [math]=Q \cos \theta=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{P}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5 \cdot 2-3 \cdot 1+2(-2)}{\sqrt{5^{2}+(-3)^{2}+2^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #991 (ID: 200030)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]b=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে নিম্নের কোনটি সত্য?

Options:
A. [math]a \cdot b=0[/math]
B. [math]a \wedge b=0[/math]
C. [math](a+b) \cdot(a-b)=0[/math]
D. [math](a+b) \wedge(a-b)=0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](a+b) \cdot(a-b)=0[/math]

Solution:
[math]a+b=4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}, a-b[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(a+b) \cdot(a-b)[/math]
 [math]=-8+3+5[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #992 (ID: 200031)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=\mathbf{3} \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে নিম্নের কোনটি সত্য?

Options:
A. [math]\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=0[/math]
B. [math]\vec{a} \wedge \vec{b}=0[/math]
C. [math](\vec{a}+\vec{b}) \cdot(\vec{a}-\vec{b})=0[/math]
D. [math](\vec{a}+\vec{b}) \cdot(\vec{a}-\vec{b})=0[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math](\vec{a}+\vec{b}) \cdot(\vec{a}-\vec{b})=0[/math]

Solution:
[math](\vec{a}+\vec{b})=4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{k} 3(\vec{a}-\vec{b})[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math](\vec{a}+\vec{b})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\vec{a}-\vec{b})[/math]
 [math]=-8+3+5=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #993 (ID: 200033)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2006-2007, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{\alpha}[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{i}-\alpha \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. - 2, 1
B. 2,-1
C. 2,1
D. -2,-1


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\alpha .2 \alpha+(-2)(-\alpha)+1(-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha^{2}+\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha(\alpha+2)-(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\alpha-1)(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #994 (ID: 200035)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে [math]\frac{1}{2} \underline{i}+\frac{1}{3} j+a \underline k[/math] ভেক্টরটি একটি একক ভেক্টর হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{15}}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{7}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]1=\sqrt{\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{9}+a^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{36}+a^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}=\frac{23}{36} \therefore a[/math]
 [math]=\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #995 (ID: 200036)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{1}{2} \hat{i}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{j}+ a \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি একক ভেক্টর হলে a এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{15}}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{7}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\because \frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{a} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 একটি একক ভেক্টর।[math]\therefore \sqrt{\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{9}+a^{2}}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1-\frac{1}{4}-\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{36-9-4}{36}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{23}{36} \therefore a[/math]
 [math]= \pm\frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
