Question #996 (ID: 200039)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{P}=a \hat{\imath}-2 \hat{\jmath}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{Q}=2 a \hat{\imath}-a \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হলে, a- এর মান কত হবে? [math]\text { (If } \vec{P}=a i-2 j+k[/math] and [math]\vec{Q}=2 a \hat{i}-a \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] are perpendicular, than what is the value of a?)

Options:
A. 1, 2
B. -1, 2
C. 1, -2
D. -1, 2


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ভেক্টর দুটির উত্তলন[math]P \cdot Q[/math]
 [math]=2 a^{2}+2 a-4[/math]
যেহেতু, ভেক্টর দুটি পরষ্পর লম্ব[math]\therefore 2 a^{2}[/math]
 [math]+2 a-4=0[/math]
এখন উপাদান বিশ্লেষণ করলে।[math]2 a^{2}+2 a-[/math]
 [math]4=0[/math]
 [math]a^{2}+[/math]
 [math]a-2=0[/math]
 [math]a^{2}+2[/math]
 [math]a-a-2=0[/math]
 [math]a(a+2)-1[/math]
 [math](a+2)=0[/math]
 [math](a-1)(a+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]a=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:
দুটি ভেক্টর পরষ্পর লম্ব হলে তাদের ডট গুনন শূন্য হয়।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #997 (ID: 200040)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+4 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-5 \hat{k}, \overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}=-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. 111.01°
B. 110.49°
C. 101.49°
D. 69°


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\cos \theta=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{PQ}}=\frac{-9}{\sqrt{45} \sqrt{14}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-9}{\sqrt{45} \sqrt{14}}\right)=111.01^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #998 (ID: 200041)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2010-2011, 2008-2009, 2009-2010, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\underline{\mathrm{A}}=2 \underline{\mathrm{i}}-\underline{\mathrm{j}}+3 \underline{\mathrm{k}}, \underline{\mathrm{B}}=3 \mathrm{i}+4 \underline{\mathrm{j}}-5 \underline{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\underline{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ হচ্ছে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{13}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-13}{10 \sqrt{7}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7}{5 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{-13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{B}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \times 3+4(-1)+3 \times(-5)}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}+(-5)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #999 (ID: 199999)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]|\vec{a}|=3,|\vec{b}|=5[/math] এবং [math]|\vec{a}-\vec{b}|=7[/math] হয় তবে [math]\vec{a}[/math] ও [math]\vec{b}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটির মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]220^{\circ}[/math]
ঙ. [math]135^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]120^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:

[Image]
[math]|\vec{a}|=3,|\vec{b}|[/math]
 [math]=5 ;|\vec{a}-\vec{b}|[/math]
 [math]=7 ; 7^{2}=5^{2}+3^{2}+2.5 .3(0)[/math]
 [math](\pi-\alpha) \therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=120^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1001 (ID: 200002)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: """Begum Rokeya University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}[/math] ও [math]\vec{b}[/math] দুইটি একক ভেক্টর এবং [math]\vec{a}+2 \vec{b} \times 5 \vec{a}-4 \vec{b}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব - হলে এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\vec{a}[/math] ও [math]\vec{b}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ -

Options:
ক. 45°
খ. 60°
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math](\vec{a}+2 \vec{b})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(5 \vec{a}-4 \vec{b})=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 5 \mathrm{a}^{2}-4 \vec{a} \cdot[/math]
 [math]\vec{b}+10 \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}-8 b^{2}[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow 6 \vec{a}[/math]
 [math]\cdot \vec{b}[/math]
 [math]=8-5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a b \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{6}=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}=\cos 60^{\circ} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta[/math]
 [math]=60^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1002 (ID: 200004)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2010-2011, 2010-2011, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overline{\mathrm{u}}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overline{\mathrm{v}}=\lambda \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হয়, হবে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]\frac{13}{4}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{13}{4}[/math]

Solution:
[math]4 \lambda-4-9=0,4 \lambda=13 \Rightarrow \lambda=\frac{13}{4}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1003 (ID: 200005)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
The component of the vector [math]\vec{B}[/math] [math]=5 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] along the vector [math]\vec{A}[/math] [math]=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k} \text { will be- }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\vec{B}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=|\vec{B}| \cdot \frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}||\vec{B}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5.2-3.1-2.2}{\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{3}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1004 (ID: 200006)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Given that } \vec{C}=\vec{A} \times \vec{B} \text { and } \vec{D}=\vec{B} \times \vec{A} \text {. What is the angle between } C \text { and } D \text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]180^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{D}=\vec{B} \times \vec{A}=(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})=-\vec{C}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1005 (ID: 200007)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
স্রোতের বেগের মানের √2 গুণ বেগে সাঁতার কেটে একজন সাঁতারু নদীর অপর পাড়ে সোজাসুজি গিয়ে পৌঁছাল। নদীর তীরের সাথে সাঁতারুর বেগের নতি নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. 120°
খ. 130°
গ. 135°
ঘ. 65°


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ধরি, স্রোতের বেগ V.:. সাঁতারুর বেগ √2 Vধরি, নদীর তীরের সাথে সাঁতারুর বেগের নতি = [math]\alpha[/math]
 যেহেতু লব্ধি নদীরতীরের সাথে 90° কোণ তৈরি করে,[math]\therefore \cos \alpha=-[/math]
 (স্রোতের বেগ/সাঁতারুর বেগ) [math]=-\frac{V}{\sqrt{2} V}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=135^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:
সোজসোজি পারাপারের ক্ষেত্রে কোনো $ [math]\therefore \cos \alpha=-[/math] (স্রোতের বেগ/সাঁতারুর বেগ) $ তা কি সাঁতারুর বেগ' জানো? সোজাসোজি পারাপারের ক্ষেত্রে লব্ধি অনুভূমিক বেগের সাথে 90° কোণ করে থাকে। অনুভূমিক বেগটা হচ্ছে নদীর স্রোতের বেগ: ধরি, সেটির মান P। আর সাঁতারুর বেগ Q এবং স্রোতের বেগ ও সাঁতারুর বেগের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ α ।

Sub-Questions:

Question #1006 (ID: 200009)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] বরাবর একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}+1^{2}}}=\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1007 (ID: 200010)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]Q(2,3,-1)[/math] এবং [math]P(4,-3,2)[/math] হলে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}|=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. 3
B. 4
C. 7
D. 12


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
Q বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{O Q}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{k}[/math]
P বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{O P}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{P Q}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{O Q}-\overrightarrow{O P}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{\mathrm{k}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overrightarrow{P Q}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+36+9}[/math]
 [math]=7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1008 (ID: 200011)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}},[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]4[/math]
D. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
[math]\bar{a} \cdot \bar{b}[/math]
 [math]=(\hat{i}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=1 \cdot 0+0 \cdot 3+1 \cdot(-2)[/math]
 [math]=-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1009 (ID: 200012)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
m এর মান কত হলে [math]\vec{P}=4 \hat{i}+m \hat{j}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{Q}=6 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]6[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]-6[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]6[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{Sol}^{\mathrm{n}}: \overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{Q}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(4 \hat{i}+m \hat{j})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(6 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k})=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 24-4 \mathrm{~m}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{m}=6 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (b) }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1010 (ID: 200013)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}^{}=-3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] হলে তাদের অন্তর্গত কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-6}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{6}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overline{\mathrm{A}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}+1^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\bar{B}=-3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\bar{B}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(-3)^{2}+2^{2}+1^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\bar{A} \cdot \bar{B}[/math]
 [math]=-3 \cdot 1+(-1) \cdot 2+1 \cdot 1[/math]
 [math]=-4[/math]
 [math]\cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\overline{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{B}}}{|\overline{\mathrm{A}}||\overline{\mathrm{B}}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-4}{\sqrt{3} \cdot \sqrt{14}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-4}{\sqrt{42}}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1011 (ID: 200014)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{a}=\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\underline{b}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\underline{\mathbf{b}}[/math] এর উপর [math]\underline{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর অভিক্ষেপ কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{8}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{8}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{20}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{20}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{8}{7}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]=a \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}}{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2-6+12}{\sqrt{2^{2}+3^{2}+(-6)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8}{7}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1012 (ID: 200015)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর

[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এর অংশক কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{21} \hat{a}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{21} \hat{a}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+4[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}+\hat{j}+3[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}[/math]
 এর অংশক[math]=\left(\frac{\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}}{\mathrm{a}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\vec{a}}{\mathrm{a}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2+4-3}{\sqrt{2^{2}+4^{2}+(-1)^{2}}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}}[/math]
 [math]\hat{a}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1013 (ID: 200016)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সামান্তরিকের দুইটি সন্নিহিত বাহু [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}[/math] হলে উহার প্রধান কর্ণের দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. [math]|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]
গ. [math]|\vec{P} \times \vec{Q}|[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}|\vec{P} \times \vec{Q}|[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]

Solution:
সামন্তরিকের প্রধান কর্ণের দৈর্ঘ্য [math]=|\vec{P}+\vec{Q}|[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1014 (ID: 200017)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]|\vec{a} \times \vec{b}|=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{-1}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{-3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\vec{a} \times \vec{b}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\1 & 1 & 0 \\0 & 1 & 1\end{array}\right|=(1-0) \hat{i}-(1-0) \hat{j}+(1-0) \hat{k}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\therefore|\vec{a} \times \vec{b}|=\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}+1^{2}}=\sqrt{3}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

[math]\text { i. } \hat{a}=\frac{\vec{a}}{|\vec{a}|}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \hat{\mathrm{a}}=1[/math] [math]\text { iii. }|\vec{a}| 
eq 0[/math]

Question #1017 (ID: 200020)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P(1,3,4)[/math] ও [math]Q (2, 3, 5)[/math] হলে –

i. [math]Q[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math] এর একক ভেক্টর [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{26}}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}[/math] এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
iii. সঠিক নয়, কারণ, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math]
 বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ[math]=\frac{(\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}) \cdot(2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k})}{\sqrt{1^{2}+3^{2}+4^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2-9+20}{\sqrt{26}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{\sqrt{26}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
কোন ভেক্টরের সুনির্দিষ্ট দিক নেই?

Options:
ক. প্রকৃত ভেক্টর
খ. একক ভেক্টর
গ. শূন্য ভেক্টর
ঘ. লম্ব ভেক্টর


Correct Answer: C.শূন্য ভেক্টর

Solution:
যে ভেক্টর রাশির দৈর্ঘ্য অর্থাৎ মান শূন্য ও কোনো নির্দিষ্ট দিক নেই তাকে শূন্য ভেক্টর বলে।

Question #1020 (ID: 200023)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2006-2007, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{\alpha}[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{i}-\alpha \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. - 2, 1
B. 2,-1
C. 2,1
D. -2,-1


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\alpha .2 \alpha+(-2)(-\alpha)+1(-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha^{2}+\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha(\alpha+2)-(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\alpha-1)(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1021 (ID: 200025)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] ও [math]\vec{v}=\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এর অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ-

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}(1 / \sqrt{3})[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1}(1 / 3)[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}(1 / 2)[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1}(1 / \sqrt{2})[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}(1 / 2)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos \left(u^{\wedge} v\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{u} \cdot \vec{v}}{u \cdot v}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{0+1+0}{\sqrt{2} \cdot \sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore u^{\wedge} v[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1022 (ID: 199993)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2012-2013, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{O A}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{O B}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A B}}|[/math] নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
B. [math]2\sqrt{19}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]4\sqrt{19}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2\sqrt{19}[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}|[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}|[/math]
 [math]=|2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+36+36}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{76}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{19}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1023 (ID: 199994)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}} \text { - }[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের পরিমাণ কত?

Options:
A. 0°
B. 45°
C. 90°
D. 180°


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\because 1(-1)+(-1)(1)+1(2)[/math]
 [math]=-1-1+2=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 মধ্যবর্তী কোণ = 90°

Explanation:

Question #1024 (ID: 199996)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+10 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-11 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{13}{15}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{12}{15}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{13}{14}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{12}{14}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{13}{15}[/math]

Solution:
উপাংশ [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|} \hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2\times2+10\times2+\left(-11\right)\times1}{\sqrt{2^2+10^2+\left(-11\right)^2}}\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4+20-11}{\sqrt{4+100+121}}\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{\sqrt{225}}\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{15}\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1025 (ID: 199997)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2010-2011, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{i}+\underline{j}+\underline{k}[/math] এবং [math]3 \underline{i}+3 \underline{j}-6 \underline{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{\vec{A} \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}| \vec{B} \mid}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{3+3-6}{\sqrt{3} \cdot 3 \sqrt{6}}[/math]
 [math]=90[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1026 (ID: 199998)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{O}} \mathrm{A}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{O} B}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A} B}|=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{20}[/math]
C. [math]2 \sqrt{19}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{20}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]2 \sqrt{19}[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}|[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}|[/math]
 [math]=|2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+6 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2^{2}+6^{2}+6^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{76}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{19}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1027 (ID: 199982)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


উদ্দীপকের আলোকে,

i. ভেক্টর যোগের ত্রিভুজ সূত্রানুযায়ী [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]

ii. ভেক্টরের বিয়োগ অনুযায়ী [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]

iii. ভেক্টর যোগের সামান্তরিক সূত্রানুযায়ী $$

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i
B. i ও iii
C. iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ii. সঠিক নয়। কারণ ভেক্টরের বিয়োগ অনুযায়ী[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1028 (ID: 199983)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ও [math]\underline{\mathbf{b}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটির মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\theta(0 \leq \theta \leq \pi)[/math] হলে—

i. [math]\underline{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{b}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\underline{b}| \cos \theta[/math]

ii. [math]\underline{\mathbf{b}}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\underline{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=|\underline{a}| \cos \theta \hat{\mathrm{b}}[/math]

iii. [math]\theta=\sin ^{-1} \frac{\underline{\mathrm{|a}} \times \underline{\mathrm{b}} \mid}{|\underline{\mathrm{a}}| \underline{\mathrm{b}} \mid}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
(i) [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=(|\overline{\mathrm{B}}| \cos \theta) \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 যেখানে [math]\hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 হচ্ছে [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর একক ভেক্টর।(ii) [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=(|\overline{\mathrm{A}}| \cos \theta) \hat{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 যেখানে [math]\hat{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 হচ্ছে [math]\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর একক ভেক্টর।(i) [math]\hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\hat{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\overline{\mathrm{b}}| \cos \theta=\frac{\overline{\mathrm{a}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{b}}}{|\overline{\mathrm{a}}|}[/math]
(ii) [math]\overline{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overline{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\overline{\mathrm{a}}| \cos \theta=\frac{\overline{\mathrm{a}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{b}}}{|\overline{\mathrm{b}}|}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1029 (ID: 199984)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathbf{A}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ও [math]B=6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]

উদ্দীপকের আলোকে-

i. [math]|\overline{\mathrm{A}}-\overline{\mathrm{B}}|[/math] এর মান [math]42[/math]

ii. y-অক্ষের উপর [math]\overline{\mathbf{B}}[/math] এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]–3[/math]

iii. x অক্ষ বরাবর [math]\overline{\mathbf{A}}[/math] এর উপাংশ [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. ii
খ. iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]2 \overline{\mathrm{A}}-\overline{\mathrm{B}}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]-(6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|2 \overline{\mathrm{A}}-\overline{\mathrm{B}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+49}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{53}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1030 (ID: 199985)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathbf{A}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ও [math]B=6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] [math]\overline{\mathrm {B}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি অক্ষের সাথে নিচের কোন কোণটি উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{3}{49}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{49}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta =\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{(6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}) \cdot \hat{j}}{|6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{b}|}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{-3}{7}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1031 (ID: 199986)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathbf{A}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ও [math]B=6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] [math]\overline{\mathbf{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর একক ভেক্টর নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{7}(6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{7}(6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{1}{7}(6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{1}{\sqrt{31}}(6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{7}(6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
নির্ণেয় ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{36+9+4}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}}{7}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1032 (ID: 199987)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathbf{A}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ও [math]B=6 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]

উদ্দীপকের আলোকে

i. z অক্ষের উপর [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরটির অভিক্ষেপ [math]\hat{k}[/math]

ii. x অক্ষ বরাবর [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরটির অংশক [math]6 \hat{\mathrm i}[/math]

iii. ভেক্টর দুইটির লম্বি [math]8 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
অভিক্ষেপ সর্বদা বাস্তব সংখ্যা এবং অংশক সর্বদা ভেক্টর রাশি হবে ।

Explanation:

Question #1033 (ID: 199988)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\bar{A}=-3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+6 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটির মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]49[/math]
B. [math]31[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]-7[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\overline{\mathrm{A}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9+4+36}[/math]
 [math]=7 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (c) }[/math]

Question #1034 (ID: 199989)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\mathbf{a} \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ও [math]-4 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হলে a এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-3[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]-5[/math]
D. [math]5[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]-5[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হলে,[math](2 \hat{i}+a \hat{j}-\hat{k}) \cdot(-4 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})=0[/math]
 হবে[math]\Rightarrow -8-2 a-2=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1035 (ID: 199990)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A+B=A-B[/math] হলে [math]A[/math] ও [math]B[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A+B=A-B[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (A+B) \cdot(A+B)[/math]
 [math]=(A-B) \cdot(A-B)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow A^{2}+B^{2}+2 A \cdot B[/math]
 [math]=A^{2}+B^{2}-2 A \cdot B[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 A \cdot B=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathbf{A}[/math]
 ও [math]B[/math]
 পরস্পর লম্ব।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1036 (ID: 199991)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2006-2007, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{\alpha}[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{i}-\alpha \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. - 2, 1
B. 2,-1
C. 2,1
D. -2,-1


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\alpha .2 \alpha+(-2)(-\alpha)+1(-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha^{2}+\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha(\alpha+2)-(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\alpha-1)(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1037 (ID: 199992)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2010-2011, 2008-2009, 2009-2010, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\underline{\mathrm{A}}=2 \underline{\mathrm{i}}-\underline{\mathrm{j}}+3 \underline{\mathrm{k}}, \underline{\mathrm{B}}=3 \mathrm{i}+4 \underline{\mathrm{j}}-5 \underline{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\underline{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ হচ্ছে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{13}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-13}{10 \sqrt{7}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7}{5 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{-13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{B}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \times 3+4(-1)+3 \times(-5)}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}+(-5)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1038 (ID: 199971)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{A B}=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{A C}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি যে সামান্তরিকের সন্নিহিত বাহু তার ক্ষেত্রফল হবে—

Options:
A. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
B. [math]2 \sqrt{5}[/math]
C. [math]5 \sqrt{6}[/math]
D. [math]6 \sqrt{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]6 \sqrt{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a} \times \vec{b}[/math]
 [math]=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\4 & -3 & 2 \\2 & -3 & 4\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=-6 \hat{i}-12 \hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math]
এখন, [math]|\vec{a} \times \vec{b}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{6^{2}+12^{2}+6^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=6 \sqrt{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1039 (ID: 199972)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm P[/math] বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math](1, 2, 2 )[/math] হলে, [math]P[/math] বিন্দুর —

i. অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

ii. অবস্থান ভেক্টরের মান [math]= 3[/math]

iii. অবস্থান ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর [math]\mathrm {=\frac{1}{3}(\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. ii ও iii
গ. i ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
Concept: [math]|\vec{A}| 
eq 0[/math]
 এবং [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}| 
eq 0[/math]
 হলে,(i) কোনো ভেক্টরদ্বয় লম্ব হবার শর্ত, [math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]
(ii) সমান্তরাল হবার শর্ত হচ্ছে [math]|\vec{A} \times \vec{B}|=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1041 (ID: 199974)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A \cdot B=18[/math] এবং [math]|A \times B|=6 \sqrt{3}[/math] হলে [math]A[/math] ও [math]B[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটির অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]30^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\bar{A} \cdot \bar{B}|=18[/math]
 বা [math]A \cdot B \cos \theta=18[/math]
 [math]|\bar{A} \times \bar{B}|[/math]
 [math]=6 \sqrt{3}[/math]
 বা [math]A B \sin \theta[/math]
 [math]=6 \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \tan \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{6 \sqrt{3}}{18}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore Q[/math]
 [math]=30^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #1043 (ID: 199977)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো সামান্তরিকের সন্নিহিত বাহু দুইটি [math]\mathbf{P}=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]Q=4 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] হলে নিচের কোনটি কর্ণ নির্দেশ করে ?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm {\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm {-\hat{i}-4 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm {7 \hat{i}+2 \hat{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\mathrm {7 \hat{i}+2 \hat{k}}[/math]

Solution:
কর্ন নির্দেশ করলে [math]\vec{p}+\vec{Q}[/math]
 [math]=(3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})+[/math]
 [math](4 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=7 \hat{i}+2 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1044 (ID: 199978)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {(\hat{j} \times \hat{i}) \cdot \hat{k}=}[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]\mathrm i[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
[math](\hat{j} \times \hat{i}) \cdot \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=-\hat{k} \cdot \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=-1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1045 (ID: 199979)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {A=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+6 \hat{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\mathbf{B}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ—

Options:
A. [math]\frac{7}{5} \hat{a}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{6}{7} \hat{b}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5 \hat{b}}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{7} \hat{a}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{5}{7} \hat{a}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{a \cdot b}{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(2 \times 1)+(-3 \times 1)+(6 \times 1)}{\sqrt{4+9+36}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2-3+c}{\sqrt{49}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{7}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1046 (ID: 199980)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {P}(1,1,1)[/math] এবং [math]Q(3,2,-1)[/math] দুইটি বিন্দু হলে [math]\overrightarrow{P Q}[/math] ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm {\frac{1}{2}(\hat{i}-\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm {\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm {\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\mathrm {\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(3-1) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+(2-1) \hat{\mathrm{j}}+(-1-1) \hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+2^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1047 (ID: 199981)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm {5 \hat{i}}[/math] ভেক্টর দ্বারা গঠিত সমতলের উপর লম্ব একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm {\frac{-1}{\sqrt{2}}(\hat{j}+\hat{k})}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm {\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \cdot(\hat{j}-\hat{k})}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm {\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\hat{i}+\hat{j})}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm {\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(\hat{i}+\hat{k})}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\mathrm {\frac{-1}{\sqrt{2}}(\hat{j}+\hat{k})}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A \times B=[/math]
 [math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}i & j & k \\2 & 1 & -1 \\5 & 0 & 0\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}(0-0)[/math]
 [math]-\hat{j}(0+5)[/math]
 [math]+\hat{k}(0-5)[/math]
 [math]=-5 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]-5 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|A \times B|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{25+25}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{50}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{-5 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{50}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{5}[/math]
 [math]\hat{i}+\hat{j}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1048 (ID: 199957)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{A B C}[/math] ত্রিভুজের [math]\mathrm{BC}, \mathrm{C A}, \mathrm{A B}[/math] বাহুগুলির মধ্যবিন্দু যথাক্রমে [math]\mathrm{D}, \mathrm{E}, \mathrm{F}[/math] হলে; নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{BE}}[/math]
B. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
C. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{CF}}[/math]
D. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}=2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]

Solution:

[Image]
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{CD}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore 2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BD}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{CD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BD}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BD}} 2(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}})[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}[/math]
 [math]\text { Shorteut } 2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}, \Rightarrow 2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{2 \mathrm{AF}}[/math]
 [math]+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}[/math]
 [math]+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1049 (ID: 199958)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathrm{A}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{B}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] দুইটি ভেক্টর

[math]\mathrm B[/math] ভেক্টর বরাবর একক ভেক্টর কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math]\left.\frac{1}{9}(2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{29}}(4 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{29}}(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{B}[/math]
 ভেক্টর বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{\vec{B}}{|\vec{B}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}}{\sqrt{2^{2}+2^{2}+1^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1050 (ID: 199959)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathrm{A}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{B}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] দুইটি ভেক্টর

[math]B[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]A[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-3[/math]
খ. [math]3[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]-4[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
[math]B[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]A[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{A \cdot B}{|B|}=\frac{8+6-2}{\sqrt{2^{2}+2^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}=4[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1051 (ID: 199960)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\triangle \mathrm{ABC}[/math] এর শীর্ষ বিন্দু তিনটি [math]\mathrm{A}(3,-1,-2), \mathrm{B}(1,1,-3), \mathrm{C}(4,-3,1)[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] বরাবর একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}(-2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{32}}(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{32}}(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{3}(-2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{A B}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{O B}-\overrightarrow{O A}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k}-3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{(-2)^{2}+2^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](-2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1052 (ID: 199961)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\triangle \mathrm{ABC}[/math] এর শীর্ষ বিন্দু তিনটি [math]\mathrm{A}(3,-1,-2), \mathrm{B}(1,1,-3), \mathrm{C}(4,-3,1)[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}[/math] ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]5 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{B C}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{O C}-\overrightarrow{O B}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{i}-\hat{j}+3[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1053 (ID: 199962)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x-অক্ষের সাথে [math]\mathrm{\theta}[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করলে [math]\cos \theta=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{2}{9}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{9}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
x অক্ষ বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটি x অক্ষের সাথে [math]\theta[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করলে[math]\cos \theta=\frac{-2.1+0-0}{\sqrt{(-2)^{2}+2^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}=\frac{-2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1054 (ID: 199963)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{A}(2,7,4)[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{B}(1,2,3)[/math] দুইটি বিন্দু-

i. [math]\mathrm A[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}[/math] বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{14}}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}[/math] এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}[/math] এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]= 2[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
iii. সঠিক নয়। কারণ;[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}[/math]
 এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}|}=\frac{2+14+12}{\sqrt{1^{2}+2^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{28}{\sqrt{14}}=2 \sqrt{14}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1055 (ID: 199964)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\mathrm{\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{B}|}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{|\overline{\mathrm{A}}|} \cdot \hat{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|} \cdot \hat{B}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\mathrm{\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|}}[/math]

Solution:
(i) [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=(|\overline{\mathrm{B}}| \cos \theta) \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 যেখানে [math]\hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ও হচ্ছে [math]\hat{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর একক ভেক্টর।(ii) [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=(|\overline{\mathrm{A}}| \cos \theta) \hat{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 যেখানে [math]\hat{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 হচ্ছে [math]\hat{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর একক ভেক্টর।(i) [math]\overline{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overline{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\overline{\mathrm{b}}| \cos \theta=\frac{\overline{\mathrm{a}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{b}}}{|\overline{\mathrm{a}}|}[/math]
(ii) [math]\overline{\mathrm{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overline{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\overline{\mathrm{a}}| \cos \theta=\frac{\overline{\mathrm{a}} \cdot \overline{\mathrm{b}}}{|\overline{\mathrm{b}}|}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1056 (ID: 199965)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]Q=3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \sqrt{3} \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি এক বিন্দুতে লম্বভাবে ক্রিয়াশীল। [math]P[/math] এর সাথে এদের লব্ধি ভেক্টরের দিক-

Options:
ক. [math]25^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]59^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]65^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]70^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]59^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
লব্ধি [math]\vec{R}=\vec{P}+\vec{Q}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]-2 \hat{k}+3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{3} \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \hat{i}+4[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+(2 \sqrt{3}-2) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{R}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{RP} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{R}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}}{\mathrm{RP}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{4+8-4 \sqrt{3}+4}{\sqrt{48-8 \sqrt{3} \cdot 3}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=59^{\circ}[/math]
 (প্রায়)

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1057 (ID: 199966)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}[/math] বরাবর একর ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{5}(3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{5}(-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{j})[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{5}(3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{i})[/math]
ঘ. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{5}(3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j})[/math]

Solution:
[math]3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}[/math]
 বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}}{\sqrt{9+16}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}}{5}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1058 (ID: 199967)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ও [math]\vec{B}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]120^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]60^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{(2 \times 3)+(2 x-2)+(-3 x-1)}{\sqrt{4+1+9} \sqrt{9+4+1}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{7}{\sqrt{14} \sqrt{14}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=60^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1059 (ID: 199969)

Question:
[math]P=9 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]Q=4 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+a \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর লম্ব। [math]\mathrm a[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]4[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]5[/math]

Solution:
লম্ব হয়ে [math](9 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-6 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(9 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+a \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore 36-6-6 a[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=5[/math]

Question:

Options:
A. [math]9[/math]
B. [math]-10[/math]
C. [math]11[/math]
D. [math]12[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]11[/math]

 [math]=2+12-3[/math]
 [math]=11[/math]

Question #1061 (ID: 199944)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{a}=3 \hat{i}+\lambda \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}, \vec{b}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{c}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{c}}[/math] এর উপাংশ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{4}{19} \vec{b}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{4}{19} \vec{c}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{8}{11} \vec{b}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{8}{11} \vec{c}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{8}{11} \vec{b}[/math]

Solution:


Explanation:

Question #1062 (ID: 199945)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{a}=3 \hat{i}+\lambda \hat{j}-3 \hat{k},[/math] [math]\vec{b}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{c}=2 \hat{i}+3[/math] [math]\hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math] [math]\vec{a}, \vec{b}[/math] ও [math]\vec{c}[/math] ভেক্টরত্রয় সমতলীয় হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{9}{13}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{13}{9}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{13}{9}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{9}{13}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{9}{13}[/math]

Solution:
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}3 & \lambda & -3 \\3 & -1 & -1 \\2 & 3 & -5\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3(5+3)-\lambda(-15+2)[/math]
 [math]-3(9+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 24+13 \lambda-33=0 \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lambda[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{13}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1063 (ID: 199946)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{F}=4 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] বলটি [math]\mathrm{P}(2,2,-1)[/math] বিন্দুতে প্রয়োগ করা হল ।

[math](5,1,4)[/math] বিন্দুর সাপেক্ষে [math]P[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টরের মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{35}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{34}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{27}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\sqrt{35}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{p}=(5-2) \hat{i}+(1-2)[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+(4+1) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math][\bar{P}\rangle[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3^{2}+(-1)^{2}+5^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{35}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1064 (ID: 199947)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathrm{ABCD}[/math] রম্বসের কর্ণদ্বয় যথাক্রমে [math]6 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

কর্ণদ্বয়ের ভেক্টর গুণন কত?

Options:
ক. [math]41 \hat{i}-66 \hat{j}+42 \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]31 \hat{i}+66 \hat{j}+42 \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]-31 \hat{i}-66 \hat{j}-42 \hat{k}[/math]
ঘ. [math]66 \hat{i}+31 \hat{j}+42 \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]31 \hat{i}+66 \hat{j}+42 \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\left|\begin{array}{rrr}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\6 & -6 & 5 \\6 & 1 & -6\end{array}\right|=\hat{i}(36-5)+\hat{j}(30+36)+\hat{k}(6+36) \\\quad=31 \hat{i}+66 \hat{j}+42 \hat{k}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1065 (ID: 199949)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\lambda[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{5}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\because[/math]
 প্রদত্ত ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব।[math]\therefore 2 \times 1+\lambda(-2)+1[/math]
 [math]\times 3=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-2 \lambda=-5[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1066 (ID: 199950)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question:
[math]3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]6 \hat{i}+a \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি সমান্তরাল হলে a এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]2[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]-4[/math]
ঘ. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]4[/math]

Solution:
যদি A ও B ভেক্টর দুইটি সমান্তরাল হয় তবে, [math]\frac{3}{6}=\frac{2}{a}=\frac{-1}{-2}[/math]

Question #1067 (ID: 199952)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{A B}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটি যে সামান্তরিকের সন্নিহিত বাহু তার ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
A. [math]3 \sqrt{5}[/math]
B. [math]4 \sqrt{6}[/math]
C. [math]5 \sqrt{6}[/math]
D. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]5 \sqrt{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{A B} \times \overrightarrow{A C}[/math]
 [math]=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\3 & -\hat{1} & 5 \\2 & 1 & 0\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}(0-5)-\hat{j}[/math]
 [math](0-10)+\hat{k}[/math]
(3+2) $[math]=-5 \hat{i}+10 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+5 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]|\overrightarrow{A B} \times| \overrightarrow{A C} \mid[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{25+100+25}[/math]
 [math]=5 \sqrt{6}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1070 (ID: 199956)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm a \hat{i}+\frac{1}{2} \hat{j}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি একক ভেক্টর হলে, [math]\mathrm a[/math] এর মাণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\pm \frac{5}{6}[/math]
B. [math]\pm \frac{4}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]
D. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{11}}{6}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\left|\mathrm{a} \hat{i}+\frac{1}{2} \hat{j}+\frac{1}{3} \hat{k}\right|[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{a^{2}+\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{9}}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}+\frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}[/math]
 [math]=1-\frac{1}{4}-\frac{1}{9}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{36-13}{36}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{23}{36}[/math]
 [math]\therefore a[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{\sqrt{23}}{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1071 (ID: 199937)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


ত্রিভুজে—

i. A বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

ii. B বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টরের মান [math]\sqrt{14}[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মান [math]\sqrt{8}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(iii) সঠিক নয়। কারণ [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+3 \hat{k}-2 \hat{i}[/math]
 [math]-3 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=-\hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overrightarrow{A B}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(-1)^{2}+(-1)^{2}+2^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{6}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1072 (ID: 199938)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{F}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{d}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

কাজের পরিমাণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-11[/math]
খ. [math]11[/math]
গ. [math]10[/math]
ঘ. [math]20[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-11[/math]

Solution:
[math]W=F \cdot d[/math]
 [math]=(3 \times 2)[/math]
 [math]+(-2) 1+5(-3)[/math]
 [math]=6-2-15[/math]
 [math]=-11[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1073 (ID: 199939)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{F}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{d}}[/math] [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math] [math]+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{F}}+\mathbf{3 \vec { d }}|[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{89}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{93}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{98}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{95}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{98}[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\mathbf{F}+3 \mathbf{d}|[/math]
 [math]=|3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-9 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow |9 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9^{2}+1^{2}+(-4)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{98}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1078 (ID: 199928)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P(1, 1, 1)[/math] এবং [math]Q(2, 3, − 1 )[/math] দুটি বিন্দু হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math] ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{3}(\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{3}(-\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{3}(\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{P Q}=\mathbf{Q}-\mathbf{P}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-\hat{k}-\hat{i}-\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর[math]\Rightarrow \frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{1^{2}+2^{2}+(-2)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1079 (ID: 199929)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\mathrm{t}^{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 t \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] হলে [math]P[/math] বিন্দুটি কোন বক্ররেখায় অবস্থিত?

Options:
ক. [math]x^{2}=4 y[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2}=2 y[/math]
গ. [math]x=2 y^{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]y^{2}=4 x[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]y^{2}=4 x[/math]

Solution:
P বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math]\left(\mathrm{t}^{2}, 2 \mathrm{t}\right)[/math]উক্ত বিন্দু দ্বারা শুধুমাত্র অপশন 'ঘ' সিদ্ধ হয়।

Explanation:

Question #1080 (ID: 199930)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ও [math]\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\mathbf{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3 \pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\frac{(\hat{i}+\hat{j}) \cdot(\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k})}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}} \cdot \sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}+1^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1-1}{\sqrt{2} \sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} 0[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \cos \frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:
