Question #1081 (ID: 199931)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}=\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{b}=\hat{i}+\hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] বরাবর [math](\vec{a}+\vec{b})[/math] এর অভিক্ষেপ কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}+\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathbf{a}[/math]
 বরাবর [math](a + b)[/math]
 এর অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{a \cdot(a+b)}{|a|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1+2}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1082 (ID: 199932)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\underline{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] সামান্তরিকের দুটি সন্নিহিত বাহু নির্দেশ করলে এর ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{83}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{101}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{53}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{117}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt{117}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{P} \times \mathbf{Q}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\-4 & 0 & 1 \\2 & -1 & 2\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=(0+1) \hat{\mathrm{i}}-(-8-2)[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}}+(4-0) \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+10 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সামান্তরিকের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=|\mathbf{P} \times \mathbf{Q}|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{1^{2}+10^{2}+4^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{117}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:

iii. [math](\vec{A}+\vec{B}) \cdot(\vec{A}-\vec{B})=0[/math]

Options:

C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii

iii. ভেক্টরটির দিকে একক ভেক্টর [math]\frac{1}{5}(3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}})[/math]

Question #1085 (ID: 199910)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathbf{P}=\hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{Q}=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] দুটি একই সমতলে অবস্থিত ভেক্টর।

ভেক্টর দুটির ক্রস গুণফল নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \hat{i}-11 \hat{j}-7 \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-11 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
গ. [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-11 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-2 \hat{i}+11 \hat{j}+7 \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-2 \hat{i}+11 \hat{j}+7 \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]P \times Q=\left|\begin{array}{rrr}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\1 & -3 & 5 \\3 & -2 & 4\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \left|\begin{array}{cc}-3 & 5 \\1-2 & 4\end{array}\right| \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\left|\begin{array}{ll}1 & 5 \\3 & 4\end{array}\right| \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\left|\begin{array}{cc}1 & -3 \\3 & -2\end{array}\right| \hat{\mathbf{k}} \\\Rightarrow -2 \hat{i}+11 \hat{j}+7 \hat{k} \\\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1086 (ID: 199912)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]A(2,1,0)[/math] এবং [math]\text { B }(-3,2,4)[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]-\hat{i}-\hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math]
B. [math]5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
C. [math]5 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]
D. [math]-5 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]-5 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{A B}=\mathbf{B}-\mathbf{A}[/math]
 [math]=-3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+4[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}-2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}[/math]
 [math]=-5 \hat{i}+\hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+4 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1087 (ID: 199913)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](−2, 1, 3)[/math] এবং [math](1, 2, −2)[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার কার্তেসীয় সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{x+2}{3}=\frac{y-1}{1}=\frac{z-3}{-5}[/math]
খ. [math]x-2=\frac{y+1}{2}=\frac{\dot{z}+3}{-2}[/math]
গ. [math]x+2=\frac{y+1}{-2}=\frac{z+3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-2=\frac{y-1}{2}=\frac{z-3}{-2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{x+2}{3}=\frac{y-1}{1}=\frac{z-3}{-5}[/math]

Solution:
[math](-2, 1, 3)[/math]
 এবং [math](1, 2, 2 )[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার কার্তেসীয় সমীকরণ,[math]\frac{x-(-2)}{1-(-2)}=\frac{y-1}{2-1}=\frac{z-3}{-2-3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{x+2}{3}=\frac{y-1}{1}=\frac{z-3}{-5}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1088 (ID: 199916)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\vec{a}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+p \hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হয়, তাদের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]90°[/math] হলে [math]p[/math] এর মান কত হবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
শর্তমতে, [math]\mathbf{a} \cdot \mathbf{b}=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow { (3) (1) } +(-2) p+(-1)(2)=0\\\Rightarrow 3-2 p-2=0\\\therefore p=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1090 (ID: 199918)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}[/math] ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{i}})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{2}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}(\hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{i}})[/math]

Solution:
A ভেক্টর বরাবর B ভেক্টরের উপাংশ[math]\Rightarrow \left(\frac{A \cdot B}{|\mathbf{A}|}\right)\left(\frac{A}{|\mathbf{A}|}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1 \cdot 0+(-1)(1)+0 .(-1)}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{-1}{2}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(\hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{i}})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1092 (ID: 199920)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math](\vec{A}-\vec{B}) \cdot(\vec{A}+\vec{B})=?[/math]

Options:
A. 3
B. 2
C. 0
D. [math]-5[/math]


Correct Answer: C.0

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{A}-\mathbf{B}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}} ; \mathbf{A}+\mathbf{B}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\mathbf{A}[/math]
 [math]-\mathbf{B}) \cdot(\mathbf{A}+\mathbf{B})[/math]
 [math]=0.2+2 \cdot 0+(-2) \cdot 0=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1093 (ID: 199921)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=p \hat{i}-\frac{1}{4} \hat{j}+\frac{1}{2} \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি একক ভেক্টর হলে, [math]p[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\pm 3[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{11}}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{3}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pm \frac{\sqrt{11}}{4}[/math]

Solution:
প্রশ্নমতে [math]\sqrt{\mathrm{p}^{2}+\left(\frac{-1}{4}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p^{2}+\frac{1}{16}+\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]=1 \Rightarrow p^{2}=1-\frac{1}{16}-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow p^{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{11}{16} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore p[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{\sqrt{11}}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1096 (ID: 199925)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
B. [math]-\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
C. [math]-\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
D. [math]\hat{i}-3 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]a \times \mathbf{b}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathbf{j}} & \hat{\mathbf{k}} \\1 & 0 & 1 \\2 & 1 & -1\end{array}\right|\begin{array}{l}=(0-1) \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}(-1-2)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}(1-0) \\=-\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1098 (ID: 199927)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}|=3[/math] এবং [math]\vec{P} \cdot \vec{Q}=8[/math] হলে [math](\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}+\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}) \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]17[/math]
B. [math]21[/math]
C. [math]24[/math]
D. [math]33[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]17[/math]

Solution:
[math](\mathbf{P}+\mathbf{Q}) \cdot \mathbf{P}[/math]
 [math]=\mathbf{P} \cdot \mathbf{P}+\mathbf{Q} \cdot \mathbf{P}[/math]
 [math]=|\mathbf{P}|^{2}+8[/math]
 [math]=9+8[/math]
 [math]=17[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1099 (ID: 199905)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:


[Image]


[math]CD[/math] এর দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. [math]7 \sqrt{2}[/math]
খ. [math]49 \sqrt{38}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{7}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{49}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{49}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
 [math]=(8 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})-(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-10 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
এখন [math]\mathrm{CD}[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}|[/math]
 [math]\cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{A C} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}||\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{CD}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}}{\vec{\rightarrow}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{48+20+30}{\sqrt{6^{2}+(-4)^{2}+(-10)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{98}{\sqrt{152}}=\frac{49}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1100 (ID: 199907)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathrm{A}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}, \mathrm{B}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]A[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]B[/math] ভেক্টরের লম্ব অভিক্ষেপের মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{A} \cdot \mathbf{B}[/math]
 [math]=|\mathbf{A}||\mathbf{B}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow |\mathbf{B}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathbf{A} \cdot \mathbf{B}}{|\mathbf{A}|}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\frac{2+3-2}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}+1^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{3}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1101 (ID: 199908)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathbf{a}=\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{b}=\lambda \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]a[/math] ও [math]b[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে [math]a[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]

Solution:
দুটি ভেক্টর পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে,[math]\frac{a_{1}}{a_{2}}=\frac{b_{1}}{b_{2}}=\frac{c_{1}}{c_{2}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{1}{\lambda}=\frac{4}{2}=\frac{-2}{-1} \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\lambda}=2 \\\therefore \lambda=\frac{1}{2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1102 (ID: 199909)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\mathbf{a}=\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{b}=\lambda \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

a ভেক্টরটি z-অক্ষের সাথে কত কোণ উৎপন্ন করে।

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{\sqrt{13}}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{\sqrt{19}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{\sqrt{21}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\sqrt{\frac{2}{21}}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{\sqrt{21}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{a. } \hat{\mathrm{k}}=|\mathbf{a}| \cdot|\hat{\mathbf{k}}| \cos \theta\\\Rightarrow -2=\sqrt{i^{2}+4^{2}+(-2)^{2}} \cdot 1 \cdot \cos \theta\\\Rightarrow \cos \theta=\frac{-2}{\sqrt{1+16+4}}\\\Rightarrow \theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-2}{\sqrt{21}}\right)\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1103 (ID: 199904)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:


[Image]


a এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-4[/math]
খ. [math]-3[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]4[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-3[/math]

Solution:
[math](8 \times 2)+(-5 \times-1)[/math]
 [math]+(a \times 7)=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 16+5+7 a=0 \\\Rightarrow a=-3\end{array}[/math]

Question #1104 (ID: 199901)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](2, 3, 4)[/math] এবং [math](–5, 1, 7)[/math] বিন্দুগামী রেখার সমীকরণ—

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \mathrm{r}=(1-t)(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})+\mathrm{t}(-5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}})\\\text{ii. } \quad \mathrm{r}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}+t(7 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})\\\text{iii. } \frac{x-2}{-7}=\frac{y-3}{-2}=\frac{z-4}{3}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]
ধরি, একটি সরলরেখা P বিন্দুগামী এবং b ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল। এই শর্তে কেবলমাত্র একটি সরলরেখাই সম্ভব।যেহেতু [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটি b ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল, সুতরাং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}=\mathrm{tb}[/math]
, যেখানে t একটি স্কেলার। b ভেক্টরটিকে সরলরেখাটির নির্দেশক ভেক্টর বলা হয়। P বিন্দুটির অবস্থান ভেক্টর a এবং সরলরেখাটির উপর যেকোন বিন্দু Qএর অবস্থান ভেক্টর r হলে, ত্রিভুজ OPQ হতে, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math]
 বা, [math]\mathbf{r}=\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{t} \mathbf{b}[/math]
সূত্র: একটি নির্দিষ্ট বিন্দুগামী যার অবস্থান ভেক্টর a এবং অপর একটি ভেক্টর b এর সমান্তরাল সরলরেখার ভেক্টরসমীকরণ: [math]\mathbf{r}=\mathbf{a}+\mathrm{t} \mathbf{b}[/math]
 যেখানে। একটি স্কেলার পরামিতি।t এর ভিন্ন ভিন্ন মানের জন্য সরলরেখাটির উপর বিভিন্ন বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর পাওয়া যাবে

Explanation:

Question #1105 (ID: 199902)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathrm{A}[/math] [math]=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-4 \hat{k},[/math] [math]\mathrm{B}[/math] [math]=-2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]C=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] তিনটি ভেক্টর ।

[math]|A-B+2 C|[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{59}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{93}[/math]
গ. [math]0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{13}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\sqrt{59}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{A}-\mathbf{B}+2 \mathbf{C}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]-(-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})+2(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2\hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=7 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\mathbf{A}-\mathbf{B}+2\mathbf{C}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{7^{2}+(-1)^{2}+(-3)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{59}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1106 (ID: 199903)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\mathrm{A}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-4 \hat{k}, \mathrm{B}=-2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]C=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] তিনটি ভেক্টর ।

[math]C[/math] ভেক্টরটি y-অক্ষের সাথে কত কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{2}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}\right)[/math]

Solution:
[math]C[/math]
 ভেক্টর ও y-অক্ষের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\theta[/math]
 হলে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\cos \theta=\frac{C \cdot \hat{j}}{|C||\hat{j}|}=\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}} \\\therefore \theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{6}}\right)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1107 (ID: 199889)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=\hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k},[/math] [math]b=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+7 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{c}[/math] [math]=2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+4 \hat{k} \mid d[/math] ভেক্টর [math]a[/math] ও [math]b[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর লম্ব এবং [math]c . d=15[/math] হলে, [math]d[/math] ভেক্টর নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{1}{3}(160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
B. [math]\frac{1}{3}(-160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{3}(160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{3}(160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{3}(160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]\mathbf{d}=\lambda(\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b})[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathbf{d}=\lambda\left|\begin{array}{rrr}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\mathrm{I} & 4 & 2 \\3 & -2 & 7\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\lambda(32 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-14 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
আবার, [math]\mathbf{c} \cdot \mathbf{d}[/math]
 [math]=15[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) \cdot \lambda(32 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-14 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=15 \\\Rightarrow 9 \lambda=15 \Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=\frac{15}{9}=\frac{5}{3}[/math]
 [math]\\\therefore \mathbf{d}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5}{3}(32 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-14 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](160 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-70 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1108 (ID: 199890)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{P}(2,-3,5)[/math] বিন্দুতে ক্রিয়াশীল [math]F=3 \hat{i}-5 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] বলের মূলবিন্দুর সাপেক্ষে ভ্রামকের মান কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{481}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{482}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{483}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{485}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{483}[/math]

Solution:
বলের ভ্রামক [math]=|\mathbf{P} \times \mathbf{F}|[/math]
এখন, [math]\mathbf{P} \times \mathbf{F}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\2 & -3 & 5 \\3 & -5 & 2\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}& \Rightarrow \hat{\mathrm{i}}(-6+25)+\hat{\mathrm{j}}(15-4)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}(-10+9) \\& \Rightarrow 19 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+11 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\therefore|\mathbf{P} \times \mathbf{F}|= & \sqrt{483}\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
কোনো সামান্তরিকের সন্নিহিত বাহুদ্বয় [math]P=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{Q}=3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হলে সামান্তরিকের ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{13}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{14}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{117}[/math]
ঘ. [math]13[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{117}[/math]

Solution:

Question #1110 (ID: 199892)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ত্রিভুজের দুইটি বাহু যথাক্রমে [math]5 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+7 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]-3 \hat{i}-8 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] হলে ত্রিভুজটির ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sqrt{443}}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{443}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{73}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]73[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\sqrt{443}}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Given, }[/math]
 [math]\vec{p}=5 \hat{i}+7 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]
 এবং [math]\vec{Q}=-3 \hat{i}-8 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]\frac{1}{2}|\vec{P} \times \vec{Q}|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\5 & 7 & -2 \\-3 & -8 & 1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}|-9 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-19 \hat{k}|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sqrt{443}}{2}[/math]


Explanation:

C. [math]96[/math]

Question #1112 (ID: 199894)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে [math]2 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}, 2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{k}+\hat{j}, \hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর তিনটি একই সমতলে অবস্থিত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]2[/math]

Solution:
একই সমতলে হলে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}2 & a & 2 \\2 & 3 & 1 \\1 & 1 & 1\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 2(3-1)+a(1-2)+2(2-3)=0\\\Rightarrow 4-a-2=0\\\Rightarrow 2-a=0\\\therefore a=2\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1114 (ID: 199896)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
P(1, 2, 3) এবং Q(4, −3, 1) দুইটি বিন্দু হলে -

i. [math]P[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

ii. [math]Q[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

iii. [math]P[/math] ও [math]Q[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার ভেক্টর সমীকরণ,

[math](1+3 t) \hat{i}+(2-5 t) \hat{j}+(3-2 t) \hat{k}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]r(x, y, z)[/math]
 বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর[math]r=\hat{i} x+\hat{j} y+\hat{k} z[/math]
দুইটি বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]a[/math]
 ও [math]b[/math]
 হলে এই দুই বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ হবে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathbf{r}=\mathbf{a}+t(b-a) \\\Rightarrow (\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})+\mathrm{t}\{(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})-(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2\hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})\} \\\Rightarrow (\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})+\mathrm{t}(3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) \\\Rightarrow \mathbf{r}=(1+3 \mathrm{t}) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+(2-5 \mathrm{t}) \hat{\mathrm{j}}+(3-2 \mathrm{t}) \hat{\mathrm{k}}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1115 (ID: 199897)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A(2,-3,-1)[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর a হলে—

i. [math]a=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

ii. [math]|\mathrm{a}|=\sqrt{14}[/math]

iii. x অক্ষের সাথে উৎপন্ন কোণ [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{14}}\right)[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
i, ii ও iii

Explanation:

Question #1116 (ID: 199898)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{A}=8 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] হলে –

i. [math]\mathrm A[/math] একটি একক ভেক্টর

ii. [math]|\hat{A} \times \hat{k}|=10[/math]

ii. [math]A . \hat{j}=6[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
i. সঠিক নয় ।কারণ, [math]|A|=\sqrt{8^{2}+6^{2}}=10[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\text{ii. } A \times \hat{k}=\left|\begin{array}{lll}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\8 & 6 & 0 \\0 & 0 & 1\end{array}\right|=6 \hat{i}-8 \hat{j}\\\therefore|\mathrm{A} \times \hat{\mathrm{k}}|=\sqrt[1]{6^{2}+(-8)^{2}}=10\\\text{iii. } (8 \hat{i}+6 \hat{j}) \cdot \hat{j}=6\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1117 (ID: 199899)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]O[/math] মূলবিন্দু সাপেক্ষে [math]\mathrm{M}(3,-2,1)[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{N}(-2,1,1)[/math] দুটি বিন্দু হলে-

i. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OM}}[/math] বরাবর একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{14}}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OM}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{ON}}[/math] এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{6}}[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OM}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{ON}}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-7}{2 \sqrt{21}}\right)[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\underline{a}[/math]
 ও [math]\underline{b}[/math]
 দুইটি অশূন্য ভেক্টরের অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ [math]\theta[/math]
 হলে, [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{a}} \cdot \underline{\mathbf{b}}=|\underline{a}||\underline{\mathbf{b}}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \cos \theta=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{a}||\underline{b}|}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{a}||\underline{b}|} .[/math]
দ্রষ্টব্যঃ [math]\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}[/math]
 [math]=|\underline{a}||\underline{\mathrm{b}}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow|\underline{\mathrm{b}}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{a}|}[/math]
 [math]\therefore a[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\underline{b}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{a}|}[/math]
তদ্রুপ, [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]=|\underline{a}| \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{b}|}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \underline{a}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=|\underline{b}| \cos \theta \hat{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{a}|} \hat{a}[/math]
তদ্রুপ, [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের উপাংশ [math]=|\underline{a}| \cos \theta \hat{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\underline{a} \cdot \underline{b}}{|\underline{b}|} \hat{b}[/math]
দ্রষ্টব্যঃ [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{a}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের বরাবর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 এর উপাংশের মান ও [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{a}}[/math]
 এর উপর [math]\underline{\boldsymbol{b}}[/math]
 এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ পরস্পর সমান।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1118 (ID: 199900)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P=9 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]Q=4 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] হলে-

[math]\begin{array}{l}\text{i. } \quad \mathrm {P} \perp \mathrm{Q}\\\text{ii. } \mathrm{P} \| \mathrm{Q}\\\text{iii. } |\mathrm{P}|=\sqrt{118}\end{array}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ii. সঠিক নয় ।দেওয়া আছে, [math]P=9 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-6 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\mathbf{Q}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{P} \| \mathrm{Q}[/math]
 হলে, [math]P[/math]
 ও [math]Q[/math]
 এর [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}, \hat{\mathrm{j}}, \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 এর সহগের অনুপাত সমান হবে।কিন্তু [math]\frac{9}{4} 
eq \frac{1}{-6} \therefore P \| Q[/math]
 সম্ভব নয়

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1119 (ID: 199869)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সদৃশ ভেক্টরের জন্য নিচের কোনটি সত্য নয়?

Options:
ক. সদৃশ ভেক্টরের দিক একই
খ. সদৃশ ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের ক্রস গুণন শূন্য
গ. সদৃশ ভেক্টরসমূহের ধারক রেখা সর্বদা একই
ঘ. সদৃশ ভেক্টরসমূহের মান একই অথবা ভিন্ন


Correct Answer: C.সদৃশ ভেক্টরসমূহের ধারক রেখা সর্বদা একই

Solution:
শূন্য ভেক্টর (Zero Vector or Null Vector): যে ভেক্টরের দৈর্ঘ্য বা পরমমান শূন্য এবং যার দিক নিণয় করা যায় না তাকে শূন্য ভেক্টর বলা হয় এবং ইহাকে) [math]\underline{0}[/math]
 বা [math]0[/math]
(মোটা হরফের শূন্য) দ্বারা প্রকাশ করা হয়। শূন্য ভেক্টরের প্রারম্ভবিন্দু ও প্রান্তবিন্দু একই বিন্দু। যেমন, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AA}}=\underline{0} .[/math]
প্রকৃত ও অপ্রকৃত ভেক্টর (Proper and improper vector): শূন্য ব্যতীত সকল ভেক্টরকে প্রকৃত ভেক্টর এবং শূন্য ভেক্টরকে অপ্রকৃত ভেক্টর বলে।সদৃশ ভেক্টর (Like Vectors): যদি দুইটি ভেক্টরের দিক একই হয়, তবে তাদেরকে সদৃশ ভেক্টর বলে। দুইটি সদৃশ ভেক্টরের ধারক রেখা একই অথবা পরস্পর সমান্তরাল কিন্তু তাদের দৈর্ঘ্য সমান নাও হতে পারে

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1120 (ID: 199870)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A=\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \hat{i}[/math] [math]-\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}} \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math] [math]\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
B. [math]1[/math]
C. [math]0.5[/math]
D. [math]1.5[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]|A|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}\right)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\sqrt{\frac{1}{3}+\frac{1}{3}+\frac{1}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{\frac{3}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1121 (ID: 199871)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math] একটি একক ভেক্টর হলে x এর মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\pm \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
B. [math]\pm \frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
C. [math]\pm \frac{1}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]
D. [math]\pm \frac{1}{\sqrt{7}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\pm \frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}|x(\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})|=1 \\\quad \Rightarrow x \sqrt{1+1+1}= \pm 1 \\\quad \Rightarrow x=\frac{ \pm 1}{\sqrt{3}} .\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1122 (ID: 199872)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোন একক ভেক্টরটি ধনাত্মক x-অক্ষের সাথে [math]30°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]

Solution:
ধরি, [math]r=x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}[/math]
 একটি একক ভেক্টর যা x-অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকের সাথে [math]30°[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করে।[math]\begin{aligned}\therefore \mathbf{r} & =\cos 30^{\circ} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\sin 30^{\circ} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[\because|\mathbf{r}|=1] \\\quad & \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{1}{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1123 (ID: 199873)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\dot{a}=\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}, b=-2 i+4 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]c=\hat{i}-6 \hat{j}-7 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]a + b + c[/math] ভেক্টরের মান নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{18}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{17}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{16}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{15}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\sqrt{17}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}+\mathbf{c}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+\hat{\mathrm{k}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]+\hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-7 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=0 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\mathbf{a}[/math]
 [math]+\mathbf{b}+\mathrm{c}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{0^{2}+(-4)^{2}+(-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \sqrt{0+16+1}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{17}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1124 (ID: 199874)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{P}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]Q=-3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে, [math]P[/math] ও [math]Q[/math] এর লব্ধি বরাবর সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math](4 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+5 \hat{k}) / \sqrt{42}[/math]
B. [math](5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) / \sqrt{59}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}(-\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
D. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}(\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}(-\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
লব্ধি ভেক্টর [math]P + Q[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \hat{\mathrm i}+\hat{\mathrm j}+\hat{\hat{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{-\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}}{\sqrt{(-1)^{2}+(1)^{2}+(1)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}(-\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1125 (ID: 199875)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P(2,4,4)[/math] এবং [math]Q(-3,2,2)[/math] দুইটি বিন্দু হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math] এর সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mathrm{\frac{1}{\sqrt{33}}(5 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})}[/math]
খ. [math]\mathrm{\frac{-1}{\sqrt{33}}(5 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})}[/math]
গ. [math]\mathrm {\frac{1}{\sqrt{33}}(5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm {\frac{-1}{\sqrt{33}}(5 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\mathrm{\frac{-1}{\sqrt{33}}(5 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math]
 [math]=-5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}|}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{-5 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{(-5)^{2}+(-2)^{2}+(-2)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-1}{\sqrt{33}}[/math]
 [math](5 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1126 (ID: 199876)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}=\mathbf{a}+\mathrm{b}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{O Q}=2 a-b[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math] ভেক্টরকে নিচের কোন বিন্দুটি [math]1:2[/math] অনুপাতে অন্তর্বিভক্ত করবে?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3 a+2 b}{3}[/math]
B. [math]\mathrm a[/math]
C. [math]\frac{5 a-b}{3}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{4 a+b}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{4 a+b}{3}[/math]

Solution:

Question #1127 (ID: 199878)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x-2}{3}=\frac{y+5}{7}=\frac{z-5}{-2}[/math] সরলরেখাটি কোন ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \hat{i}-5 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]-3 \hat{i}-7 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{x-2}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y+5}{7}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{z-5}{-2}[/math]
 সরলরেখার ভেক্টর রূপ,[math]\mathbf{r}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{t}(3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
যা [math](2,-5,5)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী এবং [math]3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 এর সমান্তরাল।

Explanation:

Question #1128 (ID: 199879)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](3, 2, 1)[/math] এবং [math](4, 1, −2)[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার ভেক্টর সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](3+t) \hat{i}+(2-t) \hat{j}+(1-3 t) \hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math](3+4 t) \hat{i}+(2+t) \hat{j}+(1-2 t) \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math](3-4 t) \hat{i}+(2-t) \hat{j}+(1+2 t) \hat{k}[/math]
ঘ. [math](4-3 t) \hat{i}+(1-2 t) \hat{j}+(-2-t) \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math](3+t) \hat{i}+(2-t) \hat{j}+(1-3 t) \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]r =a+t(b-a)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k})+t\{(4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]-(3 \hat{i}+2[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+\hat{k})\}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 \hat{i}[/math]
 [math]+2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]+t(\hat{i}-\hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (3+t)[/math]
 [math]\hat{i}[/math]
 [math]+(2-t) \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+(1-3 t) \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1129 (ID: 199880)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]F=3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] বলের ক্রিয়ার দ্বারা সরণ [math]S=5 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে কাজের পরিমাণ কত একক?

Options:
ক. [math]23[/math]
খ. [math]24[/math]
গ. [math]25[/math]
ঘ. [math]26[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]23[/math]

Solution:
একটি কণার ওপর [math]F[/math]
 বল প্রয়োগে [math]S[/math]
 সরণ হলে প্রযুক্ত বলটি দ্বারা কাজের পরিমাণ হবে[math]\mathbf{F} S=(3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(5 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=15+6+2[/math]
 [math]=23[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1130 (ID: 199881)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x-অক্ষের সাথে কত কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-6}{7}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{7}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]

Solution:
উৎপন্ন কোণ [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{\sqrt{3^{2}+(-6)^{2}+2^{2}}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1131 (ID: 199882)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-a \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]y=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর। a এর মান কত হলে ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-6[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]6[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]6[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টরদ্বয় লম্ব হবে যদি ডট গুণন শূন্য হয়।[math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \mathbf{x} \cdot \mathrm{y}=12-6-\mathrm{a} \\\Rightarrow 12-6-\mathrm{a}=0 \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{a}=12-6 \\\therefore \mathrm{a}=6\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1132 (ID: 199883)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{b}=\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] হলে a ভেক্টর বরাবর b ভেক্টরের উপাংশ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{26}}(\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{-2}{\sqrt{26}}(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{14}}(\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{-2}{14}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{-2}{14}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
নির্ণেয় উপাংশ [math]=b \cos \theta \hat{a}=\frac{a \cdot b}{a} \hat{a}=\frac{3+3-8}{\sqrt{9+1+4}} \hat{a}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-2}{\sqrt{14}} 3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1133 (ID: 199884)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\lambda \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের লব্ধি বরাবর একক ভেক্টর ও [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের স্কেলার গুণফল [math]1[/math] হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]-2[/math]
খ. [math]-1[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
লব্ধি ভেক্টর [math]=(2+\lambda) \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
শর্তমতে, [math]\frac{(2+\lambda) \hat{i}+6 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}}{\sqrt{(2+\lambda)^{2}+6^{2}+(-2)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k})=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow (\lambda+6)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=(\lambda+2)^{2}+40[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=1 \text{.}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1134 (ID: 199885)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি একটি একক ভেক্টর a X-অক্ষ ও Y-অক্ষের সাথে যথাক্রমে [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math] ও [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তাহলে z-অক্ষের উৎপন্ন সূক্ষ্মকোণের পরিমাণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{10}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]

Solution:
কোন একক ভেক্টর অক্ষত্রয়ের সাথে [math]\theta_{x}, \theta_{y}[/math]
 ও [math]\theta_{z}[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করলে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\cos ^{2} \theta_{x}+\cos ^{2} \theta_{y}+\cos ^{2} \theta_{z}=1 \\\Rightarrow \cos ^{2} \frac{\pi}{3}+\cos ^{2} \frac{\pi}{4}+\cos ^{2} \theta_{z}=1 \\\Rightarrow \frac{1}{4}+\frac{1}{2}+\cos ^{2} \theta_{z}=1 \\\Rightarrow \cos ^{2} \theta_{z}=1-\frac{3}{4}=\frac{1}{4} \\\Rightarrow \cos \theta_{z}=\frac{1}{2} \\\therefore \theta_{z}=\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{2}=\frac{\pi}{3}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1135 (ID: 199886)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]b=2 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] হয় তবে [math]|\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}|[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]19 \sqrt{5}[/math]
B. [math]19 \sqrt{3}[/math]
C. [math]17 \sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]8 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]8 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}=\left|\begin{array}{lrr}\hat{\mathbf{i}} & \hat{\mathbf{j}} & \hat{\mathbf{k}} \\3 & 1 & 2 \\2 & -2 & 4\end{array}\right|=8 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-8 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-8 \hat{\mathbf{k}} \\\begin{aligned}\therefore|\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}| & =\sqrt{8^{2}+(-8)^{2}+(-8)^{2}} \\& \Rightarrow \sqrt{3.8^{2}}=8 \sqrt{3}\end{aligned}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1136 (ID: 199887)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a=3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]b=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]a + b[/math] ও [math]a - b[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের লম্ব বরাবর একক ভেক্টর নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\mp \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}} \mp \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \mp \frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
খ. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}} \pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \mp \frac{1}{3} \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}} \pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \pm \frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}} \mp \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \mp \frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pm \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{i}} \mp \frac{2}{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \mp \frac{1}{3} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}=4 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}[/math]
 এবং [math]\mathbf{a}-\mathbf{b}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}) \times(\mathbf{a}-\mathbf{b})[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left|\begin{array}{lll}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\4 & 4 & 0 \\2 & 0 & 4\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 16 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-16 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-8 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow |(a+b) \times(a-b)|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{576}[/math]
 [math]=24 \text{.}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 একক ভেক্টর [math]= \pm \frac{16 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-16 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-8 \hat{\mathrm{k}}}{24}[/math]
 [math]= \pm \frac{1}{3}[/math]
 [math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1137 (ID: 199888)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](\hat{k} \times \hat{i}) \cdot \hat{\mathbf{j}}=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math](\hat{\mathrm{k}} \times \hat{\mathrm{i}}) \cdot \hat{\mathrm{j}}=\hat{\mathrm{j}} \cdot \hat{\mathrm{j}}=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1138 (ID: 199866)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2010-2011, 2008-2009, 2009-2010, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\underline{\mathrm{A}}=2 \underline{\mathrm{i}}-\underline{\mathrm{j}}+3 \underline{\mathrm{k}}, \underline{\mathrm{B}}=3 \mathrm{i}+4 \underline{\mathrm{j}}-5 \underline{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয়, তাহলে [math]\underline{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\underline{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ হচ্ছে-

Options:
A. [math]\frac{-13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{13}{7}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-13}{10 \sqrt{7}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{7}{5 \sqrt{2}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{-13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]

Solution:
[math]A \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{B}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \times 3+4(-1)+3 \times(-5)}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}+(-5)^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{13 \sqrt{2}}{10}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1139 (ID: 199867)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2010-2011, 2002-2003, 2013-2014, 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}=2 \overline{\mathrm{i}}-\overline{\mathrm{j}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-6 \overline{\mathrm{j}}-2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\alpha=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{PQ}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3 \times 2+6-4}{3 \times 7}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1140 (ID: 199868)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}} \text { - }[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের পরিমাণ কত?

Options:
A. 0°
B. 45°
C. 90°
D. 180°


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\because 1(-1)+(-1)(1)+1(2)[/math]
 [math]=-1-1+2=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 মধ্যবর্তী কোণ = 90°

Explanation:

Question #1142 (ID: 199862)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটির মধ্যবর্তী কোণ হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{39}}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{12}}[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{1}{13}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}[/math]

Solution:
[math](2-3)[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+9}[/math]
 [math]\times \sqrt{3} \cos \alpha[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{\sqrt{39}}\right)[/math]

Question #1143 (ID: 199863)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]P(1,1,1)[/math] এবং [math]Q(2,3,−2)[/math] দুইটি বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক ও মূল বিন্দু [math]O(0,0,0)[/math] হলে, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math] ভেক্টর নির্ণয় কর?

Options:
ক. [math]2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math]
খ. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
গ. [math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{P Q}[/math]
 [math]=(2-1) \hat{i}+(3-1)[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+(-2-1) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=1 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1144 (ID: 199864)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\mathrm{p} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটির মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math] হলে [math]p =[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]2[/math]
B. [math]\pm[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pm \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pm \sqrt{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math](\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\mathrm{pk})[/math]
 [math]=\left(\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left(\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}+\mathrm{p}^{2}}\right) \cos \frac{\pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1+1[/math]
 [math]=(\sqrt{2})[/math]
 [math]\left(\sqrt{2+\mathrm{p}^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2-\sqrt{2+\mathrm{p}^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{p}[/math]
 [math]=\pm \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1145 (ID: 199858)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}[/math] এর দিক বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশের দৈর্ঘ্য-

Options:
ক. [math]|\vec{A}| \cos \theta[/math]
খ. [math]|\vec{B}| \cos \theta[/math]
গ. [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}| \sin \theta[/math]
ঘ. [math]|\vec{A}| \sin \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]|\vec{B}| \cos \theta[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{x}{|\vec{B}|}=\cos \theta \quad \therefore x=|\vec{B}| \cos \theta[/math]
[Image]


Explanation:

Question #1146 (ID: 199859)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { Against which axis does the vector } 2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k} \text { produce an angle of } \cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{3}\right) \text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]x \text {-axis }[/math]
B. [math]y \text {-axis }[/math]
C. [math]\text { z-axis }[/math]
D. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]y \text {-axis }[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { From the concept of direction cosine, } \theta_{y}=\cos ^{-1} \frac{R_{y}}{|R|}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1148 (ID: 199840)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{c}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি [math]\vec{b}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{c}}[/math] ভেক্টরটির সাথে যথাক্রমে [math]\alpha[/math] ও [math]\theta[/math] কোণে আনত হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}} \cos \alpha=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]\vec{c} \cos \theta[/math]
B. [math]\vec{c} \sin \theta[/math]
C. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{c}} \sin \alpha[/math]
D. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{c}} \cos \alpha[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\vec{c} \cos \theta[/math]

Solution:
চিত্র হতে পাই,[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}+\mathrm{b} \cos \alpha|[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{a}-\mathrm{b} \cos \alpha=\mathrm{c} \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}} \cos \alpha[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{c}} \cos \theta[/math]

[Image]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1149 (ID: 199841)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}[/math] [math]=3 \vec{i}+\vec{j}-2 \vec{k},[/math] [math]\vec{B}=2 \vec{i}-\vec{j}+\vec{k}, \vec{C}[/math] [math]=\vec{i}+3 \vec{j}-2 \vec{k}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}} \cdot(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}})[/math] [math]=\text { ? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]0[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{C}+\mathrm{A}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]; \mathrm{B}(\mathrm{C}+\mathrm{A})=(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) ;[/math]
 [math]8-4-4=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1150 (ID: 199842)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2010-2011, 2002-2003, 2013-2014, 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}=2 \overline{\mathrm{i}}-\overline{\mathrm{j}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-6 \overline{\mathrm{j}}-2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\alpha=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{PQ}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3 \times 2+6-4}{3 \times 7}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1151 (ID: 199843)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2012-2013, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{O A}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{O B}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A B}}|[/math] নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
B. [math]2\sqrt{19}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]
D. [math]4\sqrt{19}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]2\sqrt{19}[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}|[/math]
 [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}|[/math]
 [math]=|2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+6 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+36+36}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{76}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{19}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1152 (ID: 199844)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board, Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}, \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]4 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\lambda \hat{k}[/math] - ভেক্টর তিনটি সমতলীয় হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]-3 / 5[/math]
B. [math]3 / 5[/math]
C. [math]2 / 7[/math]
D. [math]-2 / 7[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]3 / 5[/math]

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}2 & -1 & 1 \\1 & 2 & -3 \\4 & -1 & \lambda\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=2(2 \lambda-3)[/math]
 [math]+1(\lambda+12)+1(-1-8)[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow \lambda[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1153 (ID: 199845)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2010-2011, 2009-2010, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}} \text { - }[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের পরিমাণ কত?

Options:
A. 0°
B. 45°
C. 90°
D. 180°


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\because 1(-1)+(-1)(1)+1(2)[/math]
 [math]=-1-1+2=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 মধ্যবর্তী কোণ = 90°

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1154 (ID: 199846)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ নির্ণয় কর ।

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{19}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{13}{19}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{13}{\sqrt{19}}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{13}{\sqrt{19}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 বরাবর [math]\vec{B}[/math]
 এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপ [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(3 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}) \cdot(\hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k})}{\sqrt{3^{2}+(-1)^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3+4+6}{\sqrt{9+1+9}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{13}{\sqrt{19}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1155 (ID: 199848)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2011-2012, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board, Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি পরস্পর লম্ব হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{-5}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{2}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{-5}{2}[/math]

Solution:
[math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math](\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]=0 \Rightarrow 2+2 \lambda+3[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \lambda[/math]
 [math]=-5 \therefore \lambda=-\frac{5}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1156 (ID: 199849)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2010-2011, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{i}+\underline{j}+\underline{k}[/math] এবং [math]3 \underline{i}+3 \underline{j}-6 \underline{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{\vec{A} \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}| \vec{B} \mid}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{3+3-6}{\sqrt{3} \cdot 3 \sqrt{6}}[/math]
 [math]=90[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1157 (ID: 199850)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হলে [math](\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math] [math](\overline{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি পরস্পর-

Options:
A. লম্ব
B. সমান্তরাল
C. সমান
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: A.লম্ব

Solution:
[math](\overline{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math];(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overline{\mathrm{B}})[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{k}} ;[/math]
 [math](\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math]
 [math]\cdot(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math]
 [math]=(-8)+3+5[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1158 (ID: 199851)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]B[/math] ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]A[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশের দৈর্ঘ্য হবে—

Options:
ক. [math]|\mathrm{A}| \cos \theta[/math]
খ. [math]|\mathrm{B}| \cos \theta[/math]
গ. [math]|\mathrm{A}| \sin \theta[/math]
ঘ. [math]|\mathrm{B}| \tan \theta[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]|\mathrm{A}| \cos \theta[/math]

Solution:
কোন ভেক্টরের উপাংশ হল ভেক্টরটির একটি নির্দিষ্ট দিকের উপাদান।কোন ভেক্টর A এর B ভেক্টরের দিকের উপাংশ হল A ভেক্টরের B ভেক্টরের দিকের অভিক্ষেপ।A ভেক্টরের B ভেক্টরের দিকের অভিক্ষেপের দৈর্ঘ্য হল,[math]|A| \cos \theta[/math]
যেখানে,[math]|A|[/math]
 হল A ভেক্টরের দৈর্ঘ্য[math]\theta[/math]
 হল A ভেক্টর এবং B ভেক্টরের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1159 (ID: 199852)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}[/math] এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}[/math] এর লম্ব অভিক্ষেপের মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{11}{18}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{11}{\sqrt{14}}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{11}{3 \sqrt{2}}[/math]
D. কোনটিই সঠিক নয়


Correct Answer: C.[math]-\frac{11}{3 \sqrt{2}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{Q} \cos \theta=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{P}}=-\frac{11}{3 \sqrt{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1160 (ID: 199853)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি [math]z[/math] অক্ষের সহিত যে কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তা কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{2}{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\cos \theta=\frac{(2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}) \cdot \hat{k}}{|2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}|} \because \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1161 (ID: 199854)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=\mathrm{a} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x অক্ষের সাথে 30° কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
A. [math]-3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{3/2}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
D. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
E. [math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: E. [math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\text { Hints: } \vec{V}[/math]
 [math]=V_{x} \hat{i}+V_{y} \hat{j}+V_{z} \hat{k}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটি x অক্ষের সাথে [math]\theta_{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করলে [math]\cos \theta_{x}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{V_{x}}{\sqrt{V_{x}^{2}+V_{y}^{2}+V_{z}^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\text { Solve: } \vec{A}[/math]
 [math]=a \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\cos 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a}{\sqrt{a^{2}+4^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}=\frac{a}{\sqrt{a^{2}+25}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{3}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{a^{2}}{a^{2}+25}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 \mathrm{a}^{2}+75[/math]
 [math]=4 \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 a^{2}-3[/math]
 [math]a^{2}=75[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{a}^{2}[/math]
 [math]=75[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=5 \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math][+ \text {}][/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: লক্ষণীয়, যে অক্ষের সাথে কোণ উৎপন্ন করে সেই অক্ষের একক ভেক্টরের সহগ লবে থাকে আর হরে থাকে ভেক্টর রাশির মান কেনো [math]\cos \theta_{\mathrm{x}}=\frac{\mathrm{V}_{\mathrm{x}}}{\sqrt{\mathrm{V}_{\mathrm{x}}^{2}+\mathrm{V}_{\mathrm{y}}^{2}+\mathrm{V}_{\mathrm{z}}^{2}}} ?[/math]
x অক্ষ বরাবর ভেক্টরটি, [math]\vec{x}=\hat{i}+0 . \hat{j}+0 . \hat{k}[/math]
[কারণ, X অক্ষ বরাবর শুধু বিদ্যমান।]\তাহলে, V ও X এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\theta_{\mathrm{x}}[/math]
 হলে, ডটগুণনের শর্ত থেকে লিখা যায়, [math]\begin{array}{l}\vec{V} \cdot \vec{X}=|\vec{V}||\vec{X}| \cos \theta_{x} \\\Rightarrow \cos \theta_{x}=\frac{\vec{v} \cdot \vec{x}}{|\vec{v}||\vec{x}|}=\frac{\left(V_{x} \hat{i}+V_{y} \hat{j}+V_{z} \hat{k}\right)(\hat{i}+0 . \hat{j}+0 . \hat{k})}{\left(\sqrt{V_{x}^{2}+V_{y}^{2}+V_{z}^{2}}\right) \cdot 1}=\frac{V_{x}}{\sqrt{V_{x}^{2}+V_{y}^{2}+V_{z}^{2}}}\end{array}[/math]


Sub-Questions:
