Question #1162 (ID: 199855)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\mathbf{2} \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}},[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{C}[/math] [math]=-2 \hat{i}+\hat{k}[/math] হলে [math](\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}})[/math] [math]\times \overrightarrow{\mathbf{C}}[/math] [math]=[/math]?

Options:
A. [math]-2 \hat{i}-5 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math]
B. [math]-2 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math]
C. [math]2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-5 \hat{k}[/math]
D. [math]\hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2 \hat{i}-5 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=(-1-0) \hat{\mathrm{i}}-(2-0) \hat{\mathrm{j}}+(2+1) \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=-\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 [math]\times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math]
 [math]\times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}[/math]
 [math]=(-2-0) \hat{\mathrm{i}}-(-1+6)[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}}+(0-4) \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি Z অক্ষের সহিত যে কোণ উৎপন্ন করে তা কর?

Options:
ক. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. 60°
ঘ. 45°


Correct Answer: D.45°

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{\sqrt{4+1+4}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]

Question #1164 (ID: 199857)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-8 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}=8 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হলে [math]|3 \overline{\mathrm{A}}+2 \overline{\mathrm{B}}|[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]359[/math]
B. [math]720[/math]
C. [math]719[/math]
D. [math]358[/math]
E. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: E.[math]\text { None }[/math]

Solution:
[math]3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=19 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-13 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-30 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore|3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{19^{2}+13^{2}+30^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1430}[/math]

Question:
[math]ABC[/math] ত্রিভুজের [math]BC, CA[/math] ও [math]AB[/math] বাহুর মধ্যবিন্দুগুলো যথাক্রমে [math]D, E[/math] ও [math]F[/math] হলে-

Options:
ক. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BC}}[/math]
খ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}[/math]
গ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BE}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{CF}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]D, BC[/math]
 বাহুর মধ্যবিন্দু বলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\frac{1}{2}(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}) \Rightarrow \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AE}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AF}}[/math]

Question #1167 (ID: 199835)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{A}=a \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\underline{B}=2 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+b \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি সমান্তরাল হলে [math]a[/math] ও [math]b[/math] এর মান যথাক্রমে-

Options:
A. [math]2,6[/math]
B. [math]-1,-6[/math]
C. [math]3,7[/math]
D. [math]-3,-7[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1,-6[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টর দুটি সমান্তরাল হলে [math]\frac{a}{2}=\frac{2}{-4}=\frac{3}{b}[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=-1 \text { and } b=-6[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1168 (ID: 199836)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2010-2011, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\underline{i}+\underline{j}+\underline{k}[/math] এবং [math]3 \underline{i}+3 \underline{j}-6 \underline{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]90^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{\vec{A} \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}| \vec{B} \mid}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{3+3-6}{\sqrt{3} \cdot 3 \sqrt{6}}[/math]
 [math]=90[/math]


Explanation:

Question:
[math]\vec{A}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}[/math] পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে-

Options:
ক. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=0[/math]
খ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=0[/math]
গ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=0[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=0[/math]

Solution:
দুটি ভেক্টরের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ ০° হলে, তারা সমান্তরাল হয়

Question #1171 (ID: 199832)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a \times b[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{b} \times \mathrm{a}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের অন্তর্গত কোণ —

Options:
ক. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]180^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]180^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a} \times \vec{b}[/math]
 এর দিক খাড়া উপরে ; [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}[/math]
 এর দিক খাড়া নিচে
[Image]


Explanation:
[math]a×b[/math]
 ও [math]b×a[/math]
 পরস্পর বিপরীত বলে মধ্যবর্তী কোণ ১৮০°।

Question #1172 (ID: 199822)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2010-2011, 2002-2003, 2013-2014, 2011-2012, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology, Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{p}}=2 \overline{\mathrm{i}}-\overline{\mathrm{j}}+2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}=3 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{i}}-6 \overline{\mathrm{j}}-2 \overrightarrow{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান হবে-

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\sin ^{-1} \frac{21}{8}[/math]
D. [math]\tan ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\alpha=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{\overline{\mathrm{P}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{Q}}}{\mathrm{PQ}}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{3 \times 2+6-4}{3 \times 7}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{8}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1173 (ID: 199823)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (C Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\gamma[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\vec{A}=\gamma \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি x – অক্ষের সাথে [math]30°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে ?

Options:
ক. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
[math]=\cos 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\gamma}{\sqrt{\gamma^{2}+4^{2}+3^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{4}=\frac{\gamma}{\gamma^{2}+25}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \gamma[/math]
 [math]=5 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1174 (ID: 199824)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y এর কোণ মানের জন্য [math]\vec{A}=\gamma \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরটি X অক্ষের সাথে [math]30^\circ[/math] [math]\vec{A}=\gamma \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]

Options:
A. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
B. [math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]\cos 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\gamma \times 1}{\sqrt{\gamma^{2}+16+9} \cdot \sqrt{1}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\gamma}{\sqrt{\gamma^{2}+25}} \Rightarrow \frac{3}{4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\gamma^{2}}{\gamma^{2}+25}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 \gamma^{2}-3 \gamma^{2}[/math]
 [math]=75[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \gamma[/math]
 [math]= \pm 5 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1175 (ID: 199825)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\mathbf{a} \hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{Q}}=6 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-9 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে, a এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 2
B. 3
C. - 1
D. 1


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ব্যাখ্যা: টেকনিক: [math]\vec{A}=a_{1} \hat{i}+a_{2}[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+a_{3} \hat{k}[/math]
 এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 [math]=\mathrm{b}_{1} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\mathrm{b}_{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+\mathrm{b}_{3} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\frac{\mathrm{a}_{1}}{\mathrm{~b}_{1}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{a}_{2}}{\mathrm{~b}_{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\mathrm{a}_{3}}{\mathrm{~b}_{3}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ভেক্টরদ্বয় সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\frac{2}{6}=\frac{a}{-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a=-1[/math]
 [math]Ans: C.[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1176 (ID: 199827)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি কোন অক্ষের সাথে [math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{1}{3}\right)[/math] কোণটি উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
A. Y অক্ষের সাথে
B. X অক্ষের সাথে
C. Z অক্ষের সাথে
D. কোনটিই নয়


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
Y = এর ভেক্টর j [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}} ; \theta[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{(-1)(1)}{\sqrt{4+1+4}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{3}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1177 (ID: 199828)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন ত্রিভুজের দুই বাহু [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{u}}=\mathbf{2} \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{v}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] ভেক্টর দ্বারা নির্দেশিত হলে, ঐ ত্রিভুজের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\sqrt{6}}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{2}|(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{u}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}})|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}|(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}})[/math]
 [math]\times(\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}})|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}|0+2[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]+\hat{\mathrm{k}}+0|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}|3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1178 (ID: 199829)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}=a \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\mathrm{bj}+c \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] শূন্য ভেক্টর না হয় এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}|}[/math] তবে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
C. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
D. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
E. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]0^{\circ}[/math]

Solution:
Hints: কোনো ভেক্টর ও তার একক ভেক্টরের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ 0°Solve: কোনো ভেক্টরকে তার মান দ্বারা ভাগ করলে সেই ভেক্টরটির দিকে একটি একক ভেক্টর পাওয়া যায়।[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}|}[/math]
 যা হচ্ছে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটির দিকে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটির একক ভেক্টর।যেহেতু [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটির দিক [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটির দিকেই, সেহেতু [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ 0°

Explanation:
কোনো ভেক্টরকে তার মান দ্বারা ভাগ করলে সেই ভেক্টরটির দিকে একটিএকক ভেক্টর পাওয়া যায়। সেহেতু, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}}{|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}|}[/math]
 হচ্ছে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটির দিকে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math]
ভেক্টরটির একক ভেক্টর। আর ভেক্টরদ্বয় একই দিকে হওয়ায় এদের মধ্যবর্তী কোণের মান ০°।

Sub-Questions:

Question #1179 (ID: 199830)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+10 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-11 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overline{\mathrm{A}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] - এর উপাংশ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{12}{13}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{13}{15}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{13}{12}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{12}{15}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\frac{13}{15}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{A} \cos \theta=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{B}=\frac{4+20=11}{15}=\frac{13}{15}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1180 (ID: 199831)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\mathrm{B}=6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর দুইটির অন্তর্ভূক্ত কোণের [math]cosine[/math] এর অনুপাত কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{4}{21}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{4}{21}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{16}{21}[/math]
D. [math]-\frac{16}{21}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-\frac{4}{21}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\mathrm{AB} \cos \theta \Rightarrow \theta=\cos ^{-1} \frac{\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}}{\mathrm{AB}}[/math]
 [math]=\cos ^{-1} \frac{6-6-4}{\sqrt{1+4+4} \sqrt{36+9+4}}=\cos ^{-1}\left(-\frac{4}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1181 (ID: 199820)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2006-2007, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2020-2021, 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{\alpha}[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]\alpha \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 \alpha \hat{i}-\alpha \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. - 2, 1
B. 2,-1
C. 2,1
D. -2,-1


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\alpha .2 \alpha+(-2)(-\alpha)+1(-4)=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 \alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-4[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha^{2}+\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\alpha^{2}+2 \alpha-\alpha-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha(\alpha+2)-(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow(\alpha-1)(\alpha+2)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \alpha[/math]
 [math]=1,-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #1183 (ID: 199714)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}, \overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] [math]\vec{a}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের লম্বির সদৃশ সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{10}}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{10}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{14}}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{14}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{10}}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]

Solution:
লব্ধি ভেক্টর [math]=2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}+\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}=3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}}{\sqrt{3^{2}+l^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{10}}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1184 (ID: 199715)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\overrightarrow{O P}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}, \overrightarrow{O Q}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}|=[/math] কত একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{20}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{40}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{56}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{88}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{56}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{P Q}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{O Q}-\overrightarrow{O P}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}-2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overrightarrow{P Q}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2^{2}+(-6)^{2}+4^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{56}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #1192 (ID: 199724)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cantonment Public School & College, Saidpur
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] বরাবর একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}+1^{2}}}=\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1198 (ID: 199730)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Faujdarhat Cadet College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm{O}(0,0,0), \mathrm{A}(1,2,3)[/math] এবং [math]\mathbf{B}(-3,-2,-1)[/math]

i. [math]B[/math] এর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]-3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটির দৈর্ঘ্য [math]\sqrt{14}[/math] একক

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}=-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
i ও ii

Explanation:

ক. i ও ii

Question #1202 (ID: 199734)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: নীলফামারী সরকারি মহিলা কলেজের
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=\hat{i}+\hat{k}, \vec{b}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=(\hat{i}+\hat{k}) \cdot(3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{k})=3-2=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1209 (ID: 199741)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka City College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=10 \hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{Q}=-10 \hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\vec{Q}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\pi[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=10 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\vec{Q}=-10 \hat{j}[/math]
 এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ- [math]\theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos ^{-1}\left\{\frac{(10 \hat{\mathrm{j}}) \cdot(-10 \hat{\mathrm{j}})}{\sqrt{10^{2}} \sqrt{10^{2}}}\right\}=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-100}{100}\right)=\cos ^{-1}(-1)=\pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-9}{2}[/math]

Question #1213 (ID: 199745)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Holy Cross College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a[/math] এর মান কত হলে [math]2 a \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]2 a \hat{i}+a \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. [math]-1, \frac{4}{3}[/math]
B. [math]1, \frac{-4}{3}[/math]
C. [math]1, \frac{3}{4}[/math]
D. [math]1, \frac{-3}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]1, \frac{-3}{4}[/math]

Solution:
ডট গুণফল শূন্য হলে লম্ব হবেঅর্থাৎ, [math]2 a .2 a-1 \times a+1 \times(-3)=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 4 a^{2}-a-3=0 \Rightarrow 4 a^{2}-4 a+3 a-3=0 \\\Rightarrow 4 a(a-1)+3(a-1)=0 \Rightarrow(a-1)(4 a+3)=0\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=1[/math]
 অথবা, [math]a=\frac{-3}{4}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1214 (ID: 199746)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Chittagong Cantonment Public School & College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকটি পড় এবং প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\vec{M}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{N}=a \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর রাশি ।

[math]a[/math] এর মান কত হলে, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{M}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{N}}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math] হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]-7[/math]
খ. [math]-6[/math]
গ. [math]-5[/math]
ঘ. [math]-4[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-7[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{M}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{N}}=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 a+14=0 \quad \therefore \quad a=-7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1219 (ID: 199751)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka City College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] এর উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর উপাংশ [math]-\frac{3 \sqrt{6}}{2} \hat{b}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{a}\vec{b}[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-9[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
D. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-9[/math]

Solution:
[math]\operatorname{acos} \theta=-\frac{3 \sqrt{6}}{2}=\frac{\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}}{b} \Rightarrow \vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=-\frac{3 \sqrt{6}}{2} \cdot \sqrt{4+1+1}=-9[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1221 (ID: 199753)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Rajuk Uttara Model College, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপাংশ কত ?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{3}{21} \hat{a}[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{3}{21} \hat{a}[/math]
C. [math]-\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{a}[/math]

Correct Answer: D.[math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{21}} \hat{a}[/math]

Solution:

Question #1232 (ID: 199764)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Kushtia Govt. College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}, \vec{B}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}|[/math] এর মান নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
A. [math]5 \sqrt{6}[/math]
B. [math]6 \sqrt{5}[/math]
C. [math]7 \sqrt{5}[/math]
D. [math]5 \sqrt{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]6 \sqrt{5}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathbf{i}} & \hat{\mathbf{j}} & \hat{\mathbf{k}} \\1 & 2 & 3 \\3 & -2 & -1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \hat{\mathrm{i}}(-2+6)-\hat{\mathrm{j}}(-1-9)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}(-2-6)=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+10 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-8 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\therefore|\vec{A} \times \vec{B}|=\sqrt{4^{2}+10^{2}+(-8)^{2}} \\\Rightarrow \sqrt{16+100+64}=\sqrt{180}=\sqrt{36 \times 5}=6 \sqrt{5} \\\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1233 (ID: 199765)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards: Sylhet Board | Tags: Sylhet Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}-4 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]4 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\lambda \hat{\mathbf{j}}-8 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হলে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টর দুটি সমান্তরাল হলে, [math]\hat{i}, \hat{j}[/math]
 ও [math]\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math]
 এর সহগের অনুপাত সমান ।[math]\therefore \frac{2}{4}=\frac{-1}{\lambda}=\frac{-4}{-8} \therefore \lambda=-2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1234 (ID: 199766)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Patuakhali Government Girls' High School
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{A B}=3 \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}=5 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}} ; \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}[/math] সামান্তরিকের দুটি সন্নিহিত বাহু হলে, ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
A. [math]\sqrt{279}[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{289}[/math]
C. [math]\sqrt{299}[/math]
D. [math]10 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{299}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{aligned}\overrightarrow{A B} \times \overrightarrow{A C} & =\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\3 & 2 & -1 \\5 & -1 & 2\end{array}\right| \\& \Rightarrow\hat{\mathrm{i}}(4-1)-\hat{\mathrm{j}}(6+5)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}(-3-10)=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-11 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-13 \hat{\mathrm{k}}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}|=\sqrt{3^{2}+(-11)^{2}+(-13)^{2}}=\sqrt{299}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1235 (ID: 199767)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় কোন সামান্তরিকের দুটি সন্নিহিত বাহু নির্দেশ করলে, তার ক্ষেত্রফল কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]
গ. [math]5 \sqrt{5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 \sqrt{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]5 \sqrt{3}[/math]

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]\begin{aligned}& {\left[\begin{array}{rrr}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\2 & -1 & 1 \\1 & 3 & -2\end{array}\right]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}(2-3)-\hat{\mathrm{j}}(-41)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}(6+1) } \\\Rightarrow & -\hat{\mathrm{i}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \therefore|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}|=\sqrt{(-1)^{2}+5^{2}+7^{2}}=5 \sqrt{3}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সামান্তরিকের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=|-\hat{\mathrm{i}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}}|=\sqrt{(-1)^{2}+5^{2}+7^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1+25+49}=\sqrt{75}=5 \sqrt{3}[/math]
 বর্গএকক।

Explanation:

Question #1237 (ID: 199770)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Govt. Hazi Mohammad Mohsin College, Chottogram
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](\hat{\mathbf{i}} \times \hat{\mathbf{k}})+(\hat{\mathbf{k}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}})=?[/math]

Options:
A. [math]0[/math]
B. [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
C. [math]\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math]
D. [math]\hat{i}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math]

Solution:
[math](\hat{i} \times \hat{k})+(\hat{k}+\hat{j})=-\hat{j}+\hat{k}+\hat{j}=\hat{k}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1242 (ID: 199775)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: National Ideal School & college, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]ABCD[/math] সামন্তরিকের [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{A D}=\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

সামন্তরিকটির ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]17[/math]
খ. [math]8.5[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{17}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{17}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{17}[/math]

Solution:
সামন্তরিকের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}|[/math]
 [math]\overrightarrow{A B} \times \overrightarrow{A D}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\2 & 0 & -3 \\0 & 1 & 1\end{array}\right|=\hat{\mathrm{i}} \cdot 3+\hat{\mathrm{j}}(-2)+\hat{\mathrm{k}} \cdot 2[/math]
 [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}|=\sqrt{3^{2}+(-2)^{2}+2^{2}}=\sqrt{17}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1243 (ID: 199776)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: National Ideal School & college, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]ABCD[/math] সামান্তরিকের [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{A D}=\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}|=?[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]3[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{13}[/math]
গ. [math]9[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]3[/math]

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}+\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AD}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}=(2+0) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+(-3+1) \hat{\mathrm{k}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\therefore|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AC}}|=\sqrt{2^{2}+1^{2}+(-2)^{2}}=3\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1244 (ID: 199695)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x-1}{2}=\frac{y-2}{3}=\frac{z+3}{4}[/math] এর ভেক্টর সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]r=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}+t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math]\underline{r}=-\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}+t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]
গ. [math]\underline{r}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}+t(-\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbf{r}=-2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}+t(\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]r=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}+t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{x-1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-2}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{z+3}{4}=t[/math]
 ধরি[math]\therefore x=2 t+1, y[/math]
 [math]=3 t+2,[/math]
 [math]z=4 t-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \underline r[/math]
 [math]=x \hat{i}[/math]
 [math]+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=(2 t+1) \hat{i}+(3 t+2) \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+(4 t-3) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]+[/math]
 [math]t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1245 (ID: 199696)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এর স্কেলার গুণন হলো-

Options:
A. [math]11[/math]
B. [math]7[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
[math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) \cdot(3 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=6+3-2=7[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (b) }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1246 (ID: 199697)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এর লব্ধির মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]19[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{17}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt{19}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]
 ও [math]\hat{i}-\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
 এর লব্ধিরমান [math]=\sqrt{(1+2) \hat{i}+(2-1) \hat{j}+(-2-1) \hat{k}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9+1+9}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{19}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (d) }[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

খ. [math]\hat{\mathbf{j}} \times \hat{\mathbf{j}}=\hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]\hat{j} \times \hat{k}=-\hat{i}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\hat{i} \cdot \hat{j}=1[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\hat{i} . \hat{i}=1[/math]

Question #1249 (ID: 199701)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {O(0,0,0), A(1,2,3)}[/math] ও [math]B(-3,-2,-1)[/math] হলে —

i. [math]B[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]-3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{O A}[/math] এর [math]\sqrt{14}[/math] মানের ভেক্টর [math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}=-4 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}[/math]
 [math]=(1+3)[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+(2+2) \hat{\mathrm{j}}+(3+1) \mathrm{k}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (a) }[/math]


Explanation:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\mathbf{8 \mathbf { i }}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=\hat{i}-4 \hat{j}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=[/math] কত?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]9[/math]
D. [math]15[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]9[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=8[/math]
 [math]\cdot 1+(-1)[/math]
 [math](-4)+(-3)(1)=9[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1253 (ID: 199705)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\mathbf{3} \hat{\mathbf{i}}+4 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\vec{B}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এর অংশক কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{8}{\sqrt{14}} \hat{a}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{8}{14} \hat{a}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{8}{\sqrt{26}} \hat{a}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{8}{26} \hat{a}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{8}{\sqrt{26}} \hat{a}[/math]

Solution:
নির্ণেয় অংশক [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|} \hat{a}=\frac{3+8-3}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}+(-1)^{2}}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}=\frac{8}{\sqrt{26}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1254 (ID: 199706)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-a \hat{\mathbf{k}}, 2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর তিনটি সমতলীয় হলে, a এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{4}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টর তিনটি সমতলীয় হলে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{lrr}1 & 1 & -a \\2 & -1 & 3 \\-1 & 2 & -1\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1(1-6)[/math]
 [math]-1(-2+3)-a(4-1)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 5-1-3 a=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 a=-6[/math]
\therefore a=-2$

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1255 (ID: 199708)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] দুইটি ভেক্টরের ক্ষেত্রে-

[math]\text { i. } \vec{A}+\vec{B}=\vec{B}+\vec{A}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=\vec{B} \cdot \vec{A}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\vec{B} \times \vec{A}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(i) বিনিময় সূত্র (Commutative law): [math]A.Β = Β.Α[/math]
(ii) বণ্টন সূত্র (Distributive law): [math]A. (B+C) = A.B + A.C[/math]
(iii) [math]m(A.B) = (mA).B = A. (mB) = (A.B)m,[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1256 (ID: 199709)

i. [math]A[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

iii. [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}|=30[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

গ. i ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii

Question #1257 (ID: 199710)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](– 4, 3, 0)[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{r}}[/math] হলে—

i. [math]\vec{r}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}[/math]

ii. [math]|\vec{r}|=5[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}, \mathrm{z}[/math] অক্ষের উপর লম্ব

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}++3 \hat{\mathrm{j}} \quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (c) }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1258 (ID: 199711)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে-

[math]\text { i. } \vec{A}-\vec{B}=-2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{k}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=4[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \vec{A} \times \vec{B}=4[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(iii) সঠিক নয়। কারণ [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}[/math] ভেক্টর রাশি।

Explanation:

Question #1259 (ID: 199712)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{O A}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}, \overrightarrow{O B}=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে,

i. বিন্দুদ্বয়ের স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে [math](3, -2, 5)[/math] এবং [math]( 1, 1, −2)[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+7 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math]

iii. AB এর মধ্যবিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text { ii. } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}-\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. } \mathrm{AB}[/math]
 এর মধ্যবিন্দু [math]\left(\frac{3+1}{2}, \frac{-2+1}{2}, \frac{5-2}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(2, \frac{-1}{2}, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{AB}[/math]
 এর মধ্যবিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]=2 \hat{i}-\frac{1}{2} \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{3}{2} \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

D. [math]4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

Question #1261 (ID: 199621)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]Q(2,3,-1)[/math] এবং [math]P(4,-3,2)[/math] হলে [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}|=[/math] কত ?

Options:
A. [math]5[/math]
B. [math]6[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]10[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
Q বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{O Q}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}+3[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
P বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{O P}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3[/math]
 [math]\hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OQ}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OP}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+6[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mid \overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+36+9}[/math]
 [math]=7[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1262 (ID: 199622)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Rajshahi Board | Tags: Rajshahi Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+5 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি দ্বারা z-অক্ষের সাথে উৎপন্ন কোণের পরিমাণ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-\cos ^{-1} \frac{5}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
B. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{5}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{2}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]
D. [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{3}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{5}{\sqrt{38}}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\theta_{2}=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}) \cdot \hat{k}}{\sqrt{2^{2}+3^{2}+5^{2}} \cdot \sqrt{1^{2}}}\right)=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{5}{\sqrt{38}}\right)[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\vec{A}=2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\lambda \hat{\mathbf{j}}+10 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হয় তবে λ এর মান কত?

Options:
A. -10
B. -32
C. 32
D. 13


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\text { A.B }=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2-4 \lambda+50=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lambda=13[/math]

Question #1266 (ID: 199628)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}},[/math] [math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\mathbf{a}[/math] [math]\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর তিনটি একই সমতলে অবস্থিত হলে ধ্রুবক a এর মান কত?

Options:
A. $-2
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টরত্রয় একই সমতলে অবস্থিত হলে [math]\left|\begin{array}{rrr}1 & 1 & -1 \\1 & -1 & 1 \\-1 & 1 & a\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 হবে[math]\Rightarrow 1(-a-1)[/math]
 [math]-1(a+1)-1(1-1)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-a-1-a-1[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]a=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

i. [math]\vec{A}[/math] ভেক্টরের মান [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ -

iii. ভেক্টর দুটির অন্তর্গত কোণ [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{\sqrt{66}}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক

C. ii ও iii

Question #1268 (ID: 199630)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\overline{\mathrm{a}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \text { ও } \mathrm{b}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর।

[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর উপাংশ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{-7}{26}(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{7}{\sqrt{26}}(-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{-7}{\sqrt{29}}(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{7}{29}(2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{-7}{26}(4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

Solution:
b বরাবর a এর উপাংশ [math]=\frac{\mathbf{a} \cdot \mathbf{b}}{|\mathbf{b}|^{2}} \mathbf{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8-3-12}{4^{2}+1^{2}+(-3)^{2}} \mathbf{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-7}{26}(4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1270 (ID: 199632)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\bar{A}=\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overline{\mathrm{B}}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{AB}}[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{9}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{13}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{17}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{13}[/math]

Solution:
[math]|\overrightarrow{A B}|[/math]
 [math]=|\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
 [math]-\hat{i}+\hat{j}-\hat{k}|[/math]
 [math]=|3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3^{2}+(-2)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{13}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1271 (ID: 199633)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\vec{a}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}, \vec{b}=-\hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টর দুটি কোনো সামান্তরিকের দুটি সন্নিহিত বাহু নির্দেশ করে।

সামান্তরিকটির ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?

Options:
ক. [math]30[/math]
খ. [math]15[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{30}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{30}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt{30}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}=\left|\begin{array}{rrr}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\1 & 2 & 0 \\-1 & 3 & 1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}(2-0)+\hat{j}(0-1)+\hat{k}(3+2)[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+5[/math]
 [math]\hat{k}[/math]
ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=|\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2^{2}+(-1)^{2}+5^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{30}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question:
যদি [math]\vec{A}=2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=\hat{i}-\lambda \hat{j}+10 \hat{k}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হয় তবে [math]\lambda[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]-13[/math]
B. [math]-12[/math]
C. [math]12[/math]
D. [math]13[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]13[/math]

Solution:

 [math]\Rightarrow 2-4 \lambda+50[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lambda=13[/math]

Question #1274 (ID: 199639)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dhaka Board | Tags: Dhaka Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}, \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\mathbf{a} \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর তিনটি একই সমতলে অবস্থিত হলে ধ্রুবক [math]a[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-1[/math]
C. [math]0[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]-1[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টরত্রয় একই সমতলে অবস্থিত হলে [math]\left|\begin{array}{rrr}1 & 1 & -1 \\1 & -1 & 1 \\-1 & 1 & a\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 হবে ।[math]\Rightarrow 1(-\mathrm{a}-1)[/math]
 [math]-1(\mathrm{a}+1)-1(1-1)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow-\mathrm{a}-1-\mathrm{a}-1[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{a}=-1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1275 (ID: 199640)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর হলে—

i. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের মান [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}[/math] ভেক্টরের উপর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}[/math] ভেক্টরের অভিক্ষেপ [math]\frac{8}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

iii. ভেক্টর দুটির অন্তর্গত কোণ [math]\cos ^{-1} \frac{8}{\sqrt{66}}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক ?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও ii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
i, ii ও iii

Question #1276 (ID: 199641)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\bar{A}=\hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\bar{B}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}[/math] নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
খ. [math]3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
গ. [math]-\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টর দুটির ক্রস গুণফল নির্ণয় করতে হবে। ক্রস গুণফলের সংজ্ঞা অনুযায়ী, দুটি ভেক্টর [math]\vec{A} = a_1\hat{i} + a_2\hat{j} + a_3\hat{k}[/math]
 এবং [math]\vec{B} = b_1\hat{i} + b_2\hat{j} + b_3\hat{k}[/math]
 এর ক্রস গুণফল [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}[/math]
 নির্ণয়ের জন্য নির্ণায়ক (determinant) ব্যবহার করা হয়:A → × B → = | i ^ j ^ k ^ a 1 a 2 a 3 b 1 b 2 b 3 |এখানে, [math]\vec{A} = \hat{i} - \hat{j} + \hat{k}[/math]
 এবং [math]\vec{B} = \hat{i} + 2\hat{j} - \hat{k}[/math]
।অতএব, আমাদের নির্ণয় করতে হবে [math]\vec{B} \times \vec{A}[/math]
:B → × A → = | i ^ j ^ k ^ 1 2 − 1 1 − 1 1 |নির্ণায়কের সম্প্রসারণ করে পাই:B → × A → = i ^ ( ( 2 ) ( 1 ) − ( − 1 ) ( − 1 ) ) − j ^ ( ( 1 ) ( 1 ) − ( − 1 ) ( 1 ) ) + k ^ ( ( 1 ) ( − 1 ) − ( 2 ) ( 1 ) )B → × A → = i ^ ( 2 − 1 ) − j ^ ( 1 − ( − 1 ) ) + k ^ ( − 1 − 2 )B → × A → = i ^ ( 1 ) − j ^ ( 1 + 1 ) + k ^ ( − 3 )B → × A → = i ^ − 2 j ^ − 3 k ^ক্রস গুণফলের একটি ধর্ম হলো [math]\vec{B} \times \vec{A} = -(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})[/math]
। তাই, [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}[/math]
 নির্ণয় করে তার ঋণাত্মক মান নিলেও একই উত্তর পাওয়া যাবে। দুটি ভেক্টরের ক্রস গুণফল একটি লম্ব ভেক্টর নির্দেশ করে।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1277 (ID: 199643)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\bar{a}=2 \hat{i}-3[/math] [math]\hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\vec{b}[/math] [math]=4 \hat{i}+[/math] [math]\hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর।

[math]\overline{\mathbf{a}}[/math] ও [math]\overline{\mathbf{b}}[/math] এর লব্ধি ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{41}}(6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{69}}(-2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{29}}(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{417}}(5 \hat{i}+14 \hat{j}+14 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{41}}(6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]

Solution:
লব্ধি ভেক্টর, [math]\mathbf{R}=\mathbf{a}+\mathbf{b}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 [math]+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 লব্ধি ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর: [math]=\frac{6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{6^{2}+(-2)^{2}+1^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{\sqrt{41}}[/math]
 [math](6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1278 (ID: 199644)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Dinajpur Board | Tags: Dinajpur Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের তথ্যের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\bar{a}=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]\vec{b}=4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] দুটি ভেক্টর।

[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] বরাবর [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}[/math] এর উপাংশ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{-7}{26}(4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{7}{\sqrt{26}}(-4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+3 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{-7}{\sqrt{29}}(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{7}{29}(2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{-7}{26}(4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]b[/math]
 বরাবর [math]a[/math]
 এর উপাংশ [math]=\frac{\mathbf{a} \cdot \mathbf{b}}{|\mathbf{b}|^{2}} \mathbf{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{8-3-12}{4^{2}+1^{2}+(-3)^{2}} \mathbf{b}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-7}{26}[/math]
 [math](4 \hat{i}+\hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1279 (ID: 199523)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{x-1}{2}=\frac{y-2}{3}=\frac{z+3}{4}[/math] এর ভেক্টর সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]r=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}+t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]
খ. [math]\underline{r}=-\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}+t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]
গ. [math]\underline{r}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}+t(-\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathbf{r}=-2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}+t(\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]r=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}+t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]

Solution:
[math]\frac{x-1}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-2}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{z+3}{4}=t[/math]
 ধরি[math]\therefore x=2 t+1, y[/math]
 [math]=3 t+2,[/math]
 [math]z=4 t-3[/math]
 [math]\therefore \underline r[/math]
 [math]=x \hat{i}[/math]
 [math]+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=(2 t+1) \hat{i}+(3 t+2) \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+(4 t-3) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]+[/math]
 [math]t(2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1280 (ID: 199524)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এর স্কেলার গুণন হলো-

Options:
A. [math]11[/math]
B. [math]7[/math]
C. [math]5[/math]
D. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: B.[math]7[/math]

Solution:
[math](2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}) \cdot(3 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+\hat{k})[/math]
 [math]=6+3-2=7[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (b) }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1281 (ID: 199525)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] ও [math]2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এর লব্ধির মান কত?

Options:
A. [math]19[/math]
B. [math]\sqrt{17}[/math]
C. [math]1[/math]
D. [math]\sqrt{19}[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\sqrt{19}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math]
 ও [math]\hat{i}-\hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]
 এর লব্ধিরমান [math]=\sqrt{(1+2) \hat{i}+(2-1) \hat{j}+(-2-1) \hat{k}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{9+1+9}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{19}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (d) }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1284 (ID: 199529)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Nexes Solutions
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathrm {O(0,0,0), A(1,2,3)}[/math] ও [math]B(-3,-2,-1)[/math] হলে —

i. [math]B[/math] বিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]-3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{O A}[/math] এর [math]\sqrt{14}[/math] মানের ভেক্টর [math]\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}=-4 \hat{i}-4 \hat{j}-4 \hat{k}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}[/math]
 [math]=(1+3)[/math]
 [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
 [math]+(2+2) \hat{\mathrm{j}}+(3+1) \mathrm{k}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]\quad[/math]
 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (a) }[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1288 (ID: 199533)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=\mathbf{3} \hat{\mathbf{i}}+4 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরের দিক বরাবর [math]\vec{B}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এর অংশক কত?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{8}{\sqrt{14}} \hat{a}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{8}{14} \hat{a}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{8}{\sqrt{26}} \hat{a}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{8}{26} \hat{a}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\frac{8}{\sqrt{26}} \hat{a}[/math]

Solution:
নির্ণেয় অংশক [math]=\frac{\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}}{|\vec{A}|} \hat{a}=\frac{3+8-3}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}+(-1)^{2}}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}=\frac{8}{\sqrt{26}} \hat{\mathrm{a}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1289 (ID: 199534)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-a \hat{\mathbf{k}}, 2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]-\hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টর তিনটি সমতলীয় হলে, a এর মান কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]-2[/math]
B. [math]-\frac{4}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
D. [math]2[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]-2[/math]

Solution:
ভেক্টর তিনটি সমতলীয় হলে, [math]\left|\begin{array}{lrr}1 & 1 & -a \\2 & -1 & 3 \\-1 & 2 & -1\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 1(1-6)[/math]
 [math]-1(-2+3)-a(4-1)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 5-1-3 a=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 3 a=-6[/math]
\therefore a=-2$

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1290 (ID: 199536)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}[/math] দুইটি ভেক্টরের ক্ষেত্রে-

[math]\text { i. } \vec{A}+\vec{B}=\vec{B}+\vec{A}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=\vec{B} \cdot \vec{A}[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\vec{B} \times \vec{A}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. i ও iii
C. ii ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(i) বিনিময় সূত্র (Commutative law): [math]A.Β = Β.Α[/math]
(ii) বণ্টন সূত্র (Distributive law): [math]A. (B+C) = A.B + A.C[/math]
(iii) [math]m(A.B) = (mA).B = A. (mB) = (A.B)m,[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

i. [math]\vec{r}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}[/math]

iii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}, \mathrm{z}[/math] অক্ষের উপর লম্ব

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

ক. i ও ii
খ. i ও iii
গ. ii ও iii
ঘ. i, ii ও iii

 [math]\therefore \text { Ans. (c) }[/math]

Question #1293 (ID: 199539)

Question:
[math]\vec{A}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে-

[math]\text { i. } \vec{A}-\vec{B}=-2 \hat{i}+4 \hat{k}[/math] [math]\text { ii. } \vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}=4[/math] [math]\text { iii. } \vec{A} \times \vec{B}=4[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
(iii) সঠিক নয়। কারণ [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}[/math] ভেক্টর রাশি।

Question #1294 (ID: 199540)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{O A}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+5 \hat{k}, \overrightarrow{O B}=\hat{i}+\hat{j}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে,

i. বিন্দুদ্বয়ের স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে [math](3, -2, 5)[/math] এবং [math]( 1, 1, −2)[/math]

ii. [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+7 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math]

iii. AB এর মধ্যবিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+3 \hat{k}[/math]

নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
A. i ও ii
B. ii ও iii
C. i ও iii
D. i, ii ও iii


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text { ii. } \overrightarrow{\mathrm{BA}}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OA}}-\overrightarrow{\mathrm{OB}}[/math]
 [math]=3 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}}-\hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+7 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\text { iii. } \mathrm{AB}[/math]
 এর মধ্যবিন্দু [math]\left(\frac{3+1}{2}, \frac{-2+1}{2}, \frac{5-2}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=\left(2, \frac{-1}{2}, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{AB}[/math]
 এর মধ্যবিন্দুর অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]=2 \hat{i}-\frac{1}{2} \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+\frac{3}{2} \hat{k}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1296 (ID: 199542)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও :

[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{a}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}, \overrightarrow{\mathrm{b}}=\hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] [math]\vec{a}[/math] ও [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের লম্বির সদৃশ সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{10}}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{10}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{14}}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{14}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \hat{k})[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{10}}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]

Solution:
লব্ধি ভেক্টর [math]=2 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}+\hat{i}+2 \hat{j}-\hat{k}=3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 ভেক্টরের সমান্তরাল একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{3 \hat{i}+\hat{j}}{\sqrt{3^{2}+l^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{10}}(3 \hat{i}+\hat{j})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1297 (ID: 199543)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[math]\overrightarrow{O P}=2 \hat{i}+3 \hat{j}-2 \hat{k}, \overrightarrow{O Q}=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math] [math]|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{PQ}}|=[/math] কত একক?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{20}[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{40}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{56}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{88}[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\sqrt{56}[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{P Q}[/math]
 [math]=\overrightarrow{O Q}-\overrightarrow{O P}[/math]
 [math]=4 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}-2 \hat{i}-3 \hat{j}+2 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=2 \hat{i}-6 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore|\overrightarrow{P Q}|[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2^{2}+(-6)^{2}+4^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{56}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question #1305 (ID: 199552)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Cantonment Public School & College, Saidpur
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}+\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] বরাবর একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{3}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]\frac{\hat{i}+\hat{j}+\hat{k}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Solution:
একক ভেক্টর [math]=\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}+1^{2}}}=\frac{\hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1315 (ID: 199562)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: নীলফামারী সরকারি মহিলা কলেজের
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=\hat{i}+\hat{k}, \vec{b}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}[/math] এর মান কত ?

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]2[/math]
C. [math]-2[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]1[/math]

Solution:
[math]\vec{a} \cdot \vec{b}=(\hat{i}+\hat{k}) \cdot(3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{k})=3-2=1[/math]

Question #1320 (ID: 199567)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Ideal School & College, Motijheel, Dhaka
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{a}=\hat{i}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{b}}=3 \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] হলে [math]2 \vec{a}+\vec{b}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{a}+2 \vec{b}[/math] এর অন্তঃস্থ কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{31}{30}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{31}{30}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{31}{50}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\sin ^{-1}\left(\frac{31}{50}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: C.[math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{31}{50}\right)[/math]

Solution:

Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{A}}=2 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+\hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}=3 \hat{i}-2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-\hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত ?

Options:
A. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
B. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]

Correct Answer: C.[math]60^{\circ}[/math]

Question #1322 (ID: 199569)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Dhaka City College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=10 \hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{Q}=-10 \hat{\mathbf{j}}[/math] হলে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{P}}[/math] ও [math]\vec{Q}[/math] এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত?

Options:
A. [math]-\pi[/math]
B. [math]0[/math]
C. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
D. [math]\pi[/math]


Correct Answer: D.[math]\pi[/math]

Solution:
[math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{P}}=10 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
 এবং [math]\vec{Q}=-10 \hat{j}[/math]
 এর মধ্যবর্তী কোণ- [math]\theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \cos ^{-1}\left\{\frac{(10 \hat{\mathrm{j}}) \cdot(-10 \hat{\mathrm{j}})}{\sqrt{10^{2}} \sqrt{10^{2}}}\right\}=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{-100}{100}\right)=\cos ^{-1}(-1)=\pi[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question:
[math]\lambda[/math] এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=4 \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{j}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{\mathbf{B}}=\lambda \hat{\mathbf{i}}-3 \hat{\mathbf{j}}+2 \hat{\mathbf{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হবে?

Options:
A. [math]3[/math]
B. [math]\frac{-9}{2}[/math]
C. [math]-12[/math]
D. [math]12[/math]


Correct Answer: A.[math]3[/math]
